092-44b dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro/ /lha'i lo khri nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam 'og gar 'phangs par yid la bsams pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas dgug par bgyid do/ /phyogs bcur 'phang ste khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas skyes pa dang / bud med dam/ gzhan gang ci yang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ myur du dgug par bgyid de/ som nyi mi bgyi'o/ /gal te lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du dgug par bgyi ste som nyi mi bgyi'o/ /zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o/ /'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing ci srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te dur khrod du zhugs na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad kyi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje'i zhags pas brdabs na/ phug thams cad kyi sgo dbye bar 'gyur zhing 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /lam ngan pa dang / mi ngan pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'bab chu ngan pa dang / sbrul dang / dbugs gdug pa dang / srog chags gon sa dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog

89
092-45a chags su gtogs pa thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /mi drang bo dang lam drang bor ci ltar rang gi gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang pa bzhin du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje'i zhags pa las thams cad bgyid pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rig sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrub bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nor bu 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ rdo rje'am/ bai DUr+ya 'am/ shel rang 'byung ngam/ ma rgad dam/ in dra nI la la sor mo'i tshigs pas lhag tsam shin tu phyis la/ shin tu yongs su dag par bgyis la/ gser gyi me tog gi tshul du bgyis pa/ mu tig gis dkris pa/ ge sar kha phye ba tsam pa ka'i me tog ci lta ba bzhin bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon rtsi mdzes pas kha bsgyur ba/ shin tu tshad la bab par bkal ba khru nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ sor mo gung mo'i tshad tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la/ thor to cig shos su ni nor bu 'am gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /legs par bkrus nas ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba gzhag par bgyid cing / spos phor gyi snod bshams nas/ a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o/ /me tog sil ma dang / dri dang rol mo'i cha byad dag dgod par bgyi'o/ / rig sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /btung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / sbags rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri chig stong bzlas nas/ lag pa g.yas pas

90
092-45b chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no/ /lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par rgya cher bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcwa lnga'i nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul ba bgyi'o/ /de nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas brdeg par bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na/ sgra chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis/ nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgo

91
092-46a bor bzhag nas/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub bo/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod dgur bsgyur ba thams cad de/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa la ltos shig /yid la ci ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs la ltos shig /rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig /'on te bde ba can blta bar 'tshal lam/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyi mchod par 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi ba 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul lo/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di/ lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog bzung nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'di lta bu yid la bgyid pa chen po ci lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan

92
092-46b brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po lnga pa/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA pad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni ma Ni/ a mo g+ha ma Ni su ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a laM kA ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha ma Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra sany+tsa ra/ ni sha tsa tsa re shwa ra ma hA/ pad+ma b+hu dza ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ pra ba ra ma hA bo d+hi satwa pad+ma d+ha ra pad+mA sa na pad+ma ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ pad+ma gau ra/ pad+mA laM kr-i ta ta nu/ sa ta sra b+hu dzas ha sra ne tra nA nAd+b+hu ta/ bra ba ra Na/ mu drA bi b+hU Shi tA sa ha swa b+hu dza/ dza ya dza ya/ sha ta sa ha sra ra smi pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsi tra/ A b+ha ra Na d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka na ka/ badzra bai DUr+ya/ mar+k+ka ta/ in dra nI la pad+ma rA ga b+h+rU Shi ta sha rI ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi tsi tra/

93
092-47a ra tsa Na/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra dA brah+ma/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ lo ke shwa ra/ ya mAn+te shwa ra/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ r-i Shi ga Na/ ku mA ra/ senA ba ti be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA b+hu ta bi sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya ma nu smar b+ha ga bAn/ pu ra ya me A tA shAn+ta tA rA ya pU ra shA yA ya sa twa na/ tar+dz+dza ya dush+TAM/ bA ta ya pig+hAM/ mA ra ya tri do Sha mA laM/ sa ra sa ra pA paM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya/ ma hA cin+dA ma Ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi pu la sid d+hi/ ma ma tri b+hu ba na di bya pra yats+tsha/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ saM b+ho d+ha ya/ saM b+ho d+ha ya/ ma hA ba shu pa ti ge Sha d+ha ra/ a nan+ta bi kur+b+ba Na/ r-id+d+hi san dar+Sha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ga ga ne bi pu la bi mA na/ saM da ni ka /na mo stu te bi pu la pu N+ya/ ko shA d+ha ra/ ma hA a mo sid d+he hU~M hU~M/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA~M/ bi pul kIrti ka te swA hA/ b+hu ba swA hA/ b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/ a mo g+ha bi pu le swA hA/ ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni sid+d+he swA hA/ ma hA tsin+ta ma Ni sid+d+hi bar de swA hA/ sarba sid d+hi bar de swA hA/ oM bi pu le shwa ra/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid d+he hUM phaT swA hA/ don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa lags pas mnan na nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i char sprin gyi tshogs chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus

94
092-47b mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing / mchod pa'i char chen po de dag yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' las chu 'bebs par 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /'on te mi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don yod rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe bskal ba chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /'on te babs na lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu bsrung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba'am/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs

95
092-48a pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba'am/ lha'i zhal zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang / chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba'am/ nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa yang dag dbul bar bgyi'o/ /pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o/ / yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtong chen po dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rin po che'i ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / mar me'i ljon shing dang / dpag bsam gyi ljon shing yid la bgyis te/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsams pa bzhin de bzhin

96
092-48b gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du lan gsum du bzlas par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / rim gro bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang gzi brjid stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang / dngang ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rims kyis ma lags/ dug gis ma lags/ dug sbyar mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lags/ mes ma lags/ chus ma lags te/ lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ / dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags/ pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/ gnod

97
092-49a sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba dang / sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad gzung bar mi nus shing / rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par 'gyur/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing / smyung ba lan cig bgyis te/ bzlas brjod byas na de bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bsten pa tsam mam cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par skyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags

98
092-49b 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis/ mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /chung du na rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa'am/ gum pa'i sha'am/ gum pa'i ro rul ba'am/ chung du na gum pa'i gos por ba'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur na/ sems can de gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis sam som nyi bskyed par mi bgyid na/ gang dag ches mang du ltag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang rigs kyi bu po'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar bgyid dam/ brjod par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems par bgyid/ bsgom par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na/ de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid bcangs na/ mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di nyid re zhig kun chub par bgyis nas/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgos pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsams te/ bsams pa'i las thams cad bgyis na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pad nga bgyi ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas/ lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin

99
092-50a du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la/ lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/ lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs na mi gda' bar gyur nas/ gar dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo yang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par ci lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri sul gyi phug dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar ldog par 'gyur zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / nyon mongs pa dang / nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o/ /gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /gtsang ma'i gnas sam/ phyogs su ba'i lci ba ste/ ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/ /gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ /me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bum pa gang bas brgyan cing / spos sna tshogs kyis bgos pa'i bdug pa gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du stan bzang po bshams te/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum por bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o/ /dbus su nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de'i 'og tu tsan+dan dang /

100
092-50b a ga ru dang / du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi ste/ zhags pa dang / de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba'am/ lha gda' ba'am/ klu gda' ba'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci gda' ba dang / 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po gda' ba'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa gda' ba'am/ tshe ring ba gda' ba'am/ tshe nyams pa gda' ba'am/ tshe 'pho ba gda' ba'am/ rgyal srid gda' ba'am/ grong 'thob pa'am/ yul 'thob pa'am/ grong khyer 'thob pa'am/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gda' ba'am/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / mig 'phrul smra ba'am/ zhing smra ba'am/ gter smra ba'am/ 'bru smra ba'am/ bud med 'phrog pa'am/ las bsgrub pa'am/ gsang sngags bsgrub pa'am/ dbang du bgyi ba'am/ ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'am mi dge ba/ de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /lo'am/ lo phyed dam/ gnod pa'am/ 'tshe ba'am/ yams sam/ mi ngas sam/ mi ngas chen po'am/ phyugs ngas sam/ gor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang gi dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ci lta ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang bsams shing gang gnyer bar 'grub pa'am/ mi 'grub pa'am/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/ de la the tshom dang yid gnyis dang som nyi mi bgyi ste/ dngos po don gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu bzhag na/ ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang

101
092-51a char ches na nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma 'char khar nyi ma la bstan na nyi ma babs nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba tshes pa la bstan na zla ba babs nas 'dod dgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do/ / chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nags khung du bstan na sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro/ /ri phug tu bstan na sman thams cad 'bab par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o/ /'bru'i phung po la bstan na 'bru thams cad 'du bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i gnas sam/ nag po chen po la bstan te/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i mngon sum du bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ blon po'i tshogs dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shil dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'chang ba dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te/ don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na/ ci ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin/ me tog dang 'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba khyim gyi steng ngam khyams su bzhag la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyid do/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa

102
092-51b gcig bzlas par bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang nas/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin char du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub la sogs pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang / gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus babs par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang sha kho na thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa nas gcan gzan khro bo thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rig sngags 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la lag zungs kyi ngos la dngul las bgyis te/ gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o/ /shing shun gyi skud pa'am/ arka'i skud pa dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa lhan cig tu sgril la khru bcu drug byung ba shin tu tshad la bab par bkum pa/ bsgrub pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ zhags pa dang / ral gri mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste gzung bar bgyi'o/ /khros pa'i gnyer gyi bzhin gyis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas/ ral gri 'bar bar gyur nas/ rig

103
092-52a sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi mthus zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/ /lo khri brgyad stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa bzung la g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste/ khros pas hU~M zhes bgyi bas mnan na/ mi gda' bar gyur nas/ mi gda' ba dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe lo khri thub par 'gyur ro/ /'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri bskor na/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gdug pa thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi rig sngags gcad par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig bskor na/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i mtshon cha thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/ thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi rig sngags gtubs par 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad stongs par 'gyur ro/ /phug gi sgor bskor na/ 'khrul 'khor dang sgo glegs thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro/ /sgo dang gtan pa thams cad gtubs par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur/ thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad du ci ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas yang rig sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des skud pa lnga las bsgrubs te/ tshon rtsis kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin du gtubs la/ bsgrub par shin tu 'os pa las bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me tog dang / ra sa'i me tog dang / ldong ros dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang / shing arka'i 'o ma de lhan cig tu sbyar ba der btsag

104
092-52b btsal te/ dus gcig tu lhan cig mnyam du btags shing spyi bor legs par bsku ste/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ sbrul 'khyil pa mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka can yongs su 'khyil pa gser gyis g.yogs pa/ legs par sbrel ba ni zhags pa'i mchog lags so/ /rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te/ dris mchod par bgyi'o/ /me tog gi sil ma dang / bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o/ /ba dan gyis kun nas brgyan par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnas su stan bzang po bshams te/ de'i steng du klu'i zhags pa bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o/ /sbrul gyi mgo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogs su bstan no/ /dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bgyi'o/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil dkar po'i snod dang / bdug pa rnam pa gsum po tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ska rnams bsreg go/ /'bras yos dang / yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o/ /thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ tshangs pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar bgyi'o/ /sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni/ /rgyun du sbrul ni 'bar bar 'gyur/ /stan las zhags pa g.yo ba ni/ /sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam du/ /stan las gyen du 'phar bar 'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas/ klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na/ klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs te don yod rgyal po bzlas nas/ sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o/ /

105
092-53a de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du smra bas rig sngags 'chang zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzung ste bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de mi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro/ /'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glegs dang / gtan pa thams cad gtubs shing bcad par 'gyur ro/ /zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo mdzes ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing bklubs ma mdzes ma mchis nas/ rin po che'i phreng ba thogs te/ rigs sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do/ /rigs sngags 'chang gis blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/ bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo nam mkha' la 'phur nas nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis bzed nas btung bar bgyi ste/ tshe nyi khri thub par 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug ma la bzlas nas bya ba par bgyi ste/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams pas mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char ches pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bzhag na char ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /grang ba'am/ rlung ngam/ ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su nang par sngar klu'i zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor na/ dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ /grang ba'i rlung dang ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /lo khyud 'khor tshang bar mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin don yod rgyal po'i snying

106
092-53b po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas brdogs la/ lag pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyis na/ nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zhal zas dang / btung ba 'dod dgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas skye bo stong stong tsam la stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la/ lag pa g.yon pas klu bzung nas/ dpyid dam/ ston ka'am/ sprin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nam mkha' la 'phangs na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog bzang po gang ci yang rung ba bzang po shin tu smin pa/ kha zas shin tu bzang po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ klu'i gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas par sa'i steng du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gis rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa bzhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bsnun la/ de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blangs te/ rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhags pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa na khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa g.yul gyi dbus su 'phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig bgrad pa/ lce bsgyur ba mig me mdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ji lta ji ltar yid la

107
092-54a bsams pa'i don de lta de lta bur thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ 'bri'i rtsid pa dang / rtsid pa chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang / lcags las mdung rtse gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin zhag gcig mchis la legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig gis bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa lag par thogs nas/ dur khrod du zhugs na/ dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur zhing khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal bde bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ro'i mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing / ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bkrol na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs nas/ gnod sbyin de yang mdun du mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka' stsol cig dang / thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa'i las gyis shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas nyin gcig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang la mig mi 'dzums

108
092-54b par blta zhing / rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo la ma dang / chung ma dang / sring mos bsgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o/ /gal te ma zhig tu bgyid na bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /chung ma zhig tu bgyid na/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing / de dang lhag par dga' bar rtse bas phye bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sring mo zhig tu bgyid na/ yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do/ /rnam thos kyi mgul du btags te/ khros pas drangs nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas rnam thos mchis nas/ nyin gcig bzhin dong tse stong stsol bar 'gyur/ gser stong stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa yang stsol/ bsod nams kyang bgyi'o/ /nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal lcag gis brdeg par bgyi'o/ /nag po chen pos sgra phyung ba dang / rig sngags 'chang skrag par mi bgyi bar slar yang khros pas brdeg par bgyi'o/ /de nas mchi ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis ma bzed de/ thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis slar yang thal mos brdeg par bgyis te/ de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyugs pa/ rig sngags 'chang gis byugs na nam mkha' la mchis nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ nag

109
092-55a po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pa pa dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas gzhan yang zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i/ /rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te/ /lag pa stong dang mig stong dang / /mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs/ /khams gsum dag tu bstan pa ni/ /gdul bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to/ /gsang ba 'di yi gzugs bstan pa/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rig sngags sgrub pa bla na med/ /de nyid zhags pa bsgrubs phyir ro/ /de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can/ /'jig rten pha rol rjes mthun pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang / /de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang / /bde can blta bar 'tshal ba dang / /de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /'jig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal ba/ /mchog tu gus par bgyi ba yi/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis/ /de nyid gus par dang ba dang / /shin tu dang ba nyid du bgyi/ /grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba la/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bstan te/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog /don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das/ /don yod 'bras bu dam pa po/ /don yod kun du grub pa 'thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mchod sbyin pa/ /don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal ba/ /mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur/ /don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi/ /cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad/ /de lta bas na kun bsgrims te/ /bdag nyid yongs

110
092-55b su dag bgyis nas/ /ji ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin/ /rjes su mthun par ri mo'i gzugs/ /rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs blta zhing / /zhags pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang / /rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang / /sbyin sreg rlung lha chu lha dang / /khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang / /lha dang klu dang ston pa dang / /gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni/ /'byung po lha min dri za dang / /nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun du/ /'jig rten mgon po mchog sbyin bstan/ /gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni/ /dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang / /zla gzugs rgyu skar tshes grangs lha/ /'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan/ /sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas/ /gdul ba'i don du grol ba'i lam/ /sems can rnams la bstan pas na/ /de bas som nyi nyid mi bgyi/ /mchog tu dang bar bgyi ba lags/ /ci ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams/ /ci ltar mthun pa bzhin du 'grub/ /ci ltar mthun pa ri mo'i gzugs/ /ci ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa sgrub/ /gnas 'di gang du 'os pa dang / /gang du sems ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /goms pa gang gi phyag rgya dang / /gang gi dkyil 'khor char dbye ba/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon/ /kun du sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso/ / don yod 'bras bu stsol ba'o/ /don yod pa yi grub pa thob/ /don yod dgos pa thams cad dang / /grub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur/ /zhags pa dang ri mo bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad 'joms pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug ba thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal

111
092-56a bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ mi mdza' ba rnams 'joms pa/ pha rol gyi dpung ldog pa'i mchog /nad thams cad 'joms pa/ mod la 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'joms pa/ lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin tu rnyed par dka' ba lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/ klu rnams dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dus kun du shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis par rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas blon po dang bcas pa bsrung ba'i don du thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas/ gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam/ /ca co ma mchis dben par ni/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o/ /zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi/ /don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms/ /rgyas pa rgyas pa thob 'gyur te/ /thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang / /gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/ /gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang / /skrag par sdigs pa drag shul spyod/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa bla na med/ /'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o/ /me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang / /de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa'ang dgug /khung brkos de la pad+ma'i tshul/ /pad+ma rtag tu bri bar bgyi/ /cho ga ci bzhin khung nang gi/ /pad+ma la ni ge sar

112
092-56b bgyi/ /gru bzhi'am ni zlum po ste/ /de lta bu ni brko bar bgyi/ /legs par byugs shing shin tu gnag /shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang / /shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi/ /bkra shis phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bzang pos gtor ma'i las bgyi'o/ /bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/ /bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod/ /thog mar me lha bkug nas ni/ /de nas sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa/ /legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi/ /de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi/ /bdag bsrung gtsug tor bcing ba dang / /gzhan bsrung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / /de bzhin grogs bgyid bsrung ba dang / /rgyun du arka'i shing spar te/ /dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang / /mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag /nyi shu gcig dbul me ston bgyi/ /de nas me'i lha dgug go/ /oM na mo\u0f85 g+ni dz+wa la/ ma hA dz+wa la/ dz+yod snA pra b+hA maN+Dal/ sarba bid Ahu ti rak+ti ni rata tuSh+Na dz+wa la/ d+hu ma shwa sa/ artsi ShA mu kha triSh+Na/ rash+mi da ba ag nish+tsa bid tu tash+tsa hU ta sha na mu kha na te/ sarba de bA nAM/ sarba yak+Sha ma hA bIr+ya ma hA dza ya/ ma hA bA la/ nir ma ri shan/ sarba da hA na pra bu la A kA sha sa mug gang kash+tsa a ba pras da kA shan/ man Da la pU dzi to/ ma Ni ta sarba tra di ba bya ru pa/ bi shA ra dang / A bA hA na sarba da tra gAn/ de ba hU ta/ sha na hu tra/ sha na ta ma si bi d+ha ma ka na/ an d+ha kA rA na/ mug te rash+mi ma pri yang ku g+ha na d+ha pha lA ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ a gra dza/ sUk+Sh+ma su tIk+Sh+Nash+tsa mr-i ti sa na tsi bi na/ pri yo pash+mi push+mi push+pa b+ha sma b+hasta tsa b+ha sma bas+t+ra ni/ se ba ka~M /b+ha sma sany+tsa d+ha nid t+yan d+hu ma mA ku la/ dzA ya se pA ka sid d+ha ras grA tsa ra sa rbad tra pra d+ha pa ri shA/ sa rbad tra ni ra ma ri sha No/ nir t+ya spriSh+Ta d+hash+Ta na muny+tsa si/ dwa tring sha /b+ha ba no de ba ag ni mu kha de bA ta/ e ru tsi ru dzA ba la ba da ka ma hA na ta/ a tha par No/ de ba de ba na/ bi shA ra da/ a yA na tu sA d+ha shi g+h+raM kar ma sA d+ha ya tad twa ta/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha sa ma yan/ hu ru hu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang

113
092-57a sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du/ /bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi/ /gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar la/ /spar bdun spar bas me la dbul/ /mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang / /de bzhin spar ba'i spar bas so/ /dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang / /bdug pa rgya cher dbul bar bgyi/ /de bzhin 'bras bu spar bar 'bul/ /de nas chab kyis bsang ba bgyi/ /ci ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du/ /nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang / / blag sha u dum bA ra dang / /sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang / /kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang / /pad+ma ut+pal thang shing dang / /de bzhin dri bda'i tsan+dan dang / /byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang dri bda'i shing / /'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang / /sha mi shi ba'i las lags pas/ /mchod yon de bzhin rtswa dag ste/ /de dag gis ni me spar nas/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las rnams bgyi'o/ /'bras yos tsan+dan phye ma dang / /a gu ru dang du ru ska/ /kun du ru la sogs pa dang / /du ru skar bcas spri ka dang / /spang spos pri yang ku blangs te/ /de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing / /mar ram mar sar lhan cig brdzi/ /don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa lags nas phyogs bcur blta zhing kun du brtags nas/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyis mchog slongs shig dang / thams cad sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blang bar bgyi ste/ ci ltar blangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang

114
092-57b gis mchod yon gyi snod dag 'bul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing / 'bras bu'i shing spar nas/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas/ dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ pus mo nub tsam du 'bul bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na/ cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga de bsgrubs zin gyis/ mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa/ de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyi'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de la snod blangs te/ rang gi lag nas rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza' bar bgyi'o/ /'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po drug pa/ gang gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig

115
092-58a brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gA'i klung bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod rab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ri dang / tshal dang nags tshal dang bcas pa me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni gser gyi me tog kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog /kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go/ /gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / lcug ma'i me tog dang / ta la dang / g+han d+ha par shi ka dang / sna ma dang / yu ti ka dang / ta ra na dang / kub bya ka'i me tog dag dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang yid mgu ba dang / yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i chu klu dang / 'bab chu dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri'i chab kyis yongs su gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i chab gser gyi bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo dang / mi'am ci'i tshogs dang / dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / klu dang / rig 'dzin dang / mi'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / lha'i 'byor pa gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyis 'khor

116
092-58b lo bskor ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do/ /de bzhin du grub pa bla na med pa chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' lags so/ /phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon sum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya ring bar phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag par rgyun du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'on te skal ba chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur te/ lha

117
092-59a dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sems can thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan zhing don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'gum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dus bgyis nas skal ba mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ phyir yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig le bgyis na/ thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis/ rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod bsgongs pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang sran ma ma shar bsres te bsgril la bsgongs nas/ mar dang bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi lhan du brdzis nas/ bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu shid ka ra

118
092-59b bI ra'i me sbar nas/ bsgongs pa re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyis te/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad tsam sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang yungs kar dang me tog ci rnyed pa dang bsres te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i dbus su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /'bras yos dang / yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas/ rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis/ lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po long shig ces stobs par bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod de blang bar bgyi'o/ /blangs pa tsam kho nas bcud kyis len du gyur nas/ nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /pags pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los sgyur ba drug khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ / don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par dbye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di/ nyin gcig bzhin sh+lo ka stong klog gam 'chang bar bgyid na/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma las brdzus te skyes nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /

119
092-60a mchod pa chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs pa de 'tshal na/ bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas/ yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa dang / mkhas pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas skye bo 'bum zas btsal bar sems na/ 'o ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ gnas gtsang ma bcom skyungs par shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas dkrug cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas/ 'o thug gi nang du bstsal lo/ /de nas char bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub ba dang / slongs mo pa rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o/ /ji tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang / snod de gang ba'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi

120
092-60b tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro/ /nga ro lha ltar mnyen cing snyan la dga' bar bgyid pa ma yin pa'i dbyangs su mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas/ de gnas mthon po bla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o/ /phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gang gA'i bye ma 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang / lha'i 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do/ /gang gi phyir yon spyangs nas/ skal ba dang mthun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang / gzhan du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis de la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag

121
092-61a bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /sgron shing dang arka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub gsum du bgyis na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub lngar bgyis na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma lags pa thams cad dang / mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub bdun du bgyis na rig sngags 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub thams cad du bgyis na/ brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo thams cad babs nas dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba nya nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la/ arka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar nas gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ / nga mnyes par byas kyis/ rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang / mchog sbyin te gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no/ /gter smra ba'am/ nor bsgyur bar smra ba'am/ zhing smra ba'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/ mi snang bar bya ba'am/ gsang sngags smra ba'am/ cho ga

122
092-61b zhib mo 'grub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /rgyal bo nyid dam/ blon po nyid dam/ yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug pa nyid dam/ grong rdal 'thob pa'am/ gos 'thob pa'am/ ba lang dang / rta dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lug 'thob pa'am/ nor 'thob pa'am/ 'bru 'thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/ mi snang bar bya ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa'am/ ting nge 'jin 'thob pa'am/ gzungs 'thob pa'am/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa dang ro langs bslangs pa'am/ rig 'dzin sgrub pa nyid dam/ ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa'am/ nags su 'jug pa'am/ ril rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams shing smras pa de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma ze ba'i dbus nas rdzus te pad+ma las skyes nas skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par dbye ba dang bcas pa/ cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o/ /de nas la du'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des kha zas la la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /de nas la du mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /shin tu dri zhim po'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas snod

123
092-62a lha'i la dus bkang nas dbul bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te/ khye'u de'i lag tu gtor ro/ /khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang khyod ci zhig don du gnyer/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang snod kyi la du khyer cig dang / 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no/ /rig sngags 'chang long shig / 'di ni khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba de blangs te/ khye'u la yang khyed kyis kho bo'i grogs gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /khye'u yis smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa'i grogs bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ gu gul dang / tsan+dan lhan cig bsres la mar dang yungs kar sbyar nas/ don yod lcags kyus lan bdun bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /arka'i shing gi me sbar ro/ /sbyin sreg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ bdag bkug pas mod la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /las thams cad bgyi'o/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis mchis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o/ /bgegs dang log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis la du de la reg par bgyis na/ nam mkha' la 'phur nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi rigs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa drug khrir 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /la du lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang

124
092-62b bskur te/ de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la stsal bar bgyi'o/ /longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi/ slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang / gtugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /la du la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i 'og tu gang du reg pa der yang gser bzang por 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ klu'i gnas su 'phangs na de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur te/ sgo na char mi 'bab pa/ bsgo ba bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do/ /ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char ches na bsgo ba bzhin/ ha cang char chen po 'gums par bgyid do/ /rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do/ /phug gi sgor la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ phug gi sgor bsnun na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa dang / sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na/ nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba thams cad sgren mor gyur na/ thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par

125
092-63a 'gyur ro/ /rma ma byung ba'i mi ro la/ dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa gnyis su la du stsal la/ gos dkar pos ro g.yogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na ci dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lo nongs pa dang / nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung dang / phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring ba'am tshe thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor bsgyur ba'i gtam mam/ zhing gi gtam mam/ mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/ /cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /mig sman 'grub pa dang ril bu 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / rigs ma dag pa dang / dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu thabs smra bar 'gyur ro/ /nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chab kyi khar stsal la la du blangs na ro 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na/ grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u dang bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur zhing / nor chen po 'du ba 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /

126
092-63b mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag par stsal na/ dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas/ nor chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khug ma'i nang du stsal te/ mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyis te/ ci tsam du bsrel ba de srid du mi gda' bar gyur nas/ gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gang na shing gcig pa'am/ 'bab chu gcig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/ chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur ba bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na/ ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar/ lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /

127
092-64a byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang de'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la/ lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/ /de nas a rka'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar la/ la du de me thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ mar dang yungs kar dang zho dang sbrang rtsi bsres la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /bdag tshim par byas so/ /bdag dga' bar gyur to/ /rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis rig sngags 'chang ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin 'dod pa smros shig dang / mchog sbyin no/ /rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o/ /me lha des yang thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs nas 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te/ chab nas 'byung ba bzhin no/ /lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do/ /'bar bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na/ skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid de/ me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsre lan cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /lus la bab na ci ltar tsan+dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na tshig par mi 'gyur ro/ /chab kyi nang du stsal na 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du dgos pa grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der dgos pa thams cad

128
092-64b grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang cho ga grub pa thams cad lung 'bog par 'gyur ro/ /du ba dang rlung dang me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod me 'bar ba/ /bla med 'bar bzang bsgrub 'tshal na/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang / /gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas/ /phyogs bcu khor khor yug gi/ / kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid/ /sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /'tshed pa bla na med pa 'grub/ /bcud kyi mchog de dam pa lags/ /nor sgyur smra ba bla na med/ /gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa/ /sgrub pa bla na med pa lags/ /ci ltar nyin bzhin mtshan gda' bas/ / nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs/ /lan cig dgos pa sgrub pa na/ /legs par las bgyis nor bu dang / /rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la/ /gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang / /gtsang mas spyad pas sgrub pa dang / /don yod chu dang me dang ni/ /me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi/ /me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste/ /de dag thams cad gcig spungs pa'i/ /yam sreg cho ga bla na med/ /tsan+dan dang ni seng ldeng dang / /pa tang ka ra bI ra dang / /arka sha mi smyug ma dag /sh-ir sha ka nA ki ra ka /'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing / / blag sha dang ni sna ma dang / /gan d+ha bar shi pad+ma yi/ /rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas/ /pad+ma dkar po ku mu da/ /ut+pal me tog lo ma rtsa/ /bI dza pU ra bil ba shing / /sin du ba ra tsam pa ka/ /dre ka pi tsu mar+d+ha dang / /sa ha ba la tsi tra ka /shing de kun ga bsdus pa yis/ /yam sreg shing gis las bgyis te/ yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi/ /bzang po'i zangs las srang gsum dang / /mtshal las gnyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang / /srang gcig tsan+dan dkar po nyid/ /srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste/ /de dag

129
092-65a bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang / /de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag /zhi ga dag ni bkang nas su/ /me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi/ /sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag legs gsal ba/ /gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi/ /gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa/ /dri zhim dri yis bsgos par bgyi/ /ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang / /me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod/ /bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang ba dang / /de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang / /me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod/ /dbul te 'o mas mdag ma dgum/ /'o mas zhi ga zhi bar bgyi/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhi ga de la mchod par bgyi'o/ /de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu'am/ dngul gyi sgrom bur zhig nas nor bu blangs te/ sgrom bu der gzhag par bgyi ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ci lta ba bzhin du/ 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu de bzhag na 'tsho ba dang / sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe/ thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/ me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /g.yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ ya lad dang go char gtams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas/ gcig po g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na/ de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /de nas g.yul 'gyed

130
