092-65b pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams pham par gyur nas/ phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dgra dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas/ lag pas nor bu bzung ste/ gnas kyi nang du zhugs na/ chab thams cad kyis phyir mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas klu thams cad mdun na mchis nas/ bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /lo tog dang rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /mnyen cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang mi bde ba yang chung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba ni/ nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po lags so/ /de nas don yod snang ba rnam par blta bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/ Rang gi gzugs su lta bar 'tshal na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /lus legs par bkrus te/ spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o/ /shing arka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /yungs kar dang / a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin

131
092-66a yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsams pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci ltar yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas mig sman bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang de/ legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ des zangs kyi za ma tog bgyis la de nas mig sman so'i bir dang yungs kar nyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ thab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i steng du u sh-i ra dang / yungs kar dang / tsan+dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /shing arka'i me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btags la ldong ros dang / ga pur dang gla rtsir bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni thams cad du mgul la legs par sbyar te/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de nas mig sman gyis byugs na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dbral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyur ro/ /nor 'du pa grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa'i dus sam/ bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na bgegs dang log 'dren dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams thams cad kyis

132
092-66b mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /bde ba sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyang mig mi 'dzums par lta bzhin du bdag nyid dam nor dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mig la byugs te dgon po chen por zhugs na/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gdug pa dang / sbrul dang / dbyig dug dang / sbrul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde legs su slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman bskus na/ smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas mig la byugs na/ thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na/ gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rigs zhag bzhi ba thams cad la mig la bskus na/ rims thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dug mi bzad par 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na dug ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la bskus na/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro/ /klad pa cher bro 'tshal ba yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyis zin pa la yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po khros pas gsod par 'os pa gang su yang rung ba khrid pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i thar bar 'gyur ro/ /nag po chen po'i mig la bskus na rang gi gzugs kyis dus su mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol

133
092-67a cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te/ mig mi 'dzums par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang / /'bru mang po rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus nas nyal na/ rmi lam bzang po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na/ rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /gi wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na dbang phyug rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo dang blon po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas/ thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig tu bskus na/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing las bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na/ gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/ /bkres pa'i mig la bskus te/ grong du zhugs nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te/ bsod snyoms

134
092-67b la mchis na/ kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang / yon phal po che 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sme ba dang / ling tog dang / rab rib dang / chu bur dang / mtshan mo 'thom pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / tshag po dang / mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang / mig sle bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i mig dag pa 'dab bzangs dang mtshungs pa 'dab bzangs kyi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang don grub pa yang thob nas/ dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / don yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o/ /grub pa kun gyi bla na med/ /don kun grub pas mod la ni/ / mkhas pa mchog tu dga' bar bgyid/ /dbang phyug skal ba phun sum tshogs/ /mod nyid kho nar thob 'gyur bar/ /the tsom du yang mi bgyi zhing / /yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so/ /gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang / /legs par bkrus pas las sgrub bo/ /sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba/ /'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/ /ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas/ /'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas/ /arka'i shing dang blag sha'i shing / /yam sreg dag gis me sbar la/ /sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas/ /'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang / / zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/ /yungs mar dag dang bsres pa yi/ /sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba tshang ba dang / de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ gu gul ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang / mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / de'i tshe bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gnas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro/ /gos sna tshogs

135
092-68a dang lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan phreng dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug gi 'byor pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la bskus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman gyis bskus na/ nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad yang 'khyil par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /mig sman 'dis mig la byugs na nyin par lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bdun pa/ mig sman 'dis mig la byugs nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/ lha gtso bo de dag mig mi 'dzums par lta bar bgyid la khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o/ /de nas ma mo dang gtso bo'i lha thams cad mdun du mchis nas/ mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur zhing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gi wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa yis/ /rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing / /lha dang lha min mchod pa dang / /sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang / /dbang du gyur pa dam pa dang / /mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang / /mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang / /mod la

136
092-68b phug tu 'jug pa dang / /nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang / /ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang / /thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang / /klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang / /de bzhin chu klung cher bsgral dang / /rdzu 'phrul grub dang skyes pa dang / /de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang / /nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid/ /sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/ /g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de/ /rtag tu dgra kun brlag par bgyid/ /gdon rigs kun kyang tshar gcod cing / /rigs rnams thams cad zlog par bgyid/ /sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing / /sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/ /dbang phyug stsol cing skal ba stsol/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyid/ /'thab pa 'thab mo rtsod pa dang / /'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ /bcing ba dang ni shing sgrog dang / /khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar rlog /rgyal po gdug pa khros pa yis/ /gsad par 'os pa sel bar bgyid/ /da lta 'di la rten pa na/ /mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing / /mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /'di ni kun du sdug pa dang / /gnas kun mchis par mchod par 'os/ /lus can shin tu snying du sdug /rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i/ /rtag tu snang chen dag tu 'gyur/ /dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni/ /rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang / /bud med kun dang de bzhin du/ /skyes pa khye'u dang bu mo yi/ /rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur/ /gi wang bla na med pa po/ /'di la gang dag rtag brten na/ /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste/ /mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod par bgyid/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /nyin dang mtshan du bsrung ba dang / /rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so/ /gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang / /klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang / /'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang / /grul bum mi min lto 'phye che/ /dri za lha min nyid dag dang / /nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te/ /de dag thams cad bsrung ba yi/ /ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu/ /rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur/ /gi wang grub pa dam pa po/ /de ltar stobs

137
092-69a dang ldan pa lags/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis/ /gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas/ /gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos te/ /gi wang legs par bsgrubs nas su/ /dmar po chen po nyid dag dang / /gur gum dag dang mnyam sbyar la/ /zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su/ /don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas/ /rgya dar gyis ni kha 'gum mo/ /de nas seng ldeng gi shing dang / arka'i shing gi yam shing gis me spar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / 'bras dang / til dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo yang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te/ snod kyi nang du stsal nas de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis na nam mkha' la 'phur nas/ rig sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing / skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /lo dgu khri dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas/ gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus na ci ltar nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i phug dang thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /thang gi gnas su zhugs nas/ thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ khyim dang gzhal

138
092-69b med khang ci lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ci ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus mtha' dag byugs te g.yul ngor/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na ya lad dang / go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa na btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang la blangs na de dag thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la bsgo ba de dag thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /khar 'chos nas/ gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dang nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la byugs na su reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las bgyis pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas/ bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mdzub mo g.yas pa la bskus nas ser ba dang sprin dang / 'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na grang ba dang rlung dang ser ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig khor khor yug tu zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /char ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha cang char ches pa gcod par 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mod la char pa mi 'bebs na de'i tshe lan lnga brdebs pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe/ klu thams cad la klad pa'i nad 'byung

139
092-70a bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te lan bdun bsnun na klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rigs phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/ bskus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims gyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/ rims zhag gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi ba'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na mod la nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sha bkra dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lba ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / shu ba mched pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lto na ba dang / skran dang / dmu chu dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na pa dang / snying na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / gzhang nad dang / tshad pa dang / gcin srib dang / gsud pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rtug skams la sros na 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ mchog mar gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa la byugs te/ mgo la thal mo brdabs na/ phug gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/ slar cung zad kyang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa gnyis la byugs te/ me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas lag pa nas bzung

140
092-70b ste/ rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su zhugs shig /rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes smra ba na/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/ glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brla gnyis la byugs na tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyad du 'gyur ro/ /byin pa gnyis la byugs na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro/ /mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na/ nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o/ /gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsrel nas ri sul dang sman gshong du zhugs nas skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang sman gshong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la/ bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lto la thig le bgyis na kha zas dang btung ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rtsib logs gnyis la byugs na/ ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgal tshigs la byugs

141
092-71a na ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang / stan thob par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba la byugs sam/ gnad dang gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na/ ji ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thob par 'gyur ro/ /mjug do la byugs na/ rta'i bzhon pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro/ /zhag bcu bzhi bgyis na mi'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ /ka la bing ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsal na bya rog lta bu dang / mo sham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /btson rar stsal ba dang / shing sgrog dang / lcags sgrog dang / gtan pa dang / khong sgril la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /'thor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'am tshes bcwa lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas gi wang gi ril bu dang spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o/ /khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /nub gsum du khrus bgyis na gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyi thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /gi wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis

142
092-71b na bu bzhin du pang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang / rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lus thog thag tu byugs na gsad par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon gyis phrog par mi 'gyur te/ dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /mda' 'phangs na lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /gi wang gi ril bu mgul du btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang ri dang / nags tshang tshing bgrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / gcan gzan gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po rdzi ba med pas pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te/ thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /byin pa g.yas pa la btags na dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gi wang gi ril bu khar bsrel la lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyis don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas mthon por 'dzegs te phyogs gang du bsams pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na mod la bkug par 'gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na yang gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum gyis mchi bar 'gyur te yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'am lag pa g.yon pa la gi wang gi ril bu btags na gang du reg par nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / shang ka shil dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang /

143
092-72a dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bya tshang du zhugs nas tshang mang gi sgor thal mo brdabs na 'tshed pa dang 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchis par 'gyur ro/ /spos 'tshong gi tshong khang du mchis na tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bad ba'i sgor thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ / bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na bu ram gyi khu ba dang / sha kha ra'i glegs bu thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid bskrogs par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bo'i sgor btab na bskrad par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na mtshon cha dang / go cha rnams rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor btab na phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / sems can gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /dung la byugs nas gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / byad dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor bus na yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyugs lhas su bus na 'o ma thams cad phrogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /ra lug gi lhas su bus na ra lug gi 'o ma phrogs par 'gyur te/ gar 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na thams cad sgren por gyur nas gos thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ /rdza rnga la byugs te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams

144
092-72b cad bcings pa dang gshig par 'gyur te/ tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer ram/ yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi ngas dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o/ / de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong bzhi ba dang / rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed thams cad brlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyid pa'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag cing / sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying gdungs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste/ arka'i shing dang / sha mi'i shing dang / shing 'o ma can nam/ ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar du bsres pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo / /de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad

145
092-73a pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gdug pa can dang / sbrul dang / dug mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgyar kho ra khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags/ nad kyis ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / 'khrug pa dang / skrod pa dang / mdangs gcod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / sdig pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang / shin tu smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshang tshing dang / myu gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchi ba'i reg pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ yul de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu na da ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar 'tsho ba dang / yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag

146
092-73b tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te/ yongs su skyong ba dang / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i don du nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bsrung ba dang / yid kyis brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang du blta bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang / dri chu skyo ma bgyis te

147
092-74a phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na mtshams chen po bcad par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyis na thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /btson ra na mchis pa'am/ phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus na ral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa dang / dug gis myos pa thams cad la bskus na gdug par mi 'gyur ro/ /me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di ni ma bsgrubs par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang / /shin tu bkra shis mchog dge la/ /legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgo/ /byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag /sems can kun la brtse ba dang / /snying rje dam pas brgyan pa dang / /don yod zhags pa'i rig sngags che/ /grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal/ /bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag /'grub par bgyid de som nyi med/ /'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag /de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na/ /lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyi/ /phyag na pad+ma rtag tu 'gyur/ /ci ltar gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la/ /bsod nams phung po khri phrag bskyed/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ /smyung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig /mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyid pa/ /dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/ / dge bsnyen pho mos de bzhin du/ /bde ba can du myur du mchi/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur ba'i/ /nyon mongs pa las thar bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub dag /mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod

148
092-74b kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na/ /rig sngags 'chang la de nyid 'grub/ /don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi/ /mdun du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi/ /gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu/ /tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis/ /gru bzhi lham par thig gdab bo/ /ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag /dbus nas ngos bzhir gshis su dbab/ /tsan+dan dkar pos bri ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dang / /'dab brgya gur gum gyis gtor zhing / /pad+ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu/ /ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni/ /spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi/ / yungs kar ldan pa gzhag par bgyi/ /a ga ru yi bdug pa dbul/ /bum pa gang bar dgod par bgyi/ /me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi/ /mchod yon snod kyang bzhi gzhag go/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pas/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi/ /legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang / /gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang / /dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su/ /dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi ba ni/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag /dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad/ /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ /mngon sum skyil mo krung bcas te/ /bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /bgrang phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi/ /mdzub mo dag ni mthe bo dag /brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi/ /yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag /ting 'dzin brtag pas lus snyoms par/ /legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta/ /tshig gzhan mi smra bzlas brjod bgyi/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ phyag rgya bcings nas sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i zhabs mthong ba tsam du bris la/ ci tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas so/ /lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags

149
092-75a pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dga' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu rab tu dga' bas spu zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du blta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngos g.yas pa nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mig sgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na/ rig sngags 'chang gis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /lus 'jam pa dang shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil pa dang mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro/ /mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / gnyer ma dang / skra skya bo spangs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci tsam du 'dug ce na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par bgyid do/ /lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la mchi ba'am/ mi gda' bar bgyi ba'am/ lha'i mig 'thob pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing la blta ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa'am/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa'am/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa'am/ gtsug lag smra ba'am/ gsang sngags smra ba'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ gter smra ba'am/ nor sgyur ba smra ba'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ phug tu 'jug pa'am/ klu'i gnas su 'jug pa'am/ zhing smra ba'am/ gnod sbyin dgug pa'am/ srin po dgug pa'am/ ro langs bslang

150
092-75b ba'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa'am/ ri la rgyu ba'am/ grong khyer du 'jug pa'am/ sman blta ba'i phyir 'jug pa'am/ ral gri rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal bo 'thob pa'am/ yul 'thob pa'am/ yul gyi bdag po nyid dam/ dpung chen po rab tu 'joms pa'am/ bskrad pa'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas/ des zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal te/ tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun na skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun du bzlas par bgyi'o/ /zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rig kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang / rlangs pa dang / dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas mig la byugs na nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang

151
092-76a du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi'am/ bcwa lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang / dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas/ tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa stong du 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du/ lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i gzhal med khang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spos chab des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas khrus bgyi'o/ /khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu thams

152
092-76b cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam mam sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bden pa'am mi bden pa'am yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa'am/ skal ba dang ldan pa'am skal ba dang mi ldan pa'am/ byung ba'am/ ma byung ba'am/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'jig rten thams cad so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba'am/ thams cad dbang du gyur nas gzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'tshal lam/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so ba bzhin du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ri dgas e na ya'i pags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung ngam 'greng ba dang drung na nor bzangs pus mo g.yas pa phab pa/ g.yon pa khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste/ ri'i steng gi pad+ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o/ /gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis na nyin zhag gcig mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/ /chab dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bas/ dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /snying rje chen pos gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o/ /gal

153
092-77a te 'di lta bu'i cho gas mi bgyid na/ bklags pa tsam gyi mod la yang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho gas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/ blta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu gzhag par 'tshal ba'am/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal po'am/ btsun mo'am/ gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/ des ci 'byor pa'i gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o/ /de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te gzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/ gru bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig gdab par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma'i phreng ba bgyi'o/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng gzhag par bgyi'o/ /me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o/ /spos chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bgyi'o/ /mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o/ /pog phor gyi snod lnga nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o/ /dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba'ang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung btsas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas/ phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi phyag

154
092-77b rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dngas chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na/ grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya rengs 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas pad+ma dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i zhags pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs te/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po brgyad pa/ des ci 'byor ba'i gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

155
092-78a phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la/ de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te gzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba legs par mdzes pa byas te/ li khris thig btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma bri/ pad+ma'i dbus su ril ba b+h+r-ing gar dang bgrang phreng bri/ me tog sna tshogs bkram la bum pa spos chus bkang la/ me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag /mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya zhing / pog phor lnga nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ /spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro/ / khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te yid kyis phyag byas la lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral ba'i gseb 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo / /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni/ dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhal ston par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni/ skya rengs shar ba'i

156
092-78b dus kyi tshe/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad+ma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /rgyal ba 'od dpag med legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do/ /gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa bskrun par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la/ tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chab kyis bkang ba gzhag par bya zhing / mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya'o/ me tog sna tshogs pa bkram zhing / tsan+dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o/ /dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / bdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ngo / /bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba pad+ma'i tshul du byas la/ bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / shar phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing / bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo / /rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur te/ ming brjod pas dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /gang

157
092-79a bsgo ba de byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher brjod par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum du bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo'i lha dang nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas/ klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ /zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la/ tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog dmar po bkram la/ bdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas bdug par bya zhing / mar gyi mar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o/ /mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar bya'o/ /ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing sgra grag par 'gyur la/ dmyal

158
092-79b ba pa'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing / bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni/ sa'i 'og gi sems can mun gnag snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthus mun gnag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing rga ba dang / 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing / tshe bskal par thub par 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ de nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing / mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par btags la/ kun tu ru dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gan d+ha ra sa dang / chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/ sha khar btab la/ legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi ba'i tshad du byas te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e ne ya'i pags pas bzhag pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad+ma thogs/ gnyis pa na zhags pa thogs/ gsum pa na gsal shing thogs pa/ bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa/ gdan pad+ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ g.yon du dri med

159
092-80a 'gro bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni khro bo'i rgyal po'o/ /gong du ni 'od dpag med do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs su bgos la tshes brgyad nas tshes bcwa lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing / tshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rig sngags kyi lha pus mo btsugs te gyen du blta ba bri bar bya'o/ /grwa bzhir dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha bri bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhi'i cha 'byes par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor khor yug tu pad+ma bri bar bya'o/ /grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba gzhag par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir dri dang gtor ma dang bum pa bkang ba gzhag go/ /dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mchod yon gyi snod brgyad gzhag go/ /me tog sna tshogs pa bkram par bya zhing / a ka ru dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs pas legs par brgyan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan la mchod par bya'o/ /ras kyi tshon skud sna lnga pa/ srid du khru bcu drug pa thor to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig thor to gcig tu mu tig gi chun kor btags te/ sbrul 'khyil pa bzhin du bskyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang mas g.yogs par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bcing ba byas la bdag bsrung ngo / /khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas la/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis brgyan par byas la/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ mi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srad bu'i steng du

160
092-80b gtor bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos shig /khyod kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma grub pas/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spos des dpag tshad drug tsam du khyab par byed do/ /gang la dri mnams pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / byad dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thamasacad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la zangs kyi gab tshe bzang po'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o/ /nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas te/ blang bar bya zhing dgos par bya'o/ /nyin re bzhin dus gsum du mchod par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag pa dang / sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad+ma'i snying po las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga

161
092-81a la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ rang nyid nor dang bcas/ dbyig dang bcas/ 'bru dang bcas/ bran pho dang bcas/ bran mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog rnying pa de bsdus la gla rtsi dang / pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / gur gum dang / spang spos dang / swa ma ka dang / spr-i ka dang / na la da dang / bo la dang / yungs kar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ril bu ni dug med par byed pa'i mchog /pad+ma zhes bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang dpal du byed nad thams cad sel ba dang rims nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do/ /btsog shu dang / 'bras dang / me dbal dang / rkang shu dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / de thams cad la ni bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsung ngo / /nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas na sdig pa sel to zhes thub pas gsungs so/ /tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do/ / thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud med rnams dga' ba dang / dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /byad 'joms shing dug dang / dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba dag kyang de bzhin no/ /zas za ba dang khrus byed pa na thig le'i byug pa rtag tu byas na/ de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar thar bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo / /klad pa'i nad mi bzad pa la ni byug par bya'o/ /mig na ba la ni mig sman gyi thur mas so/ /so na ba la ni khar mur ro/ /lto na ba la ni chu dron dang ngo / /rtsib logs na ba la ni mar dang byug go/ /yan lag dang nying lag na ba la ni bsku bar bya'o/ /dbang du bya ba ni lag mthil la bskubs so/ /nad tshabs che ba la ni sku mnye dang khrus bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni sna nas btang ba'i las bya'o/ /bdug pas ni

162
092-81b gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyas thebs pa la ni mtshog mar thig le bya'o/ /snying na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tsha bsres pa'o/ /khyim zhi bar bya la ni 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la ni ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ dri chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog phor bzhi bzhag ste/ a ga ru dang du ru skas bdug go/ /gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te brgya byin rang dang / lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na/ mi rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin dgug par 'dod na pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ brgya byin gyi ming nas brjod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing / dri chab kyag dbul lo/ /gu gul dang / mar dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shing arka'i me sbar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang brgya byin lha'i dbang po dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de de ni sems mi bzod do/ /tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug ste/ mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub par byed do/ /gu gul

163
092-82a la lan dgu bcu bzlas te/ khyab 'jug la bdug cing chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor gtor na/ khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to/ /hi ra N+ya ka shi bu la yang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na/ rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing / arka'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya bar sgra 'byung ngo / /de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pas gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ nag po chen po'i steng du gtor na khugs par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo 'bye bar 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa byed do/ /thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na mtshan mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so/ /mtshan mo longs spyod par gzhal med

164
092-82b khang thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang snying rje chen pos lhag par dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o/ /de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa dge bzhi ba rgyas pa drag shul spyod pa srung ba nad thams cad sel pa/ byang 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /khyim srung bar 'dod pas arga'i yam sreg shing dang / pad+ma dang / yungs mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ khyim chen po bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mu ge'i gnod pa dang / mi ngas dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i mi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang skyob pa dang sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg gi mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul dang / yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / yul gru dang / ri khrod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang / gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po dang / blon po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / yul gru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / ma he rnams dbang du 'gyuraro/ /shing a pa marga'i yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi

165
092-83a dang / mar bsres pa dang / me tog dkar po rnams las lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul gru stong 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang pad+ma'i sdong po'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo zad pa dang di nar brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /me tog ku mu da dang / pad+ma sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'dab mar bcas pa dang / yungs kar bsres te shing seng ldeng gi me sbar la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la smyung ba bgyi ste/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la gos dkar po bgos te tsan+dan dang pri yang ku'i shing dang / 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs kar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ nam phyed kyi dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas zong lnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du song la/ shing bil ba'i me spar te/ shing bil ba'i me tog dang mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o/ /gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o/ /yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dang rkang pa'i drung du snod bor nas btud de rig sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing dran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i

166
092-83b 'dab ma dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa rnams las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te/ chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na/ de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /ba ru ra'i shing gi me spar la til dang / 'bras sob dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang bcas pa dang / dbyig dang / gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'bras phub lan tshwa dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ rigs bzhi 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro/ /a ga ti'i shing gis me sbar la sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / arka'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ nyin re bzhin di na ra brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /pa la sha'i yam sreg shing dang 'bral yos las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ gser brgya phrag stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes bcwa lnga zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ chu klung chen po'i nang rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o/ /de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po zhig sbyin par byed de blangs la phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod par bya'o/ /tshes bcwa lnga zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas te/

167
092-84a nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas/ a pa mar ga'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / sra rtsi pog sreg pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ rang gi ming gis sbyin sreg stong byas na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing nad thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /shing arka dang / ti la dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na/ zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / yungs kar dang / tsan+dan dkar po bsres la sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rgyas pa dang mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes bcu bzhi la ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang / lan tshwa sna bdun bsres pa dang / shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing yungs mar la bsres pa drag shul spyod par bya'o/ /char mi 'bab pa'i tshe pad+ma dang tsan+dan dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na ji srid 'dod pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /thal ba de blangs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na char ha cang ches pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /sprin la mngon du phyogs te gtor na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi sde gnon pa ni til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /phug sgrub pa ni shing arka'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /arka'i lo ma dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu dang / rgya spos dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shing pa la sha'i me sbar te na le sham brgya

168
092-84b stong sbyin sreg byas na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog dang / kar ni kA ra'i me tog dang / ut+pal rnams mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing lus la 'od zer btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /a shwad thas yam sreg shing byas la/ shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / arka dang / tsan+dan dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang / mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na 'bras so ba dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bgyis te/ thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// //de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa byang bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya ste/ ras khru do gru bzhi lham pa kha tshar mchad pa skra med pa thag ran bzang ba/ shin tu dkar ba/ shin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka' thub can bsnyen gnas la gnas pa/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ zas dkar gsum za ba/ dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsi snod sar par bzhag ste/ pir sar pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhengs pa'am bzhugs pa'am skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ e ne ya'i pags pa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug pa zhal zhi ba/ spyan phye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/ zhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o/ /phyag

169
092-85a gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o/ /phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la mdzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste/ pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bar na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bya'o/ /phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o/ /phyag gcig na rtse gsum pa/ gnyis pa na pad+ma/ gsum pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i glegs bam/ bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa/ zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga pa dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pa na ril ba spyi blugs/ bdun pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod/ brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi snod thogs par bya zhing / 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa sku me tog sna tshogs kyis bkra bas mdzes par bya'o/ /ri po Ta la'i khang ba brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas la/ g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon logs na zla ba/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o/ /ri pad+ma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par byas shing / sdong po dang ldan pa/ mtshos mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyas gang zhing chu sa na ma ka ra dang / bzhad dang shang shang te'u dang / ngur pas brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i ri de'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan dang seng ge'i khri bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o/ /g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ / g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o/ /g.yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang nor bzangs pus mo btsugs par bya'o/ /pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus kyi gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa bzhi pa'i lag na mtshon

170
092-85b cha thogs pa ste/ zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / rtse gsum dang / pad+ma'o/ /pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung phyed bcas pa lus cung zad btud pa/ mgo bo'i steng g.yas g.yon du drang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o/ /de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon du rdo rje'i zom chen po/ lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang / lha'i tshogs dag bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang / ri'i bar du brgya byin dang tshangs pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa 'brel pa bya'o/ /lha mo dpal chen mo dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo bya'o/ /dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o/ /dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o/ /ri dang / pho nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral gcig ma'o/ /ri'i khor yug tu gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing / ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs dang / me tog gis brgyan cing / mtshe'u mdzes pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / seng ge dang / stag gis gang ba dang / klu'i phru gu dang / grul bum dag bya'o/ /g.yon du gsang ba chen po lnga bya'o/ /'og tu klu'i rgyal po chen po lnga bya'o/ /thams cad brag gi stan dang / lag na rin po che'i me tog gi phor pa thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs te/ lag na me tog dang / pog phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o/ /steng gi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang / shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa

171
