092-172a bya'o/ /stegs bu'i dbus kyi gnas par bar du lha dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / ral pa gcig pa dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa bya'o/ /stegs bu'i phyi rol du mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng ba dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba kun du bya'o/ /phreng ba'i bar dbus dang / grwa'i bar du lha mo brgyad dang 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ba san ti dang / dpal sgra dbyangs dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dung can ma dang / pus pa dan ti rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang rin po che'i snod thogs par bya'o/ /phyi rol thog thag tu phreng ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o/ /ga pur dang / gla rtsis mchod cing / dkyil 'khor kun du dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /dngul gyi snod bzhi cung peng gis bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/ /dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis dgang bar bya'o/ /dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu gzhag par bya'o/ /snod brgyad ro sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dgang bar bya'o/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /kha zas bza' ba dang / gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /dri sna tshogs dang / byug pas dngul gyi snod bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/ /dngul gyi pog phor brgyad tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / tu ru ska dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / sra rtsi pog dang / pog gis gang bar bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs pa sreg go/ /dngul dang / zangs dang / gser gyi me tog gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du gcal du dgram mo/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gtsal du dgram par bya

344
092-172b ste/ phreng ba rnams khor yug tu bskor nas bzhag ste/ de la yang me long legs par brgyan par byas nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma'i ge sar dang ze'u 'bru la shar du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / bya ba thams cad byas nas me long la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug par gyur nas 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod dbul bar bya ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ro/ / dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum dang / 'khor chen po'i dbus su me long gi dbus der 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ste/ me long gi dbus de nas rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do/ / rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/ /bdag la don yod pa'i me long la 'bebs pa'i de kho na nyid dam par gyur pa 'di thams cad yang dag par mthong ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa zhes bya ba yongs su dag pa nyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mtshungs pa med pa thob bo/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya grub bo/ /rig sngags 'chang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog gang 'dod pa smros shig /de thams cad sbyin par bya'o zhes so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchog gang don du gnyer ba de blangs nas thams cad 'phral nyid du sbyin par byed do/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa der/ kun nas 'ongs pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / btsun mo'i 'khor du kun 'ongs pa dang / bsod

345
092-173a nams dang ldan pa'am/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa'am/ yongs su dag pa'am/ lta ba ngan pa'am/ gzhan dmyal ba ba'i sems can gti mug gi mun pa lhud ba/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad la'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus de la ston par byed/ thams cad du smra bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed/ thams cad du rang gi las la dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de thams cad ston par byed do/ /rig sngags kyis chom rkun dang / gdol pa dang / rig sngags spong zhing nyams par byed pa dang / rig sngags sun 'byin par byed pa dang / rig sngags la ma dad cing gus pas mi nyan pa de'i mi mthong ba ni ma gtogs te/ gzhan du na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar mthong ngo / /de nas sems can de rnams gang 'dod pa'i don yid la byed pa 'jug ste/ 'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten las 'das pa de thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru rang rang gi 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mthong bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong ngo / /po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal yas khang rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal yas khang na lha dang klus yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo / /gzhan ji ltar da ltar gyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'am/ lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa'am/ nad dang / 'chi ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / g.yul dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / rgyal ba'am/ 'pham pa'am/ rlag pa'am/ ma brlags pa'am/ yams dang / char ches pa'am/ dus ma yin pa'i

346
092-173b char ram/ char med pa'am/ rlung ngam/ sad dam/ tshangs pa yang rung ste de dag thams cad mthong ngo / /nor dang ldan pa'am/ nyams pa'am/ 'phel ba'am/ lo thog gam/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'phel ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad mthong ngo / /chom rkun dang / rkun po dang / dug dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa'am/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa de thams cad mthong ngo / nor chen po'am/ nor med pa de thams cad mthong ngo / /'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mthong ngo / /bu thob pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul dang / ljongs thob pa dang / bud med thob pa de thams cad mthong ste/ 'di la dogs pa dang / yid gnyis dang / the tsom bskyed par mi bya zhing / mchog tu dad pa dang gus pas shin tu 'bad de cho ga 'di bsgyur bar bya'o/ / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo'i nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / ras ris shin tu zab pa/ shin tu gting dpag dka' zhing / shin tu rgya che la/ shin tu sgrub dka' ba dang / dkyil 'khor mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / ras ris mang po yongs su bsgrags pa rnams ni rab rib dang bral bar mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa zab pa lta bu/ lhun po chen po dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ rdul phra rab lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ tshad med pa/ bskal pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar bya ba med pa'i bskal pa'i tshad

347
092-174a ma dang / bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / lha'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / klu'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / sems can gyi tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan la snang ba'i tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la kun du snang ba'i tshad ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshad ma dang / bdud kyi yul gyi tshad ma rnams kyis thog mar dmigs pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bar du yang dmigs pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das bar du yang dmigs pa ma lags so/ tha mar yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/ sgrub thabs kyi cho gas bsgrub par bya ba ni du zhig lags/ gsang sngags ni du zhig /phyag rgya ni du zhig /dkyil 'khor ni du zhig /bri bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni du zhig lag pa'i phyag rgya ni du zhig /bdug pa'i sbyor ba ni du zhig /mig sman ni du zhig /ril bu ni du zhig /bdug pa ni du zhig /ras ris ni du zhig /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig /snying po ni du zhig /nye ba'i snying po ni du zhig /khro bo'i gsang sngags ni du zhig /drag po ni du zhig / zhi ba ni du zhig /yi ge gcig pa ni du zhig /yi ge gnyis pa ni du zhig /yi ge gsum pa ni du zhig /yi ge bzhi pa ni du zhig /yi ge lnga pa ni du zhig /yi ge drug pa ni du zhig /yi ge bdun pa ni du zhig /yi ge brgyad pa ni du zhig /yi ge dgu pa ni du zhig /yi ge bcu pa ni du zhig lags/ smyung bar gnas pa ci ltar lags/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo ni ci ltar/ khrus kyi cho ga ni ci ltar/ gos bgo ba ni ci ltar/ phyogs bcing ba ni ci ltar/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni ci ltar/ gtsug tor bcing ba ni ci ltar/ bdag srung ba ni ci ltar/ gzhan srung ba ni ci ltar/ grogs srung ba ni ci ltar/ slob ma srung ba ni ci ltar/ rab tu 'jug pa ni ci ltar/ phyag bya ba ni ci ltar/ bskor ba bya ba ni ci ltar/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil 'bul ba ni ci ltar/ gtor ma 'bul ba ni ci ltar/ me tog 'bul ba ni ci ltar/ bdug pa ni ci ltar/ dri ni ci ltar/ mar me ni ci ltar/

348
092-174b nye reg ni ci ltar/ lha bshos ni ci ltar/ thams cad du spyan drang ba ni ci ltar/ snyan gsan dbab pa ni ci ltar/ rmi lam bskul ba ni ci ltar/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni ci ltar lags/ zhi ba can ni du zhig lags/ rgyas pa can ni du zhig /mngon spyod can ni du zhig /zhags pa ni du zhig /rdo rje ni du zhig /pad+ma ni du zhig /gshegs su gsol ba ni du zhig /nye bar 'pho bar byed pa'i bya ba ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba dang / rgyu mtshan ci 'dra ba dang / kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba ni mi shes so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag las sgrub pa'i cho ga du zhig gi rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ dngos grub du zhig rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ ci ltar sems can bla na med par 'gyur bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la bdag 'khrugs par gyur cing / bdag la spobs pa med do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes par mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de dag bdag la gsung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tshom mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi the tshom bcad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas zhu ba yongs su zhus par gyur pa gsan nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di dri ba yongs su dris pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /lag na rdo rje khyod la yongs su 'dri bar byed pa'i spobs pa skyes pa ni lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir don gyi ched yongs su zhus pa'i phyir dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du yongs su zhus pa'i phyir dang / lag na rdo rje 'di+i ni mchog tu rmad du byung bas te/ phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo / /lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga /rgya mtsho chen po

349
092-175a dug can pa dang / zab bar mtshungs pas te/ 'di ni gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho chen po thigs pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar nus kyi/ lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so/ /lag na rdo rje ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rdul phra rab tu gtor ba'i grangs kyis mthar thug par bya bar nus shing / slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu gnas par 'dod pas rang gi gnas su rab tu bzhag par nus kyi don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so/ /de ltar rgya che ba/ de ltar gting dpag dka' ba/ de ltar zab pa ste/ lag na rdo rje/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa dang / gting dpag par mi nus so/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i ched 'dzin par ni mi nus so/ / lag na rdo rje sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de dang / snying po dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de dang / zhags pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs sna tshogs pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su mthong bar byed de/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i ched dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du mnyam par 'gro ba ste/ gang du chu dang 'o ma mnyam pas mnyam pa bzhin no/ /thams cad du mnyam pas byams pa dang snying rje chen po rgyas par byed do/ /don yod pa'i zhags pas 'gugs par byed la sgrol bar byed do/ /'chi ba med pa'i thad rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'jog par byed do/ /dman pa dang / mchog dang / bar ma dang / rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa rnams thams cad du mnyam par dran par

350
092-175b byed cing ming smos pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed cing / sems can thams cad bla na med par byed la dub pa dang / ngal ba dang / yid la gcags par 'gyur ba med do/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / yi dgas dang / nags dang / gshin rje'i gnas ji srid du sa 'og gi nang du son pa rnams dang / srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / ji srid du 'og min gyi srid pa'i bar du gcig tu sems bskyed pas yongs su rgyug go/ /lha dang / klu dang bcas pa nas ji srid dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams bla na med par byed do/ /dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni mun pas mdongs pa thams cad sel bar byed de/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du mnyam par snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du snying rje chen pos kun du snang bar byed cing thams cad la thams cad du mnyam par gnas te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'chi ba rnams thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do/ /skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su grol bar byed do/ /mtho ris la gzhol ba la sogs pa'i lam thams cad du 'god par byed do/ /de ltar na snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen pos thams cad du mnyam par rjes su 'gro ste/ thams cad du mnyam par mchog tu byed cing / thams cad du mnyam par byang chub kyi lam la rab tu 'god par byed do/ /thams cad du mnyam par skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni/ brtan pa dang / go cha dang / spro ba chen pos rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du zhugs pa'o/ /lag

351
092-176a na rdo rje 'di ni thabs cig tu 'jug pa chen po ste/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa chen po'i lam las so sor ldog par byed pa'o/ /bde ba nas bde bar gshegs pa'i lam du 'god par byed pa'o/ /rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med la bsam pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ / sems kyis yid la gcags par 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan bsngags pa chen po 'di thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa ni ched du brjod par gyur to/ /e ma mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug /e ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma/ /khyod kyi ming gi yon tan bskyed pas/ /ngan 'gro thams cad grol bar byed do/ /phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi bla ma mgon po/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi yab chen po/ 'di ni 'jig rten sgrol bar byed pa'i mgon po/ thub pa nyin mo'i nyi ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de lta bur lag na rdo rje ji ltar smra bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug can song la/ mngon par phyag 'tshal nas yongs su zhus shig /mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig gis cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du snying po dang / de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin de rnams ston par byed do/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur zhing lung 'bogs par byed do/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes zab mo zab pa rtogs shing khong du chud de seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro zhing / rdo rje bskor bar byed bzhin pas zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog bzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum

352
092-176b bskor ba byas te/ zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog phul te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shin tu rmongs pa dang ldan pa dran pa yongs su nyams pa blo'i dpa' zhum pa ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags dang phyag rgya mang po dang / ras ris kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rgyas pa 'di dang de dag mi shes so/ /sngon ma ni du zhig /bar ma ni du zhig /tha ma ni du zhig /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig /snying po ni du zhig /nye ba'i snying po ni du zhig /ji srid du yi ge bcu pa'i bar gyi gsang sngags ni du zhig /dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / ras ris ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs dbye bar gsol zhes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag na rdo rje la brtse ba'i don du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du nam mkha'i dbyings su gtor ro/ /gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi mtshams su 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas so/ /dpag tshad lnga brgyar khyab cing sa gzhi las gyen du 'phags pa nyid kyi ji srid 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du gnas te/ bai DUr+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu la 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi dril bu dpyangs pa'i ba dan bcings pas mdzes shing 'bar bar yongs su gyur to/ /'khor lo'i rnam pa legs par yongs su 'khor ba ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i kun tu snang ba legs par yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mchod sdong rnam par mdzes par shin tu gnas pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs pas spras pa dga' bar bya ba/ yid kyi shing rta rab tu tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba mthong ba lha dang / lha ma yin gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / rjed par bya bar 'os pa dang / drang srong rnams kyis bstod par 'os pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par 'os pa ste/ thams cad du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog gi ge ser la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun

353
092-177a gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pa la/ gdugs kun nas yongs su 'khor ba'i lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang / lha dang / klu dang / chus byung dang / lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / gos dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan cing / dar dpyangs dang / ba dan dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed par gyur te/ lha rdzas sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab par gyur cing lha'i dri za'i glu dbyangs yang dag par len cing / rnga dang / pheg rdob rnams kyis mchod pa'i don du rol mo byed par gyur to/ /po Ta la'i ri bor gzhal med khang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ru/ ca co'i sgra chen po sgrogs par gyur to/ /po Ta la kar gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa rnams kyang sems tshim pa thob cing / rmad du byung ba thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad mchog tu ya mtshan pa dang ldan zhing / rmad du byung ba thob ste/ sems tshim pa skyes la ngo mtshar ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin du kun du gnas par gyur to/ /zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / lha dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang /

354
092-177b nag po chen po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan gyi lha rnams dang / gzhon nu'i lha rnams gdugs kyi yub nas bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /lha'i gzhal med khang chen po lha'i rnam par sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod pa byed do/ /gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khor yug gi nang du dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i bus yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed do/ /sa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za gang yin pa rnams dang / sa gzhi'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / nags kyi lha dang / lo thog gi lha dang / sman gyi lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad sa'i mthil gyi gzhal yas khang de sbyong bar byed par gyur te/ dri sna tshogs pa'i chus chag chag 'debs shing / dri sna tshogs pa'i phye mas byug par byed/ me tog sna tshogs gcal du 'grems shing / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas sa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par brgyan par gyur to/ / de ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i go skabs rgya chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yangs pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ shin tu ya mtshan pa thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ 'di ltar sems par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstan pa ni shin tu ya mtshan no/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la slar yang gsol ba btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar mdzod cig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje dogs pa bsal

355
092-178a ba dang / the tshom gcod pa la rjes su bzung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa lus 'od zer 'bar bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i gsang ba sgyu ma lta bu'i snying po dang phyag rgya dang / kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /sgrub pa bla zhing bklags pas grub pa dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas phyag gser gyi kha dog can/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis yang dag par brgyan pa brkyang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cing sems can dag pa chen po legs so legs so/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug /da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas phyogs bcur kun du bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kun du bltas te/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi nor bu don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsungs so/ /don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma gtsug gtor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang po ni/ dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor don yod pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag

356
092-178b 'tshal lo/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi snying po'i dam tshig rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros chen po 'phags pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+mo'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 'chang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs pa 'di/ bdag gis da ltar 'khor chen po la bshad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM pad+moSh+NI Sha ba ra da hUM/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka /si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma ha staM/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/ e h+ye hi/ bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta/ e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA bi ma la/ pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ra dza sA d+ha ya hUM hUM/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+moSh+NI Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba A ba ra Na ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra na ma skr-i te/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba kilpi Sha ha ra/ hA hA hA hA/ hI hI hI hI/ hU hU hU hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma ba Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/

357
092-179a d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA pad+ma dz+wa la d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pad+tsa pA sa d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI rA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bA na so ma A di t+ya ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma/ in+d+ra/ r-i Shi ga Na/ de ba ga Na/ a b+h+ya rtsi ta/ tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa na ta ku mA ra/ ru tra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha na da/ de ba r-i Shi/ nA ya ka /ba hu/ bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma daN+Da d+ha ra/ pA sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi/ d+hu ru d+hu ru d+hu/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA ba ra dA ya ka /sa man+ta maN+Da la/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsha/ b+ha ga bA na Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ma sarba b+ha yaM b+h+yaH/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaH/ sarba gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaH/ sarba bya d+hi b+h+yaH/ bad+d+ha ban+d+ha na tA Da Na rdza na/ rA dza/ tsau ra/ ta ska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka /bi Sha/ sha s+t+ra/ pa ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ra ya ba la/ bo d+h+yaM ga /tsa tur+ya sa t+ya saM pra kA sha ka /ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mon+d+ha ka ra bid+ha ma na/ ShaT bA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka /mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Thi Thi Thi Thi/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ Thu Thu Thu Thu/ e ne ya tsarma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra e h+ye hi/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Na/ saM b+hany+dza ka/ ma hA sid+d+hi swa ra/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha pi Sha ya/ ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta rat+na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta ma ku Ta ma had+b+huHka ma lA laM kr-i ta/ ka ra ta la/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha pra kam+pa/ ba hu sa twa san+ta ti/ pa ri pA tsa ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka /sarba byA d+hi pra mo tsa ka /sarba A shA pa ri pU ra kaHsarba sa twa/ sa mA shwA sa ka /oM pad+mo Sh+NI Sha pA sha hr-i da ya maN+Da la na ma stu te swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

358
092-179b khams kyis gzhi cher g.yos par gyur te/ ri dang / nags dang / dgon par bcas pa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /kun nas sa'i mthil 'di yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi pad+ma'i gdan kun nas bting bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma'i lte ba'i gnas na pad+ma chen po gyen du 'phags pa 'dab ma stong ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ bai DUr+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi snying po dang / mu tig dmar po'i ze 'bru dang / lha'i mu tig chen po'i ge sar dang gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed pas te/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog tu snang bzhin pas 'bar zhing / rnam par gsal ba lhang nge'o/ /phyogs bcu kun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun du snang bar byed do/ /lha'i gnas dang / klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas dang / dri za'i gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kun du snang bar byed do/ /rab tu tshim par byed do/ /yang dag par skul bar byed do/ /yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po rnams kun du snang zhing reg pas dmyal ba chen po de rnams kyang pad+ma can chen por skyes par gyur to/ /sems can dmyal ba de rnams kyang kun nas snang zhing reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad yongs su grol te/ bsams pa tsam gyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skyes shing / lha'i lus la rgyan lhab lhub dang / gos dang / spud pas rnam par brgyan cing / skye ba nas skye ba ru skye ba dran par skyes so/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kun nas snang bas/ ri dgas dang / bya de dag thams cad kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas las yongs su grol te/ mtho ris su rna rgyan dri ma med cing g.yo ba 'dzin par skyes so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun du sems can thams cad kun du snang zhing reg pa de rnams thams cad sa chen po brgyad pa la rab tu gnas par gyur to/ /des kyang 'khor chen por kun du 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de

359
092-180a rnams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod par gyur to/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor chen po'i snying po gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub so sor thob par gyur to/ / klu'i rgyal po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan so sor snang bar gyur to/ /lha'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang 'od 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang du gnas par gyur to/ /'byung po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to/ /lha ma yin gyi 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rdo rje'i go cha dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi ya lad bgos par gyur te/ nam mkha' lding gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad rdo rje mchu rtse mo chen po'i stobs kyi shugs rjes su thob par gyur to/ /mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par gyur to/ /dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sku las nyi ma'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer chen po rnam par spros te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar rjes su zhugs so/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar zhugs ma thag tu gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ltos shig /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lags so/ /sems dpa' dag pa bdag gis mthong lags so/ /sems dpa' chen po dag pa 'di'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa pad+ma'i dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu zab pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ rmad du

360
092-180b byung ba chen po dngos grub mchog sgrub par byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das mtha' dag rgyas par gsungs shig /gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa rnam par 'joms pa'i don dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba gtsug tor thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ dri ma dang / rnyog ma thams cad sel bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ sdig pa dang / ma rungs pa'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ /bdud la sogs pa'i ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dug /mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mche ba'i dug dang / seng ge dang / rgyal po dang / gnod sbyin rnams zlog par byed pa/ dug dang / byad stems dang / g.yeng byed dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid gces pa rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i sgrub pa bla na med pa bklags pas grub pa 'di rjes su zung shig /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bzhin 'dzum cing / gdong khro gnyer dang bral bas rdo rje bskor bar byed bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dam par gyur pa gsang ba pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams du zhig lags/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod

361
092-181a sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab par rig nas/ phyag g.yas pas lte ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'i rnam pa la reg go/ /reg ma thag tu phyag g.yas pa'i pad+ma la/ snying po'i rig sngags de yang pad+ma'i steng du ste/ rang gi ngo bo gzhal med khang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba don yod pa'i gzugs spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu gser gyi cod pan can/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis spud pa/ zla ba phyed pas rnam par mdzes pa/ zhags pa 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor 'chang ba dang / nor bu'i dbyug pa 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'chang ba/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ 'od zer 'bar bas yang dag par brgyan pa/ gos rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs dang / spyan nyi ma dang zla bas lhag par 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+ma rnams kyi steng na mdzes bzhin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs mnyes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa/ lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa/ klu thams cad kyis rjes su gzung bar 'os pa/ drang srong thams cad kyis dga' bar 'os pa/ lha mi yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis rjes su 'gro bar 'os pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bla mar 'os pa mthong ste/ de lta bu'i snang ba rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ de kho na nyid gces pa'i snying por gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ snying po gsang ba/ don yod pa'i pad+ma dri ma med pa'i gtsug tor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to/ /ting nge 'dzin so sor thob pa gang gis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du chud par gyur to/ /de rnams thams cad rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis zhabs dag gi rjes la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan

362
092-181b ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags 'di smras so/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da ya pad+moSh+NI Sha ku mA ra be Sha d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ A be sha ya/ sarba a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya hr-i da ya/ sarba sid+d+hi a mo g+ha pra yats+tsha pad+ma/ pad+ma hU~M hU~M na ma stu te swA hA/ 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i snying po bklags pas grub pa'i sgrub thabs so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+mo Sh+NI She shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ sa man+tA ya sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ a mo g+ha pad+moSh+NI Sha sa ma ya A kar+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba karma sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM hUM/ ma hA pad+moSh+NI Sha b+hu dze swA hA/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags so/ /oM a hA tsan+Da pad+me shwa ra bi bi d+ha rU pa/ bi ka Ta/ pad+ma daMSh+Da ke rA la b+hI Sha Na/ bAk+t+ra sarba duSh+Ta hr-i da yaM/ khA da ya/ big+ha nAM/ pad+ma d+h+ri ka /tsi Ti/ dri Ti hUM swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i rigs kyi snying po'o/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i las rnams so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+moSh+NI Sha pad+ma pA sha kro d+ha ka /mo ya karma pra be sha ya ma hA bA shu pa ti/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA tsaN+Da be ga /a mo g+ha ku las ma ya/ pad+me hUM hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams 'gyur te/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pas gcig tu mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dpag med dang mnyam pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ngo/ /pad+ma'i phyag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi phyag gis 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i gtsug tor bcings pa nyid kyis spyi bo'i gtsug tu mngon par dbang bskur na/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis don yod par dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po rgyas par gyur pa thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang / bla na med

363
092-182a pa'i dpal thob bo/ /rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du rigs kyi rgyal po legs par grub par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub bzang po rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do/ /pad+ma'i phyag gis rjes su 'jug cing / don yod pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub ste/ bklags pas grub pa 'di la the tshom med do/ /pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rigs kyi dngos grub dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du bklags nas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs thun mong ba thams cad du rgyal po'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi rig pas lha'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i tshogs rnams kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu yang gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams su gyur pa dang / dri za rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang / dbang phyug tu rtag tu 'gyur te the tshom med do/ /nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / thams cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar du rigs kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang drag po de yid la sems pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'phral du ri rab ltung bar byed cing / khor yug gi ri rnam par 'thor bar byed do/ /rgya mtsho chen po kun nas dkrug cing / rgya mtsho chen po nye bar skye bar byed do/ /kun du gsal bar byed do/ /klu'i gnas thams cad du klu'i gnas 'bar bar yang byed do/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis steng du bdug par byed do/ /gnod sbyin

364
092-182b dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gza' dang / brjed byed dang / mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang ba thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig la gnas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya gnas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/ /de rnams thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing gnas par byed do/ /'ga' zhig gang du 'gro ba'am 'dug pa de la dbang po dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / gzhon nu dang / sde dpon dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dus rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang bar byed do/ /the tshom med do/ /khros pa'i las rnams sam/ de bzhin du drag po'i las rnams thams cad kyang hUM yig tsam gyis de la dngos grub mthong ngo / /phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / sems can ma rungs pa shin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang 'jigs pa dang / rnam par 'gras pa'i skye bo dang / sdig pa de rnams thams cad hUM yig gis mchog tu gzir ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /sdang ba dang / ngan sems pa'i sems can dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la 'khon pa thams cad drag po'i hUM yig bzlas pa tsam gyis skad cig la bsreg ste/ dper na me yis phye ma leb bzhin no/ /las gzhan stong phrag rnams dang / las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la/ las thams cad 'grub bo/ /de nas don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor dran pa tsam gyis/ bya ba thams cad ni gnyis su 'gyur te/ ji ltar gang cung zad yid la byed pas las byed do/ /dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du/ ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do// //

365
092-183a 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcwa lnga pa/ de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ o~M zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad do/ /gsang sngags o~M zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags kyi yi ge gcig pa'o/ /o~M b+hu yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /o~M pad+me gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang

366
092-183b sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/ /o~M pad+ma hrI/ gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum pa bzlas brjod byas nas bzhi ba la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/ rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang tshur shog /khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go/ /mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ phyir zhing nam yang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /o~M pad+ma b+hu dze/ gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad/ sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe brjes na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyed par 'gyur

367
092-184a zhing nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad gyis shig /yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro/ /o~M pad+ma a ba lo ki te/ gzungs sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang ba mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston par mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog /las byas pa ni shin tu yongs su zad cing khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon dang / rigs kyi spyi ni khong du chud/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig /o~M pad+ma dz+wa la hu~M d+h-ika/ yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral bdag pa zhes bya

368
092-184b ba thob par 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba sna tshogs dag 'bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i pad+ma 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi mdog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin no/ /'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par sprul pa grub kyis rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig /o~M a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+me/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che chen po shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus

369
092-185a yongs su dag par rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bo ston cing / rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa dga' ba la zhugs so/ /rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten rnam par blta bar tshur shog /der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig /o~M pad+ma lo tsa ni hu ru hU~M/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi ge dgu po 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis ngal zhing sbyang ba'i las legs par bsgrub pa byas so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang mdo sde lung bcas pa sgrub pa 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad grub pa yin no/ /o~M pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ma le hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur nas sa bcu pa la gnas

370
092-185b par 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te the tshom mi bya'o/ /gsang sngags bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub par yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa/ gtsang ma/ gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang snying rje skyes pa/ bden pa smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rab tu 'dzum la lag na rdo rje skor bzhin du mgo btud nas smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po rgyal po 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po re re po 'di dag ni bzlas brjod tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod bsgrub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ nyin zhag gcig bsnyen gnas la gnas shing zas bslangs pa dang / 'bras bu dang / ldum bu dang / rtsa ba bza' ba zos nas rig sngags 'di bsgrubs na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje nyin zhag gcig smyung ba la gnas shing nyin zhag gcig tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ba

371
092-186a ni lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang dge sbyong mgo bregs pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la skad cig thang cig yud tsam mam/ dus tshigs gcig gam/ dus tshigs gnyis sam/ dus tshigs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po khro bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par phye ba gzungs sngags chen po'i snying po bcu po 'di lan cig dran nam/ klog gam/ ming gzung ba'ang dran nam/ lag na rdo rje dus tshigs gcig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang de'i mtshams med pa byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba/ bskal par gnas pa yang de yis thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los sgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten rnam par gzigs par skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug tu rtsa gnyis su nor bu 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cur 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

372
092-186b dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag gsum cu rtsa gsum gyi nang du brgya byin nyid byed par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod par 'gyur te nams kyang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje de ltar rig sngags lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje gal te gang zhig zhag gcig gam/ lan cig smyung ba la gnas te bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byas na lag na rdo rje de ni tshe 'di nyid la mi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib ba dang bral nas don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ / don yod pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /pad+ma gsal ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa'i dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin 'thob bo/ / pad+ma gtsug tor mthar phyin pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba grub pa 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod

373
092-187a pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang sngags grub pa'i cho ga ste/ sgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// //de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang kun gyis 'grub pa/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya yis nyon cig /lag na rdo rje gsang sngags rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can la dmigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung ba ngan song gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams kyi gnas de dag med de/ de ltar sems can thams cad sgrub pa dge ba'i rtse ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/

374
092-187b lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis dug dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /lan bzhi brjod pa tsam gyis dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /lan lnga brjod pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan drug brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi nad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re zhing gzhan mi smra bar lan bdun dran par bya'o/ /sems can gang la la sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba shi ba dang / dge slong gang la la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral ba dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la gus par ma byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma gtsang ma blangs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ dur khrod dam/ ro bsregs pa'am/ 'chad pa der bye ma gtor bar bya'o/ /gang dang gang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod sar bye ma gtor ma thag tu de dang der bye ma bab pa'i sems can dmyal ba'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha zar skyes pa'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i skye gnas su skyes na de de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur zhing nams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na gro ga la bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang pa gnyis pa'am/ rkang pa bzhi pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad grib ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing thams cad mtho ris su gzhol

375
092-188a bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na ri dgas dang / bya dang / tha na ldang sko ska dang / ne'u le dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / khyi dang / rus sbal dang / lag 'gro dang / dkyil 'khor de la grib ma bab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /dung la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon por bus na sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ri dgas dang / bya dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum bzung ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur la/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdugs na gang dag der dri mnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos gos la bdugs nas gang gi lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /lus la bab pa tsam gyis dri ma dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /gos bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyis gos de bdugs

376
092-188b nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na dge slong thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'os par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na nor chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khar bdugs nas gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mod la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed do/ /gu gul dang bsres nas lha chen po'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bya ba pa byas na mod nyid la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dug nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed do/ /bo la dang / tsan+dan dang / gu gul bsres nas sred med kyi bu'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan nyi shu gcig lus kyi yan lag la bya ba pa byas na sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed la/ dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed do/ /yungs kar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi bya ba pa byas na/ tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug la mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /pad+ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs la bdugs na nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing mchog dang / bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /nA ga puSh+pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang / bsres pa'i bdug pa klu'i mtshor bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas klu'i mtshor gtor la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing dran

377
092-189a par byas na klu dang / klu mo dang / klu'i bu pho dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la 'dud cing gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum sbyar na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'ang 'ong ngo / /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo yang 'ong zhing thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur nas 'dug go/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dgug par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi nang du mi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas bdugs la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dran na gnod sbyin dang srin po dag rgyug cing 'ong la/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la btud nas rje btsun bka' stsol cig ces zer ba dang / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis de bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas na bsgo ba thams cad byed la mngag pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug go/ /thod pa sbyar ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas thod pa bkang ba'i bdug pas bdugs na 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ las byed par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas btsag gis gnod sbyin mo bris la/ ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas par phyes pa bad+ma'i ri mo bri zhing phye'i gtor ma pad+ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la bdug pa 'dis bdug cing / gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo la brdeg pa byas na gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug cing / lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la slar yang 'ong ste/ don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ma'am chung ma'am/ sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas na bu la sdug pa longs spyod dang / gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su skyong bar byed do/ /gal te

378
092-189b sring mor byas na rnam thos la 'gran par 'gyur ro/ /gal te chung mar byas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spyod dag la rtser 'jug par byed do/ /lha mo dpal la bdugs la gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs na lha mo chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / nor gyi phung po chen po 'bul bar byed de/ nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na gser srang stong sbyin par byed do/ / nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na gser gyi dong tse stong sbyin par byed do/ /tshal gseb tu bdugs na tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing rdzas dang / sman thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug go/ /ri rnams la bdugs na rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnams su bdugs na grong khyer kun du yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'brog tu bdugs na rkun mo dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / dred dang / dom gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing ri dgas gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad la bdugs na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa tsan+dan gyi bdug pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// // de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags bsgrubs pa ni nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po rnam

379
092-190a par 'phel lo/ /lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur gyis rig sngags 'chang gis the tshom mi bya'o/ /dpral ba'i steng du thig le byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal shing shel ltar dag pa mdog dkar ba dri zhim pa dang / glang po che'i bya ba dang / dpral ba dang / ba lang gi gnas ltar skyon med cing mnyam par mthun la shin tu ngul ba/ ded dpon gcig pu'i nor bur gyur cing gsang sngags 'bum bzlas pas legs par bsgrubs pa/ gser dang / gos ltar kun du 'bar ba ni thig le yin no/ /smin mtshams kyi bar dpral ba na shin tu phra ba rtag tu rtag par mdzes pa ni zla ba nya ba mkha' la 'gro ba lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na gsal ba ni rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zla ba dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na ni 'jig rten gyi rgyal po gdugs gcig pa ltar 'bar ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi nang na gdugs gcig pa bde bar gshegs pa ltar shin tu dul ba yin la/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyud ltar sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gcig pu ltar mchog dang / rab mchog sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin par byed de de ltar thig le nor bu'i mthu ni 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po dbang du 'gyur bar rjes su 'gro ba dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dong bar gyur pa thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni mkha' la skar ma ltar dpral bar

380
092-190b rtag tu dbang du gyur pa yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag 'dud la me yis mi 'tshig chu yis mi 'khyer zhing lus la dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / byad mi bzad pa dang / ngan sngags dang / sdang ba'i rnam pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rims dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / rlung dang / klad nad chen po la thig le byas pa lta bur mod la de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can btson du gzung ba'am/ chad pas bcad pa'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /smin mtshams dpral bar thig le lta bu byas na de'i mod la gnod sbyin stong dang srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon brgya stong rnams lus la 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing / glang po che dang / ri dgas kyi bdag po'i khyu dang / chom rkun dang / shod kyi lam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri sul dang / ngam grog dang / glog dang / glang dang / sbrul dang / sngang 'jigs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / 'thab mo dang / tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang yin pa dang / thig le yang byas nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa byas par 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /thig le byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas nye bar 'khod do/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchod gnas su 'gyur ro/ /

381
092-191a dpung pa g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang / yan lag dag tu thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/ don gang dang gang bsgrub pa de dag de thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / ril bu dag ni khar bcug nas/ lhan cig 'dug la smras na ni/ /thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang / /rgyal rigs dang ni dmangs rigs nyid/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med dang / /khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang rung / /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /kun du mngag pa'i las rnams byed/ /ril bu zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /nad rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig /gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi rims/ gang dag khong skem nad kyis nyams/ /gang zhig rtag pa'i rims kyi btab/ /gang du 'thab mo 'byung ba dang / /de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can/ /bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon/ /skem byed skem pa brjed byed dang / /gang zhig gdon gzhan mi bzad pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni kun du spyod/ / sngon gyi las ni mi zad pa/ /de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jig /ril bus khrus byas tsam gyis ni/ /'bras dang shu bar 'gyur rnams dang / /lhog pa dang ni rkang shu dang / /mtshan par rdol dang me dbal dang / /khyi rngo mdze dang rkang pa'i nad/ /mi bzad de rnams kun dang ni/ /gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin/ /byugs pa tsam gyi mod la ni/ /thams cad dug med zhi bar 'gyur/ /ril bu thams cad las byed pa/ /lha rdzas shi ba sos par byed/ /ril bu dag ni 'chang byed cing / /thig le dag ni byas pa yis/ /thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thob/ /thams cad du ni nor dag 'du/ /dpal 'dod pa ni dpal 'thob cing / /'bru 'dod 'bru yi phung po 'phel/ /lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing / /klu rnams kyang ni dga' dang bcas/ /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /lha min mkha'

382
092-191b lding mi'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / /'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas/ /rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing / /thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'khod/ /'khod kun bran byed ci bya zer/ /gang zhig ril bu de dag brten/ /ril bu thig le rtag byed la/ /de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /de nyid rig la rtag tu ni/ /mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad/ /bsod nams phung po stong dag ni/ /nyi ma re re sogs par byed/ /'jig rten pa yi bde spyad cing / /'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde/ /tshe brje ba ni 'phos nas su/ /bde ba can du mod la 'gro/ /gang dang gang du skye bar ni/ /tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing / /g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du/ /dus kun du ni srang ba dang / /skyob dang sbed dang srung bar byed/ /gang zhig bu ni med pa dang / /bu med bu ni 'dod pa la/ /ril bu gcig ni sbyar nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags ni/ /mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi ngor/ /'bum ni tshang bar bzlas nas su/ /zla ba nya ste bcwa lnga la/ /skyes pa bud med khrus bya zhing / /yan lag yan lag thig le bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing / /bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas su/ / gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham/ /bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan nas su/ /gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya/ /byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas/ /snying rje'i sems can sdug par byed/ /bsam pa dag cing des pa dang / /bla ma rtag tu gus par bya/ / me tog sna tshogs rab dgang zhing / /spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang / /du rus tsan+dan sA la ki/ /lha yi bdug pas bdug bya zhing / /bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni/ /ril bu legs sbyar bza' bar bya/ /gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni/ /btung dang kha zas

383
092-192a bza' bar bya/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya/ /byams mdzad de yi zhabs drung du/ /mtshan mo nyal dang nang par ni/ /mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing / /mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad/ /bud med de ni bu skyed cing / /gzugs bzang mchog tu blta na sdug /stobs ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ /lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro/ / chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang / /tshe ring dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur/ /dpa' bo dgra las rgyal ba dang / /sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ /yang na dran pa'i blo bskyed par 'dod pas thos pa la brten nas 'dug cing rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ril bu bdun bcug ste/ zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas 'jam tsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha zas bza' bar bya/ zhag bdun gyis thos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsags par 'gyur te bstan bcos thams cad dang / chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang / snyan dang gas dang / brda sprod pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyadapa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos mngon par dang / rtsis dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thams cad kha ton du lobs par 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon par 'gyur te/ glang po che khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig tsam sbyar ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs la skra lcang lo 'khyil zhing 'khyil par 'gyur ba dang / lus

384
