092-192b kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro/ /lo gcig tu sbyar na lha'i sman bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing nam mkha'i steng du lha rnams dang lhan cig mthun par 'gyur la/ brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed/ gzi brjid shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la the tshom mi bya'o/ /las thams cad bsgrub pa'i thig le dang / ril bu bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub par bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na nyid yin no/ /sman dngul chu dang / brah+mA k+Shi ra dang / su bar Na k+Shi ra dang / shel sngo sangs dang / ku k+Shi dang / su gan d+hi dang / king kuSh+Tha skyon med pa dang / ut+pal bzang po dang / pad+ma k+Sha dang / gu gul dang / phe lu pad tra dang / gur gum dang / na ga puSh+pa dang bcas pa dang / spang spos dang / shi ri Sha'i me tog dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang bcas pa bsres nas zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba rigs kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis shin tu brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig pa lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ de'i tshe gzungs sngags bcu bo so sor lan nyi shu rtsar re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman don yod pa rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag la grib ma la bskam par bya'o/ /

385
092-193a yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe thams cad du bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas lus legs par khrus byas la spos chus byugs te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog 'di yungs mar gyis sbrus la rang gi lus la byug par bya ste/ lan cig bskus pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/ gnas gsang bar bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par 'gyur/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug la klu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun du 'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing las su byed pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la/ de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /sman la sing ha dzi hwa dang / ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang / rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs par byed do/ /gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do/ /spos kyi til mar dang sbrus nas byin pa dang / rkang pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'phags

386
092-193b par 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhing nams kyang phyis sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na gang dang gang la lag pa reg pa de 'ong bar 'gyur la sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do/ /don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /bud med gang dang phrad na sus kyang mi mthong la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang mi shes so/ /khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / bzhad gad byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs na bya ba thams cad byed la lus ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /bum pa la byugs nas chus bkang na chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi mngon no/ /gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus su byugs na chu de gang bar snang la gzhong pa de ni mi snang ngo / /bdag nyid la byugs nas bum pa chus bkang ba lag na thogs na bum pa las chu 'byung ba ni snang la mi de'i lus ni mi snang ngo / /mig la bskus nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgra ni thos shing rang gi lus ni mi mngon no/ /gnas su gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs na rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo / / su yang rung ba'i mig la bskus la lus la yang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang bar 'gyur la khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kun la bskus nas mdzod chen po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la gser dang / dngul dang / phra men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / ma rgad dang / mthon ka dang / gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub gang

387
092-194a yang rung ba nyid 'dod na thams cad blangs nas song na sus kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du khrus ma byas pa de srid du rang mi mthong la khrus byas na thams cad du mthong ngo / /rig sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pas gtsang mar khrus bya'o/ /de nas spos chus khrus bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o/ /yang na gur gum gyis khrus bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ba'i rnam lngas khrus bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ba'i til mar dang lhan cig bsres pa des lus bsku bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i nu zho dang sbyar bas mig la bskus la de nas ril bu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdags par bya'o/ /de nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur te lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ yongs su spyod par byed kyang sus kyang mi shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na sus kyang glags mi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar du rang gi lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /phug tu 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs la phug tu zhugs na phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji lta ji ltar las su bya ba de lta de ltar gyis shig /chu'i nang du zhugs na ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa bzhin chus mi rlan la/ chus gos par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /me'i nang du zhugs na mes lus la mi reg cing tsan+dan ltar bsil bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na gnas na 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong gis ji ltar rang gis yid la las su bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig /mi snang bar bya ba ril bu sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //

388
092-194b 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ las thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs par rgyal ba sbyin pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa nyid dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshon cha'i dra ba thams cad las sgrol bar byed pa/ grub pa don yod pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub phyag rgya 'pho ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa las thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub kyang 'grub ste 'di la the tshom med do/ /bde ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa dang 'gugs pa dang / lha dang / klu thams cad spyan 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / bdud dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon mi bzad pa dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad thams cad du sgrol bar byed par grub pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus rtag tu tshar gcod par the tshom med do/ /rims thams cad rtag tu rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dug thams cad gsod par byed pa/ 'phral du sreg blugs byin pa tsam gyis thams cad du rtag tu gnang chen po dang / thams cad du mthong na dga' ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar mchod par bya ba dang / thams cad du stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu

389
092-195a mthong ba yang sbyin par 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu kun du snang ba dang / dus thams cad kyi tshe las thams cad la shin tu dga' ba dang / skye ba nas skye bar tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du bla ma la sri zhu che ba dang / thams cad du mchod par 'os pa'i bla ma'o/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu yang srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar byed pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid kyis kyang / dus rtag tu srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba bar byed par the tshom med do/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba bar byed cing rtag tu legs par kha los sgyur bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / drag po dang / gzhon nu dang / nor bu bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / lngas rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog ste 'di rnams kyis rtag tu srung ba dang / skyob par byed cing gnas te 'di la the tshom med do/ /me'i lha gzi brjid chen po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sba bar byed cing / mchog tu mchod pa byed pas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg tsam 'di ni/ bya ba thams cad bla na med pa'i dngos grub rnams la'o/ /'bras thug po che dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad mchog sbyin par 'gyur te/ bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dang / pad+ma'i chu ba dang / 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / a ga ru dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas/ sa mA'i shing gi zhi ba'i me spar te stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas

390
092-195b 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar gnas te/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba thams cad kyi dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du don yod pa thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams thams cad 'gugs pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshigs gsang ba la rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /seng ldeng dang / nim pa'i shing gi yam shing gi 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / mar dang / lan tshwa dang bsres pa sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon thams cad dang / gdug pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las sgrol bar byed do/ /mtshon cha thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / tsan+dan dang / 'bras yos dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ yul 'khor dang / ri brags dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs rnams su/ kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag gcig kho ra khor yug tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad thams cad du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gcan gzan

391
092-196a gtum po thams cad dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad byams par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang / yul 'khor dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba thams cad shis pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /ma tam ga dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / 'bras yos rnams bsres pas arka'i shing gi yam shing gi me sbar la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na char mi 'bab par byed pa la/ de nas klu chen po rnams kyis char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de ji srid char pa 'bab par 'dod pa'i bar du'o/ /lo thog dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman gyi rdzas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /legs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dga' ba chen por 'gyur zhing / dus dus su ji ltar ba bzhin du char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do/ /ha cang char ches na de nyid kyi thal bas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na ha cang char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /'bras yos dang / go la dang / yungs kar dang / gtum po'i sa bon mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na/ rlung dang ser ba thams cad zlog par byed do/ /dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /rlung bcing ba la yungs kar dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur te/ ji srid du be ram b+ha'i rlung gi bar du bcings par 'gyur ro/ /klu bcing ba la ni yungs kar dang / til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ lo bcu gnyis su klu bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni/ yungs kar mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog pa ni/ ka ra bI ra'i shing gis me sbar te/ ni ma

392
092-196b pa'i 'dab ma dang / lan tshwa dang / phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol pa dang / dgra thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du phyis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcing ba la dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug gis so/ /til dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /log 'dren thams cad bcing ba la ni/ yungs kar nag po dang / til nag dang / sran ma dang / til dang mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin 'byin pa la ni/ b+haM ga'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa dang / til mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed la sogs pa thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du nges par 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /yams dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dge legs thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze dbang du byed pa la/ 'bras yos dang / arka'i yam shing mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la/ bu ram dang / mar dang / 'bras yos dang / arka'i 'dab mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la/ myos byed kyi 'bras bu dang / dong ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ dmangs rigs thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog 'grub bo/ /rje rigs dbang du byed pa la/ mar rnam

393
092-197a pa gsum gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rje rigs thams cad dbang du byed do/ /sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la/ chu'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stog phrag brgyad byas na/ gzhon nu ma thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa la/ 'bru dang mar gyi sbyin sreg phrag brgyad byas na/ / 'jigs pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /nor dang 'bru 'phel bar byed pa la/ 'bru bdun mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nor dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug thob pa la/ yungs kar dang / mad+hAHdang / sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /yul thob pa la/ tshab gsum mar dang / mad+d+hAHdang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ yul chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /grong gi don du ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na grong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gter gdon pa la ni/ pad+ma'i chu ba mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gter chen po so sor rnyed do/ /gnod sbyin spyan drang bar 'dod pas/ gu gul dang / gtum po'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gnod sbyin rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar 'dug ste/ ci bsgo ba byed cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can ma spyan drang bar 'dod pas 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i dri dang / pri yang ku'i kar bI ra'i shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na de'i 'og tu

394
092-197b 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma 'ongs te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod par byed do/ /rnam pa gsum brjod par bya ste/ ma dang / chung ma dang / sring mo'o/ /gal te ma yin na bu la zhen pas/ nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod chen po rnam par 'phel zhing phun sum tshogs par byed de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi 'bral bar kun du gnas par byed do/ /gal te chung ma yin na/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba du mas rtse zhing / longs spyod la yongs su spyod par byed de/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod cing / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mal stan dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang bcas pa rnam par 'phel ba la yongs su spyod de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do/ /gal te sring mo yin na de'i tshe/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod la yongs su spyod cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed do/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog pa la phub ma dang / lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis dpag tshad brgya stong phrag gi nang du dgra mi 'byung ste/ sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na g.yul dang 'khrug pa chen po las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma 'bab par byed pa la/ ri'i rtse mor sbrang rtsi dang / na le sham dang / 'bras thug po che dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nyin re re zhing nyi ma 'bab par byed do/ /mchog thams cad rjes su stsol bar byed cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dod pa tsam gyis bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byed cing nye bar gnas so/ /zla ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par 'dod pas gnas mthon por tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tshwa dang / lan tshwa dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags

395
092-198a pa'i sbyin sreg byas na zla ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par byed de/ 'dod pa dang / yid kyi shing rta dang / bskal pa dang / dbang phyug thams cad cher 'phel ba rab tu sbyin no/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / spa ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma re re zhing mthong bar 'dod na 'bab par byed do/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs thams cad 'gugs pa la til dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras thug po che dang / sman sna tshogs dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'gugs pa chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa 'khor du 'gyur te/ rtag tu de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur la ngag gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyis sam nor gyis kyang rung ste/ thams cad du bla ma gcig pur mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// // de nas mig 'phrul bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched du las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi bde ba sbyin pa/ rtag tu dbul po rnams kyis bde ba thob par byed pa'o/ /de nas rtogs pa'i mod la 'bru mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma nyid du mchod par bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin zhing / longs spyod chen po 'phel ba dang / rgyal po'i bde ba dang ldan pa dang phyogs

396
092-198b phyogs su rab mchog sbyin par byed do/ /gi wang dang / cu gang dang / ldong ros dang / mu zi dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / li kha ra dang / gur gum dang / rgya mtsho lbu ba dang / gnyis dang / gser gyi 'dab ma stong phrag sbyar te/ phye ma shin tu zhib mor byas la legs par bsgongs lag pur dang / gla rtsi tsam gyi blangs la/ sngags kyi stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa/ mkhas pas rnam pa gsum du sbyar bar bya ste/ skye bos gang ba nyid la lnga mnyam pa'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mig sman gyi snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mig la byug par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i dbus su nam mkha' la nye bar gnas par byed do/ /hU~M yig gis mthong bar bya'o/ /nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do/ /gnas par byed do/ /nyal bar byed do/ / rgyug par byed do/ /bskus na lus la me 'bar bar mthong ste/ de ston par byed do/ /du ba'i rgyal mtshan ston par byed do/ /rkang pa'i mthil la kun du byugs na/ chu bo dang / chu klung chen po'i steng nas 'gro ste rkang pa la chus gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /me chen po 'bar ba'i nang du 'jug ste/ sreg par mi byed cing / ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang 'byi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phye mas phyogs bzhir nam mkha' kun du gtor na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i char gyi rgyun ltung bar byed do/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do/ /lus mtha' dag la byug par bya zhing / skye bo'i mig sman bsku zhing phye mas gtor nas/ ljongs chen po'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ de cung zad kyang mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du rmongs pa chen po'i sgyu ma ston par byed de/ rgyal po dang / dmag sde chen po dang / drang srong gi gzugs dang / gser gyi bum pa can dang / mi'i seng ge dang / phag dang / dga' byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rol snyed ma phrogs pa dang / zla 'od mgo bo yongs su gtong ba ston par byed do/ /'joms pa dang / gsod

397
092-199a pa dang / srog 'dor ba ston par byed do/ /me tog gi char ram/ 'bras bu'i char ram/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / 'bru'i char ston par byed do/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam 'gyur rnams ston par byed de/ gzhal med khang chen po'i rnam pa rnams bsams pa tsam gyis ston par byed do/ /dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug na/ rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa ya ma zung gzhal du med pa ston par byed do/ /bdag nyid kyi mgo bo la bskus nas mgrin pa tsam gyis dri za/ til mar bsgos pa'i phye mas gtor bar bya zhing / mig sman gyis byug par bya/ phye mas lus mtha' dag la bdug par bya rkang pa la byug par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na yang dag par shes bzhin dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / zung tsam du mthong ngo / /de nas zhugs pa tsam gyis me'i khams su mthong bar byed do/ /sems par mthong bar byed do/ /nam mkha' la gnas par byed do/ /'chag par byed do/ /'dug par byed cing mal stan la rtog par byed do/ /'ong bar byed cing 'gro bar byed do/ /me tog 'bab par byed do/ /nam mkha' la rnga'i sgra ston par byed do/ /rig byed bzhi ba'i nang du shing arka'i 'o mas bsgos nas byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do/ /lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do/ /ji lta ji ltar yid la byed bzhin pa'i b+hA ra ta dang / dga' byed rnams mthong bar byed do/ /'khor chen po'i dbus su rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gar mkhan rnams su ston par byed do/ /rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa'i dbus su/ lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa rnams su mthong bar byed do/ /gling gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sna tshogs pa dang / mAn d+hA ta dang / yid ldan dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / rin chen 'od dang / drag pos 'od byin dang / mi bdag dang / mnga' bdag dang / tshong bdag

398
092-199b ded dpon dang / zhi ba dang / mche bzang dang / snying rje can dang / pad+ma dkar po la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig pa'i gar mkhan rnams su mthong ngo / /rin po che'i char dang / gos kyi char dang / spud pa'i char dang / lhab lhub kyi char mthong bar byed do/ /me tog gi gzhal med khang dang / 'bras bu'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do/ /gzhal med khang la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa mthong par byed do/ /de ltar na mig sman dang phye ma mthu chen po bsku ba dang sbyor bas gzhal med khang dang / gar mkhan dang / gzhal med khang mthong bar byed de/ ji srid sgra sgrogs dang / 'jigs byed dang / bum pa dang / gzhal med khang mthong ba dang / ha nu ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed pa dang / gar mkhan rmongs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do/ /ji srid bdud 'joms pa la sogs pa dmag sde sna tshogs pa'i mchog gi gzugs kyi bar du mthong bar byed do/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po mthong bar byed do/ /mig sman dang phye ma'i sbyor ba gsum gyi dngos grub ni/ bsku ba dang / bklags pa dang / yang dag par sbyar bas tshe'i dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro/ /sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa 'grub ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa'i cho ga rmongs pa chen po'i cho ga'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dngos grub dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid bla na med pa'o/ /dang por sdig pa zad par byed pa de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sngags kyi

399
092-200a dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub dang / gzungs thob pa'i dngos grub rnams dang / sa bcu la rab tu 'jug par byed pa grub pa/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs de kho na nyid mthong ba rmad du byung ba/ byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byed pa/ rdo rje gdan gyi gnas su yang dag par lhag par gnas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa/ bdud 'joms shing tshar gcod pa/ bgegs thams cad lhung bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gnas mthong bar byed pa/ de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba'o/ /de nas po Ta la ka'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ skad cig la mnar med pa'i gnas dang / mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas dang mnyam pa dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchog byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i gnas de bzhin du rdo rje snying po'i dge ba 'phel ba de gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs dang / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gcig pur zhugs pa dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po lta bu/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas thams cad du son pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa'i gnas/ yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ re ba phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i gnas thams cad du mchog sbyin pa po 'di ni byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gnas te/ sems can thams cad rtag tu sgrol bar byed pa/ don yod pa'i gnas gsang zhing rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa bla na med pa'o/ /bsod nams

400
092-200b thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i gnas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po'i gnas/ chos kyi mdzod dang rtag tu mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzod/ mdzod chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi mdzod la mkhas pa rtag tu pad+ma'i mdzod/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod/ rdo rje'i mdzod/ de bzhin du nor bu chen po nyid kyi mdzod/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab pa/ mi g.yo ba/ mi 'gul ba/ zil gyis mi non pa'o/ /bdud dang / log par 'dren pa/ bgegs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / srin po thams cad kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis 'jug par mi nus so/ /de la mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnyed dka' zhing bla na med pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya ste/ ba byung dang yang dag par ldan pa/ khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bya'o/ /yang na khru brgyad par bya ste/ de phyed dang gnyis kyi khru'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis tshad rnam par phye ste gdab par bya'o/ /grwa bzhi mnyam par phye ba/ logs bzhi legs par rnam par phye ba/ shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu legs par bcags pa/ bsnyen la 'jam shing brgyan pa/ sa gzhi bai DUr+ya'i kha dog la dkyil 'khor mdzes pa thig gis char rnam pa dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba/ skud pa la tshon sna lnga byin te/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gru bzhi par rnam par dbye'o/ /khru gnyis kyi tshad kyis re khA lnga rnam par dbye'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kun nas rgyas pa bri bar bya ste/ dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la/ don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor bya ste/ pad+ma phyed kha bye pa'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du/ pad+ma la zhal gsum par bri bar bya ste/ bde ba'i gzugs dang mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi rnam pa 'bar ba'i snying po la khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri'o/ /gzhogs g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

401
092-201a gzugs ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa dbul 'od dpag med 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can no/ /gzhogs g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa dang rgyan bcings pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus dang dbu la pad+ma gtsug tor gyi khor yug tu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o/ /phyi rol du tsam pa ka dang / bAr+Shi ka dang / ut+pal sngon po'i me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i grwa bzhi'i gnas rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste/ go cha dang ya lad bgos pa drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i snying po'i lus so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi re khA sngon ma la/ rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pa'i re khA 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /re khA rim par phye ba gnyis pa la me tog gi re khA bri bar bya'o/ /gsum pa la nor bu rin po che chen po'i skud pa re khA bri bar bya'o/ /re khA bzhi pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/ /re khA lnga pa la kha khyer gyi rnam pa bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba rnam par bkra ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rnams su gnod sbyin chen po bzhi bya ste/ drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can mche ba gtsigs pa bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba bum pa gang ba thogs pa/ skra brdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa thod pa'i cod pan can 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can ri bo'i gdan la gnas par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi re khA'i phyi rol du phreng gsum 'gyur du bri bar bya'o/ /pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bAr+Shi ka dang / a d+hi muk+ta ka rnams rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar byas nas shin tu rnam par phye ba/ shin tu mkhas pa dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan dang / rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa/ khor yug tu mda' dang / tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam

402
092-201b par bkra ba'i ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re dang / dar dpyangs dang / khor yug tu bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang / gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug dang / de bzhin du bdug pa'i snod bcu drug dang / gzhong pa bcu drug tu rab tu brjod do/ /kham por bcu drug tu bshad pa dang / dri sna tshogs pa'i snod dang / lhung bzed bcu drug nyid dang / mchod yon gyi snod bcu drug dang / dngul gyi snod bzhi dang / dri'i phye ma rnams bzhag cing gtor ma'i bum pa bcu drug bzhag nas pog phor bzhi'i nang du tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang du ru ska dang pog dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing de bzhin du spr-i ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / bo la dang / ga pur tsam dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi byug pa 'di nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /tsan+dan dang / gur gum dang / de bzhin du dzai g+ha dang / bal+li ka'i phye ma rnams thams cad yang dag par sbyar ba 'dis phye mar sbyar bas bsgos pa'o/ /me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram zhing ji ltar 'dod pa/ ji ltar stong pa dang / ji ltar thob pa'i me tog mdzes pa mngon par gtor bar bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu dri'i chus gang ba'i bum pa ma reg pa dang gser dang / dngul las byung ba'i snod gsar pa nyid dang / zangs dang sa las byung ba'i mchog dang / dri sna tshogs sbyar bas dgang bar bya'o/ /bum pa dang bkra shis bcing bar bya zhing pi wang dang / gos bzang po dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /ring bsrel pad+ma'i steng du bzhag nas bum pa dang / gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / gdu bu byas nas gzhag par bya'o/ /dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyi gsang sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas so/ /de nas gtor ma'i las la mnyam par bzhag nas sna tshogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dkar po dang / de bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang sna tshogs pa'i ro gzhag par bya'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs su

403
092-202a phye ba'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / sna tshogs pa'i kha dog dang ro nyid dang sna tshogs pa'i yul du rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni gtor mar brjod de/ 'byor ba'i gtor mar bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan gdags te sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen po dang / sna tshogs pa'i lo ma sngon po'i phreng ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang / ji ltar rnyed pa'i mar dang til mar gyis kun nas bkang ba brgya rtsa brgyad do/ /bdag dngos grub 'dod pa rnams phye dang / la phug dang / dkar dang / la du dang / sran ma mud ga'i la du dang / 'bras bu rnams de bzhin du log 'dren la gtor mar byin pas las thams cad bde blag tu 'grub bo/ /phye'i zan dang / zho'i nying khu dang / lo ma sngon po nyid gnod sbyin dang / srin po kun nas phyogs bzhir gnas pa rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /zho'i zan dang 'o ma yang ste/ 'di ni 'byung po'i gtor mar bshad do/ /lo ma'i gong bu dang / phye dang / 'bras thug po che'i zan dang / de bzhin du 'khur ba zlum po ste/ 'di ni phyogs bzhir yi dgas dang sha za rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /'bras thug po che dang / 'o ma'i zan ni zla ba dang / nyi ma'i tshogs kyis lhan cig pa'i lha dang rgyu skar rnams kyi gtor mar bya'o/ /rtag tu tsan+dan gyi chu dang / de bzhin du me tog dang 'o ma'i zan ni mtshan mo'i lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste las kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o/ /'bru bdun mdzes pa chen po dang / shing snu ha mchog tu mdzes pa/ 'bras A ma khu bskol ba mdzes pa dang / zho dang 'o ma so sor mnyam pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam pa bdun po sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /sa kurba dang / rtsab mo dang / 'bras thug po che btsos pa'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di rlung lha'i gtor mar brjod de/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad dgyes par byed do/ /zho dang 'o ma bskol ba dang / 'bras thug po che dang / hwags dang bcas shing bu ram dang bcas par ldan pa 'khur ba zlum po

404
092-202b dang / mar gyis gang ba'i 'khur ba 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi gtor mar brjod de las thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /'khur ba zlum po dang / ba byung lnga dang / pu shel tse dang / ma la ya'i tsan+dan dang / 'bras thug po che dang / zhabs bsil dang / mchod yon rnams bdud kyi dkyil 'khor la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /gur gum gyi chu dang 'bras thug po che la dri bzang pos bsgos te/ chu klung gi rgyal po la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o/ /thams cad du las thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /rtswa dUr ba'i chu dang / 'o ma dang / gtum pa'i sa bon btsos pa dang / 'bras thug po che ni tshangs pa'i srin po nyid dang / gsang ba pa rnams la gtor mar dbul bar bya ste thams cad rig pas so/ /'di ni gtor mar brjod de/ bgegs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa la bgegs rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dga' bar 'gyur te the tsom med do/ / de'i phyir rig sngags 'chang mkhas pas thams cad legs par bsgrub par bya'o/ /zho dang 'o ma dang 'o thug dang / bu ram dang mar dang / li kha ra dang ldan pa 'dis bdag skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste/ tshe'i dngos grub dang / de bzhin du rgyas pa dang / zhi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad zlog par byed do/ /'di ni gtor mar brjod de rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi bde ba thob pa'o/ /bya ba gang yin pa de rnams la bdag gi gtor mthun gsum du byas na/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags bde blag tu 'grub ste the tsom med do/ /de'i bgegs thams cad dang sdig pa dang / sdang ba rnams nam yang bar du gcod par mi nus te nam yang phyis sdig pa mi 'byung ngo / /rtag tu gtor ma rgyas pa thob par byed cing / stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu byed bzhin pa'i rig sngags smra ba'i mkhas pa de bgegs rnams thams cad kyis de nam du yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang sha zas sdang bar byed pa med do/ /nad med cing rgyal po'i dpal min med la

405
092-203a skem byed dang / skem pa med la brjed byed dang / klu dang / gza' dang / rims med cing thams cad kyi tshe cung zad kyang med do/ /dug med cing sbyar ba'i dug nyid kyang med la byad stems thams cad kyang nam yang mi yong ste/ kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag tu ring du 'bros par byed do/ /kun nas stobs nyid rgyas pa dang de bzhin du yang dga' ba dang / de bzhin du yang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par byed do/ /tshe ring du 'phel zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha gang yin pa yang dri yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing de rnams thams cad kyi ji srid 'tsho'i bar du stobs dang brtson 'grus 'phel bar byed par the tsom med do/ /de la dgra mi 'byung zhing nam du yang phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo med de phyag rgya 'dzin pa nyid med kyang dkyil 'khor gyi mchog tu zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la'am/ yang na 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam la de rnams kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags rnams kyi dngos grub chen po so sor rnyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ris thun mong ba'i tshogs bsdus pa'i sar bgrod de phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas na gnas pa dang / lha'i

406
092-203b dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig thams cad du srung pa dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po du ma rig pa 'dzin pa byed pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba rnams srung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /stobs chen po dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang mdangs kyi rnam pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyi mod la bskal pa bye bar brgyud nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams dang mnar med pa la gzhol ba de thams cad yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /don yod pa'i bya ba'i dngos grub so sor rnyed do/ / sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa'i dri ma dang ser sna'i dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad dga' ba dang bla ma chen po mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par yang 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rtag tu mchog stsol bar byed cing bla mar 'gyur ro/ /'chi 'phos te skye ba rje ba na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bla mar shes par bya/ mchod par bya/ 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mthu chen thob kyi bkod pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /des na rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des kyang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa byas nas kun nas mtshams bcing ba byas shing / srung ba'i cho ga byas la bdag bcing ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang mtshams bcing ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu kha shar du phyogs te dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug la don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug

407
092-204a tor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i ge sar gyi dbus su tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs par mdzad de rig sngags 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ khyod kyis rig pa 'dzin pa grub po don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rjes su zung shig /rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi mngal du gnas pa'i skye ba'i tha ma yin te skye ba rjes nas thams cad du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur zhing thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba nas skye ba thams cad du don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mtha' dag kha ton du byed do/ /don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa kha ton du kun tu gnas so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bya/ a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ me tog ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya/ gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu byas nas rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /don yod pa'i gtsug tor pad+ma dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur zhing pad+ma'i ris kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe lo bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang sgrub thabs cad kyi cho ga'o// //de nas de'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa

408
092-204b pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pas ras khru bzhi pa byas nas sam yang na dar la bal tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ste/ lha'i gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa phyag gnyis pa 'od zer gyis 'khor bar bya'o/ /ras ris sgrub pa ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes bcwa lnga la tshon lhag ma min pa snod gsar bar bzhag pas ri mo mkhan gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pas 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba pad+ma rgyas pas yongs su bskor ba bya ste/ khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang ba kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can phyag bzhi pa/ zhal gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa zla ba tshes pas spras pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang ba mdung rtse gsum 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnam par bkra ba'i pad+ma'i zhags pa 'chang ba/ phyag g.yon par pad+ma 'chang ba pad+ma'i steng du pad+ma gtsug tor bya'o/ /'dab ma phyed kha bye ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgul yan chad tsam cod pan 'chang ba dbu 'bar ba'i snying por yod par bri bar bya'o/ /phyag gcig ni dbugs 'byin pa 'chang zhing rin po che'i char 'bebs pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po can rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa sna tshogs pa'i gos 'chang ba bya'o/ /pad+ma'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo mgo bo dgu pa/ klus yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa thal mo 'chang zhing lus phyed par bya'o/ /nya dang chu srin dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu shel dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'us yang dag par brgyan pa'i kha khyer dang bcas pas spras pa'o/ /gzhogs g.yas su sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba smad de 'dzin pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can bya'o/ /g.yon du gos dkar mo gos dkar po 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can thal mo snang de 'chang ba'o/ /gzhogs g.yas su khro gnyer can skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dkar

409
092-205a sham ma gos dkar po 'chang ba bya'o/ /g.yon du srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyad pa drag mo drag tu rgod pa'i pho nya mo bya'o/ /bzhin khro gnyer can thams cad skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bya'o/ /steng du tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang po rnams nam mkha' nas bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o/ /'og tu pad+ma la gshin rje dang chu lha dang / lus ngan dang gzhon nu rnams khrus bya ste skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams bya ste/ drag po'i gzugs skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs te de rnams thams cad kyang pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pad+ma'i gdan la rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bya ste/ pog phor dang lag na me tog gi phor pa dang / bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la lta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o/ /de lta bu'i ras ris kyi bya ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang / ras ris dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi nang du gtogs par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la sdug bsngal dang sdig pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ /thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/ /nyes par byas pa thams cad 'joms par yang 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang mtshams med pa lnga las rnam par thar bar byed do/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la don yod pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo/ sems can thams cad kyis kun du bskor bar bya ba dang mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /dgongs pa thams cad legs par grub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / gzugs byed pa dang / bkra shis dang / longs spyod dang / rigs dang / dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams dang / skal ba bzang por byed pa dang / bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi bye

410
092-205b brag 'phel ba dang bsod nams bsags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phel pa dang phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la las su bya bar 'os pa'i bya ba thams cad byed do/ /de ltar ras ris mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yon tan gyi bye brag lhag par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes so/ /ras ris sgrub pa'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// //de nas phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyi don yod pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba phyag rgya chen po bla na med pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rgyas btab pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa don yod pa'i phyag rgya thams cad dang sgrub thabs thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa/ phyag rgya gzung ba tsam gyis mnar med pa yang skems par byed pa dmyal ba pa rnams skems par byed pa ste/ gang gis gzung ba tsam la sogs pas dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar byed cing skems par byed do/ /dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu kun du gzigs par 'gyur te the tshom med do/ /dus gsum pa'i rgyal ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i phyag gi rtag tu mchog sbyin pa dang rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa dang / lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing dga' ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams cad kyis srung bar byed cing kun nas yongs su skyong bar byed de/ thams cad la cho ga bzhin du bdag nyid kyi snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du dge ba dang zhi ba dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus nyid dang / mdangs kyang rab tu 'jug par byed cing de bzhin du yang tshe 'phel lo/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams bzung bas bkra mi shis pa thams cad nyams par byed do/ /bgegs thams cad nyams par byed cing / bdud dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gdug pa'i gnod sbyin rnam par nyams par byed do/ /gdug pa'i srin po

411
092-206a dang yi dgas thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa'i skad cig de la mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas shing mig 'byin par byed do/ /brgya byin dang tshogs dang bcas pa'i gdug pa thams cad rab tu nyams par byed do/ /de'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa la lag pa'i thal mo pad+ma 'dra ba pad+ma 'byung ba'i gtsug tor don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas sdigs mdzub yongs su dkris la mthe bong gi sor mo dang / gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug ste ming med dang / mthe'u chung lag pa'i nang du bcug nas rtag tu snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi sngags dang phyag rgyar brjod do/ /de bzung ba tsam dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod pa nyid kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te char 'bab par byed do/ /me tog gi char dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub rnams mchod pa'i don du kun nas char bab bo/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi phung po chen po stong phrag bskyed do/ /phyag rgya de bzung ba tsam gyis skad cig de la phyag rgya gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba stong phrag bye ba'i grangs su bgrangs pa'i phyag rgya bcings par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis rlob bo/ /ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i phung por byas te/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa so so so so la phul ba dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tsom med do zhes so/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las g.yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyangs te rtsa ba'i

412
092-206b gsang sngags lan cig brjod do/ /phyag rgya 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi stobs spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po zhes bya ste/ thams cad du las thams cad legs par thob par byed do/ /phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang spyan ras gzigs don yod pa dri ma med pa'i dngos grub tu yang 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'di bzung ba tsam dang dang po bcings pa tsam gyis ri rab chen po ltar 'gyur te/ bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis mi 'gul zhing mi g.yo la zil gyis mi non par yang 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba dang dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad nas yongs su grol lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i drung du dge ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po kun du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i lhag par 'dren pa 'di 'ching bzhin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gang cung zad yod pa de mig gis gsal bar mthong ngo / /thams cad du rab tu 'ching zhing 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / phyag stong gi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i yangs pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / mgrin sngon gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / gzhan phyag rgya'i

413
092-207a dam tshig gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'di gcig pu bcings pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur la/ kun du bcangs pa dang mchod par yang 'gyur ro/ /'di ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gdugs gcig pur gyur pa ste/ ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bzhin du phyag rgya 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i phyag rgya'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ las thams cad la phyag rgya 'di sbyar na/ gang dang gang la rab tu sbyar ba de thogs pa med par 'grub bo/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam pa tsam du bkug pa 'di ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya 'di spyan drang ba dang / bod pa dang yang dag par bskul ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin nyid kyang yin te/ dam tshig dang / phyag byed pa dang / 'jug pa dang / bskor ba byed pa nyid dag gdan dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing bzhes pa dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / bdag srung pa dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / khrus dang / gos bgo ba dang / nye reg byed pa nyid dang / sbyin sreg dang / de bzhin du sngags bzlas pa dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul ba'i las dang / de bzhin du gshegs su gsol ba nyid dang / de bzhin du 'gugs pa ste/ thams cad la phyag rgya 'di bya'o/ /sa bcu gnon pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags bcu la yang phyag rgya 'di bya ste/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po nyid dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags dang / gzhan la yang phyag rgya 'di dang / phyag rgya 'di'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags gzhan

414
092-207b la yang gnas thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o zhes so/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// //phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa/ /phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan/ /bzang po gtso bo chen po ste/ /mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no/ /phyag rgya gya nom bla na med/ /'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/ /snying po de nyid gyur pa ste/ /phyag rgya dkyil chen legs par bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub phyag rgya 'di/ /dus gsum gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyis 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /phyag rgya dus gsum gshegs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rgyar btab/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa/ /thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil gyi/ /gsang nyid kun du bzhugs pa yin/ /de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid/ /dngos grub bla med bshad par bya/ /o~M a mo g+ha hr-i da ya pad+ma uSh+NI Sha sA d+ha ya/ b+ha ra sa ma b+ha ra/ ma hA pad+me swA hA/ bskur ba la dang spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha maN+Da le hU~M/ dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / dri chab dang / chu dang / yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o/ /o~M pad+ma shi kha re hU~M/ spyi gtsug bcing ba yin te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /o~M pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha dza le hU~M/ khrus bya ba'i sngags te yungs kar dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /o~M bi ma le shud d+he hU~M/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so/ /o~M saM ts+tsha da ya pad+me hU~M/ gos bgo ba'i sngags so/ /o~M mi li mi li shud d+he hU~M/ lus yongs su sbyang ba'i sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /o~M pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa At+ma shud d+he hU~M/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags te dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /o~M pad+ma ka ba tse dr-i D+ha ba na d+ha hU~M dz+wa la swA hA/ go cha'i sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /o~M badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na pad+me hU~M/ byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /

415
092-208a oM dz+wa la pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/ sa'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma a shra ya/ ru ha tsa la tsa la hU~M/ gdan gyi sngags so/ /o~M di bya pad+me ma~M/ me tog gi sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma a mo g+ha saM ba ra ni swA hA/ bdug spos kyi sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma gan d+ha I shwa ri hU~M/ byug spos kyi sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma pra kir+Na d+ha ra Ni so me swA hA/ 'bras yos dang me tog dgram ba'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma dza le su gan d+ha ba ti hU~M/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so/ /o~M shu ga la bA re rA sa ya shud d+he hU~M/ lha bshos kyi sngags so/ /o~M su ru su ru ku ma b+ha ba ti swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /o~M ma hA pad+ma a shi ni sA d+ha ya hU~M/ gtor ma zar gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /oM pha la bi shud d+he pra ba ra hU~M/ 'bras bu'i sngags so/ /o~M pra bar puSh+pe dza ya swA hA/ phreng ba'i sngags so/ /o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la ya ra sa ra gr-i Ni hU~M/ gtor ma bcos pa'i sngags so/ /oM pad+ma dI pa ya dz+wa la hU~M/ mar me'i sngags so/ /o~M sa ma pad+ma b+hu ba ne Shu sa ra hU~M/ 'jug pa'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha mu ni hU~M/ phyag bya ba'i sngags so/ /o~M tsakra maN+Da le sa man+ta pad+me hU~M/ bskor ba'i sngags so/ /o~M sa man+ta pra kir NA pad+me saM b+ha ra hU~M/ me tog dor ba'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma sa ma ya uSh+NI Sha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ dam tshig gi sngags so/ oM sa man+ta sA d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra pad+me hU~M phaT/ skyil mo krung gi sngags so/ /o~M a pa ri mi tA dz+wa la pad+me hU~M/ bgrang phreng gi sngags so/ /o~M sha ta sa ha sra dz+wa li ta pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so/ /o~M sa man+ta da R+Sha pad+me hU~M/ rmi lam gyi sngags so/ /o~M sa man+ta rak+Sha ra k+Sha ni pad+me hU~M/ srung ba'i sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta me ru dr-i D+ha s+shi ri hU~M/ ra ba'i sngags so/ /o~M sa man+ta dz+wa lA ma la gar+b+he/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA pad+me dz+wa le hU~M/ me'i sngags so/ /o~M d+hu ru d+hu ru pra sa ra/ d+hu sa ri man tre swA hA/ sbyin sreg gi sngags so/ /o~M sa man+ta pra dz+wa li te b+hud d+he sa ma ya hU~M/ sreg blugs kyi sngags so/ /o~M sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta

416
092-208b gu h+ye bA yu dzA be pad+ma be gi ni swA hA/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngags so/ /o~M shu b+ha sha sta d+hA ri Ni pad+ma b+hu dze hU~M/ mtshon cha'i sngags so/ /o~M saman+ta a kaR+Sha Ni pra sa ra gu h+ye hU~M/ drang ba'i sngags so/ /na mo tri b+hu ba na/ I shwa rA ya/ lo ke shwa rA ya/ ma he shwa rA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ gu h+ye/ A gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA bi ri/ ma Ni ka na ka badzra bai DUr+ya/ ma ra ka ta pad+ma rA ga /in+d+ra nI le/ ma hA muk+ti kA/ bi b+hU Shi ta sha rI ra/ ma hA pad+ma b+hu dza/ a mo g+ha pra sha d+ha ra/ sa mat+na/ a ba lo ki ta/ ba ra dA ba ra dA ya ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga bA na/ shI g+h+rAM sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra/ bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ na ma skr-i ta/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ e hi b+ha ga pA na/ shI g+h+raM A gats+tsha/ sarba bid+yA maN+Da la/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ da ri sha na swa p+na/ bi bi d+ha te dza d+ha ra/ sa man+ta rash+mi/ dz+wa la gar+b+ha sha rI ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ sau ma s+ya mu kha/ pa ri pU ra Na/ tsan+d+ra maN+Da la/ na ba tsan+d+ra dza Ta d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha/ mu ku Ta d+ha ra ya/ ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ tri lo tsa na a mo g+ha ba ra dA/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ pad+ma pA sha a ba lo ki te/ shud d+ha sa twa/ ba ra dA ya/ na mo stu te swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /rig sngags 'dis gu gul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o/ /bdugs pa tsam gyi mod nyid la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis ston par mdzad cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba des kyang / bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/ dge slong tshangs par legs par spyod pa bsam pa dag pa/ dad pa can mos pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/

417
092-209a mod nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo bo yongs su dag pa mngon sum du ston par mdzad cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do/ /drag po la bdugs na gzugs mngon sum du mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa dang / dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /sred med kyi bu la bdugs na gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing / tshig 'byin la yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par byed pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po la bdugs na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas 'dug la las dang bya ba thams cad grub par byed/ thams cad du dngos grub chen po sgrub par byed do/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug la bdugs na/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na sdang ba dang / gdug pa dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor bdugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du gyur te/ nye bar gnas pa 'dod pa dang bya ba thams cad byed do/ /nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na nyi ma 'bab cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin bar byed do/ /zla ba nyal bdugs na zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa chen po sbyin par byed do/ /rnam thos kyi+i bu la bdugs na nor 'phel ba chen po sbyin par byed do/ /lha mo chen mo dpal la bdugs na dpal 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis 'bab cing phyogs bcur 'bros so/ /zin pa 'am ma zin pa la bdugs na mod la 'ong ngo / /dur khrod kyi mi ro la bdugs na ro langs ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /thod pa la bdugs na 'bab cing gar byed/ glu len rgyug par byed

418
092-209b cing sbod gtong byed do/ /rdo rje bdugs na 'bar ro/ /mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed do/ /'khor lo la bdugs na nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /thag pa la bdugs na sbrul bzhin 'khril bar byed do/ /rdza ma dang / bum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed do/ /lhung bzed la bdugs na rang nyid 'gro bar byed do/ /ral gri la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gor bar byed do/ /dung la bdugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag thams cad du 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin bzhi pa la bdugs shing gsang sngags kyang rjes su dran na rims nyin bzhi pa ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i mtshor bdugs na mod nyid la char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed do/ /char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na char ches pa gcod par byed do/ /sprin la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na grang lhags dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad gcod par byed la/ lo gcig gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /ri mthon po'i rtser bdugs na/ phyogs bzhi thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / dpag tshad stong gi bar du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / bcings par 'gyur la dpag tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid la bdugs na sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bu mo la bdugs na bag mar blangs bar 'gyur ro/ /tshong zong la bdugs na rin che bar lon par

419
092-210a 'gyur ro/ /bang bal bdugs na 'bru 'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro/ /btung ba'i gnas su bdugs na btung ba 'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro/ /gos la bdugs na gos thob par 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs nas gang la byin pa de dag bdag nyid dam nor gyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyur ro/ /phreng ba la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gang gi mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing / ya mtshan byung ba dang 'byung ba smra'o/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugs na rig sngags chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad do/ /gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris pa la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ /sbyor ba mo la bdugs na/ sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ /'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma la bdugs na 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o zhes smra na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad dang / longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro/ /dril bu la bdugs nas sgra dkrol na 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur la/ srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur khyim gyi nang du dkrol na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur bros par 'gyur ro/ /o~M a mo g+ha pA sha pad+ma uSh+DIuSh+Ni Sha/ ta ra ta ra/ a pa ta ra tu/ b+ha ba na gats+tsha tu/ swa b+hA ba na na/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ /bdug spos gu gul dang / chu dang yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du slar gshigs

420
092-210b su gsol ba'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga dang bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so/ /gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du gzhag lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar drangs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gi rig sngags sgrub cing yongs su spyod pa la rim gro bgyi ba dang / rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa'i dngos grub mchog stsol bar bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su bskang bar bgyi ba de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i mngon sum du rig sngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag

421
092-211a rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig/ de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi snying po smras pa/ na maHstai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM shAkya rA dzA ya a d+hiSh+ThA na na ma skr-i tA nAM/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na ma stA rA yai/ ma hA de bi/ o~M twa ra Ni tA ra Ni tA re/ pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta tA re/ ma Ni ka na ka bi tsi tri ta mA la/ dza Ta ma ku Ta na na/ di ta pad+me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pad+ma pA sha b+hu dze/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ tA ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA sid d+hi ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA tA ra Ni/ ba ra de/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ si da d+he/ a mo g+ha ba ra de swA hA/ o~M a mo g+ha pad+mi ni tA re swA hA/ snying po'o/ o~M ma Ni tA re hU~M/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi snying po'i zhags pa cho ga zhib mo'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la mchog stsal ba rab tu stsal bar bgyi ba'i slad du rjes su stsal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ du ru ska dang / gu gul dang / spr-i ka gcig tu bgyis la gsang sngags kyi snying po 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug pa dang / g.yar drangs par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang

422
092-211b 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi/ mchog stsal bar bgyi/ bde legs dang / dge legs bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis bdag la bdugs shing / bdag gi snying po nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod dang / dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongs su dag pa bstan cing / mngon sum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ byung ba dang 'byung ba'i bka' mchid bgyi'o/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la don yod pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ sdang ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bkra shis kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bsod nams dran pa'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rig sngags 'chang gi bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang 'gum pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la bab pa de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rtag tu mngon sum du bstan cing mdun na nye bar mchis par bgyi/ sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa shin tu dran pas dus las 'da' bar bgyis pa dang / ji

423
092-212a ltar sbrul pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skal ba dang mnyam par pad+ma dag las rdzus te skye la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlab par 'gyur/ lus rdo rjer 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chud par 'gyur/ sa bcu la gnas par yang 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par yang 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du ston par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig rtogs pa dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo legs so legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di khyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu legs so/ /cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang de yang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir dang / dngos grub rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po nag po chen po dang / rig sngags 'chang dang dkyil 'khor kyi lha du ma dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / lngas rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog dang / stobs can dang / stobs po che dang / ljang sngo dang / dung can dang / de bzhin

424
092-212b du 'jigs byed dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / dpe med ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / me tog tshems te thams cad 'dus nas mthun par stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe rig sngags 'chang de dang / rig sngags smra ba rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u'am/ bu mo gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di sgrub par bgyid dam/ klog par bgyid dam/ 'don nam/ tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag kun nas mthun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang par bgyi/ gzi brjid gzhug par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du grogs po dag legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis bya ba de ltar yin te rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di ngas gtams shing yongs su gtang ngo zhes bka' stsal to/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsang ba rdzogs so// //rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba bstan pa bklags pas grub pa cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas mig

425
092-213a mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag la pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying por gyur pa gsang ba de kho na nyid bstan pa mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad par dang / sngags tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba yongs su bsgrags par bgyi/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa ni 'di lags te/ rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su stsal bar bgyi na bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnang bar mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 'gyur spyi'i byin gyis brlabs dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig byin gyis brlabs kyi de kho na nyid du 'gyur lags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dam tshig rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi

426
092-213b dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo de'i dus la bab par shes na shod cig /ngas byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang la phyag rgya chen pos btab nas byin gyis brlabs so/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig chen por byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa/ don yod pa mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byas/ lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ 'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ sa'i 'og tu gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cad snang bar byas/ bar snang gi gnas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por gyur pa dang / g.yo ba'i mthu des de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to/ /bskul ba tsam gyi mod nyid la/ de dag thams cad lhags te/ ri gru 'dzin na 'khor mang po 'dus par mthun par lhags nas 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus par mkhyen nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhugs shing

427
