092-257a steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o/ /g.yon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni khros pa/ gtum pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas pa zla bas brgyan cing ral gri 'dzin pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra sta 'dzin par bya'o/ /dkar mo'i rgyab tu rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni/ zhi ba'i zhal ras can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med can thogs pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzin par bya'o/ /'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs can ma dang / dung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / pho nya mo zhi ba dang / lo tog gi lha dang / sa'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/ steng dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o/ /ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi rol gyi rim pa kun du phyag rgya dang / phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par bri'o/ klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o/ /rig sngags dngos grub bla med pa'i/ /ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni/ /sdig pa thams cad mod la sel/ /mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar byed/ /phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ri mo'i gzugs grub pa 'di ni spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug par ston pa yin no/ /phyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub

514
092-257b sems dpas kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /don yod pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa 'thob cing lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub bo/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par snang ba bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor bcas kyi/ /rig sngags cho ga bla med pa/ /spyi rigs yang dag 'byung ba ni/ /thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyis bstan/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang / /gang yang pad+ma'i rigs de bzhin/ /nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje'i rigs gang bla med pa/ /spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni/ /ri mo mthong ba'i khyad par yin/ /phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing / /dmyal ba ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de/ /mtho ris kyi ni sgo yang phye/ /bla na med pa ston pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /bsod nams bla na med pa yin/ /ci ste don yod pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des tsan+dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la/ gnad kyi gnas kyi cha'i sor tshad shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ dbu dang / mgur dang / rked pa dang / pus mo dang / yan lag dang / zhabs kyi tshigs dang / phyag sor dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo tshad shin tu mdzes shing cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zla ga ma zhi pa'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi shin tu mdzes pa dang / dbu skra shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa 'od dpag med can phyag na pad+ma bsnams

515
092-258a pa/ phyag g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang / dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/ /sgrol ma dang / dkar me yang 'od 'dom gang dang bcas par dgod do/ /mgon po shin tu mdzes pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyi mtshams su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yogs pa'i con pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug tu ring bsrel gzhag par byas la/ tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis mchod la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'di'i dbus su pad+ma ge sar dang bcas pa'i 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dbang phyug dar gyi cod pan gyis bcings pa bzhag la/ a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgram par bya/ me tog gi phreng bas mchod par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas/ smyung ba byas la mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la mchod yon dang / lha bshos phul la byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ /sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom zhing gtam gzhan mi smra bar shin tu yongs su sbyar ba legs par spyod cing gzhan 'jigs pa med pas bdag bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba srung ba dang bcas pa yang byas la bzlas brjod de nyid stong rtsa brgyad dang / phyag rgya yang stong rtsa brgyad brtsams na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang snying dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyag spyi bor gzhag ste legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam pa dang / gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so/ /sgrub pa dam pa byas so/ /de bzhin

516
092-258b gshegs pa'i spyi'i rigs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang khyod la 'grub kyis/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rjes su zung shig dang / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsams pa de thams cad rjes su sbyin no/ /'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mngal du gnas pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med par 'gyur ro zhes tshig tu gsung ngo / /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal po me tog gam/ cod pan la mngon par gtor na/ des na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /yangs pa chen pos rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /sku gzugs bsgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chang skal ba chung ba mnar med par gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pas de lan cig nges par bsgrubs pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis

517
092-259a dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs de rig sngags 'chang bsgrubs na rmi lam du bdag gi gzugs mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi zhing sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o/ /dri ma med par rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/ sgo kun du dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral zhing nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdol pas kyang dad pa dang / gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / cho ga gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ba stsal bar bgyi na/ mir gyur pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das sems can tshe gcig pu pa de la rig sngags sgrub pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bdag gis rngo mi thogs lags so/ /gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gya gyu ba gnyis su mi byed pa/ ngo gnyis can/ ser sna can/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ pha rol gyi rdzas la brkam chags can/ gsang sngags rku ba/ yi ge rku ba/ gdug pa/ phrag dog che ba/ khengs ba/ gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa/

518
092-259b mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ston pa'i bla ma la ma gus pa/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ston pa la ma gus pa nyid brkam chags can/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la bskyang bar bstan pa'am/ dngos grub bstan par rdo mi thogs lags so/ /bdag la yang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu mang du 'byung ste/ bdag la'ang sun par bgyid pa/ bdag la'ang ma gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas mnar sems dang sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung ngo/ /bdag la'ang 'khu bar bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol ba zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems can de dag gi sdig pas gdol pa zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang de dag ni smad par 'os par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshig pa ka ba tshig pa lta bu/ rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren gyis zin pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa chud gzan pa/ rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni bdag gis mnongs te/ bdag gis yongs su spangs pa ma lags so/ /de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su spangs

519
092-260a pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spangs pa/ rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad spangs ba/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig yongs su spangs pas bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag gis mnongs te/ bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so/ /de ltar mod kyis rig sngags 'chang bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa/ gsang ba bsregs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo bsags pa'i bskal bar sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do/ /de lta bas na sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rjes su sems pas byams pa'i sems su bya'o/ /gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags gsang ba rnyed par 'gyur ba de la des gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/ ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / rkang yang gtang bar bgyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / stan dang / bgo bas rim gro dang mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ rjed pa dang bla mar bgyi'o/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gi gzugs mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bdag rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba ni ji ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa stsal ba ltar dngos grub kun du mchi bar bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis zhags pa dang / lcags kyus

520
092-260b dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad du sgrub pa dang / dngos grub dang / mchog stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tsan+dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o/ /gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas par mtshungs par rig par bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o/ /gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod pas brgyan par rig par bgyi ste/ de la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin tu mdzes pa/ sku shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thog tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam can no/ /zhal

521
092-261a g.yas pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po gzugs can/ gzugs bsgyur ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /g.yon pa ni zhal khro gnyer can/ khros pa'i lta stangs su lta pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ g.yas phyogs zla gam can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/ zhags pa thogs pa/ pad+ma thogs pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs pa/ dbugs 'byin pa/ rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o/ /g.yon na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la kha bltas nas pus mo btsugs te 'dug par bya'o/ /lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis tshad dang tshad ma 'dres par spyan dang / smin ma dang / mchu dang / sen mo'i gnas kyis gnas su sbyar bar bya'o// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ /bam po nyi shu pa/ de nas rdzas bshad par bya ste/ 'jigs pa med pas spos kyi rigs tsan+dan dang / ta ga ra dang / pu shel ci dang / li shi dang / nA ga pus pa dang / spr-i ka dang / rgya skyegs dang / kha bar Ni kha dang / spang spos dang / na la da dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / sgron shing dang / gan+da pri yang ku dang / kun du ru dang / sha kha ra dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / du ru ska dang / til mar dang / spra tshil dang / lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ mchog 'di gtsang ma gtsang sbra spyod pas

522
092-261b thub pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge zhing shin tu dul ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin tu mdzes par bya'o/ /gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas/ lan cig bsgrubs pa ni mchog yin te/ 'di yongs su rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad la mngon du gtor te de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las brtsam mo/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ shin tu khrus byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa gsal ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor bzang po legs par byugs pa shin tu gsal ba bya'o/ /dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa la tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar bya'o/ /'dir ni pad+ma'ang byas te/ / 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa ge sar dang snying por bcas pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu bzang ba/ tsan+dan dang gur gum gyis bri bar bya ste/ der tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o/ /bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu dang / gtor ma thams cad dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang / ci yod pa'i gtor ma gzhag ste/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba ni gnas sam dgon pa'am/ khyim mam gang du gnas par gyur pa der khru gang tshad dam khru do'am khru gsum mam lhag par yang bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdug spos dang / tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ska dang / kun tu ru'o/ /ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o/ /me tog phreng ba dgram bya zhing / /dri dang byug pa de nyid dang / /kun du mar me'i phreng ba'o/ /de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma'i ge sar gyi steng du bzhag pa la/ rig sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong brtsam par bya'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang

523
092-262a 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung zhing cher g.yo bar 'gyur/ rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub bo/ /don yod pa chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub dang / thams cad du dgos pa grub pa de kho na nyid grub bo/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub bo/ /khyod kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog tu grub bo zhes sgra 'byung ngo / /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gzhug pa dang / dam tshig ni 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du bzhag la/ bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston cing ji ltar bsams pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mdun du tsan+dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor byas la/ tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /de nas thal ba la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing / thal ba de nyid dang / yungs kar gyi byug pa phyogs bzhir gtor na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji lta ba de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dri chu dang yungs kar gyis mngon du phyogs par gtor na phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /thal ba des rab tu bdugs te dur khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'byung po'i dpung dang 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams

524
092-262b cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed do/ /rang la byugs te tshogs kyi nang ngam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na ston pa mthong ba ji ltar rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ /phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ don dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /thal bas lus bskus te klu'i mtshor zhugs na klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rang la byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /gang dang gang la thal bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad bral bar 'gyur sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcad para'agyur/ mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byas pa mi gzo ba/ gsang sngags kyi gdol pa/ ma gus pa/ bla mar mi byed pa/ rlom sems can/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti mug can/ bsogs pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de dag yun ring por thar pa mi rnyed pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba brgyud par rang gi rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol chud gson pa

525
092-263a dag ni ma gtogs te/ de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems can dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'i yid la bgyi ba bskal pa bgrangs par yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rdo mi thogs lags so/ /de lta mod kyi sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub ni byams pas 'thob ste/ byams pa dang / gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/ byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjes su gnang ngo / /mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyi gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugs su mngon sum du mthong ba mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs pa kho nar khong du chud par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o/ de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod na cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas/ bya ba dang bcas pa des myur ba dang / shin

526
092-263b tu myur ba dang / mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba gsang ba ston par mthong ste/ 'di la som nyi dang ne mnur bskyed par mi bya'o/ /the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i tshad tsam/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ cha byad mdzes pa/ cha shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang ring bsrel gyis bkang ba/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / g.yon na dngul las dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/ /steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med skyil mo krung bcas bcas te bzhugs pa dang / g.yon na shAkya'i rgyal po skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o/ /'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par bya zhing / gnad dang gnad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ skra dang / dpral ba dang / smin ma dang / shangs dang / snyan dang / zhal dang / mgul pa dang / dpung pa dang / nu ma dang / rked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad du mdzes pa/ sku chu zheng gab cing mtho dman ran pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po 'chang ba bya'o/ /las shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig nas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya'am/ tshes brgyad dam/ bcwa lnga'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu

527
092-264a bzhi'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi nyi ma dang mthun pa rnyed nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs par phye ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa/ khru gsum par rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ chung ba dang lhag par ni mi bya'o/ /legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ snyi ba/ mnyen pa/ dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa ni shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su cha rnam pa brgyad du phye la/ lho'i grwa'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o/ /de nas byang gi grwar bri ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/ /de nas nub kyi grwar bri ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/ /de nas shar gyi grwar glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shin tu gsal bar bri'o/ /shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor ri bo po Ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor ni spos kyi ngad ldang dri za'i tshogs kyis gang ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes pa bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyi gnas me tog sna tshogs dang / 'khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba bri'o/ /legs par zin nas kun tu ni mdung rtse gsum pa'i bar phreng ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs nyid gzhag go/ /nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhag

528
092-264b cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / thams cad du rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhag na spyi'i rigs 'grub bo/ /lha mo sgrol ma ni ri bo po Ta la la gzhag go/ /ri rab la ni gos dkar mo'o/ /dpe med ma ni ti se'i rtse mor ro/ /sgrol ma bdun ni spos kyi ngad ldang la gzhag go / shar phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo zhib pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mo ral pa gcig ma srin mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu rgyud lu gu rgyud bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor khro gnyer can mo khro gnyer can bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de nas 'jigs pa med pas mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog can ring bsrel dang ldan pa don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/ /grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs po che go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs pa gzhag par bya'o/ /gang zhig thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa/ spyi'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsgrub pa'i ched du cho ga sna tshogs dran par bya'o/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rnam thar dkyil 'khor de nyid ni/ /legs par bsgrubs pa mthong tsam dang / /bklags pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur/ /de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yis/ /sgrub par byed pa mi mkhas so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dar dang ba dan sna tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o/ /ro bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos snod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang / gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon dbul zhing ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'bras bu sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /gzugs

529
092-265a rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma yang bsgrub bo/ /me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang bra dang / bum pa dang / rdze'u dang / phor zlum dang / kham phor dang / dbyib mo dag kyang dgang ngo / /kun du dri chus bskos pa yi/ /rgya chen gtor ma kun du'o/ /sna tshogs pa yi pog phor nas/ /sna tshogs bdug spos dbul ba ni/ /a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / spr-i ka dang / du ru ska dang / kun tu ru dang / gu gul dang / sgron shing dang / shri beSh+Ta ka dang / sa ra dang / sar dza ra sa dang / de bzhin du ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / sha kha ra'i bdug spos 'di dag ni rab tu phul/ thams cad du sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /sna tshogs pa yi dri dag dang / /phye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid/ /shes rab can gyis kun tu ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag la gzhag par bya/ /lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / byi ru dang ni mu tig dang / /in+d+ra nI la dag dang ni/ /pad+ma rA ga dag kyang ngo / /gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin po che sna bdun can yang grwa bzhir gzhag par bya'o/ /'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor ro/ /kun nas me tog phreng ba ni/ /rmad byung dkyil 'khor la gzhag cing / /kun nas mar me'i phreng ba yang / /dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la bzhag /rig sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas yang bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la cho gas bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ bla ma mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon nam/ pha'am rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po la dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba bstan te/ mgon po 'jig rten gyis bla ma mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dbul ba byas la bskor ba

530
092-265b bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag ste/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la mi smra bar ya mtshan du snang bar mthong gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor kun tu khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing yungs kar dang / chu dang me tog gis dkyil 'khor kun tu lan brgya rtsa brgyad gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings la dkyil 'khor kun tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri phul nas mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o/ /de nas mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa mchod pa byed do/ /de nas lha mo sgrol ma dang / kun du lha mo thams cad la'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la'o/ /de nas ri'i rgyal po rnams la gnas pa'i ri'i lha thams cad la'o/ /thams cad dang sgo srungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhi kun du rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu mchod nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la 'jigs pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya zhing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ /gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa gzhi g.yo zhing gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la snying dga' ba dang / sems bde ba 'thob bo/ /'od zer bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha dang lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas legs so zhes sgra grag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ji ltar gser bkod pa de ltar

531
092-266a dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo gser gyi mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur/ sku gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ston pa snang bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun du rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang byams pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtan por gyur bas me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi ngo bo phyir mi ldog pa dang / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig /dkyil 'khor 'di la brten pa'i skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par lung bstan gyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste sems can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdol pa smad pa dag der zhugs na gzugs brnyan las khrag 'dzag cing sgra mi zad pa 'byung ste/ mgon po 'di mi mthong / sa 'di g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang la rmi lam du ston te de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar mngon sum pa de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing yid la

532
092-266b bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis legs par brtag cing so sor brtags te/ sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o/ /sgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang / dbang po yang dag par bsdams pa/ sems can thams cad la byams pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba can/ gzhan la yang dag par smra ba/ tshig brtags pa dad pa can/ gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/ mar 'dzin pa/ phar 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba rtag tu bla ma la gus pa nyid kyi sems can 'di dag gzhug par bya'o/ /rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang 'dres pa dang / kha gcig tu bsres pa dang / chung zad bkrus pa dang / chang dang / sha dang / kun dong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spang bar bya zhing / rang gi kha 'phro yang spang bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar bya ste/ 'di dag sgrub pa'i cho ga la dran par bya'o/ /lag pa 'bags pas gdong la reg par mi bya/ lhung bzed dor bar mi bya'o/ rtag tu kha ma phyed phyed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'bags pa 'di dag nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o/ /gtsang mas zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong la sogs pa la mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni mchog tu mdzes shing blo dang ldan pa yin no/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las shin tu yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par rdzogs na de la khrag 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang bas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing shin tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mgul pa nas bkrol te rig sngags 'chang gi mgul du 'dogs par mdzad do/ /spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sras kyi thu bo zhes gsung ngo / /mgul par nor

533
092-267a bu bcings pa tsam gyi mod la de nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po rtag tu mngon du 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /rgya chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin rjes su thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa dang / dam tshig dang / gsang ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas pa thob ste/ gang dam tshig thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang mtshungs par shes par 'gyur ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ring bsrel dang bcas pa de yang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang ma'i gdan bshams la de'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /a ga ru'i bdug spos 'bul zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang par sngar gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

534
092-267b gzugs brnyan smra bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar gyi bzhin du de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring ba'am/ tshe yongs su zad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po brje ba'am/ dgra 'thab pa'am/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'thab pa'am/ lo nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang / dgon pa dang / nad dang / na ba dang / gdon dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing de'i thabs thams cad kyang rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang la nyin gcig bzhin du khyad par du gyur pa rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun ma/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ brlang ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa/ bslab pa mi 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/ rna bar bsgrags par mi bgyi/ skra'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba yang bstan par mi bgyi'o/ /cho ga zhib mo 'di ni yi ge'i 'bru gcig tsam yang bstan par mi bgyi'o/ /rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan pa/ rnam par thar pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang / bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyid/ bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyis gus par bgyid na bdag la gus pa dang bla mar bgyis pa lags/ mchod pa dang rjed pa bgyid pa

535
092-268a lags so/ /de lta bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang / snying rje bskyed pas dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste bgyi ba 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dran pa dang / bdag brjod pa tsam gyis rang gi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing yid la re ba thams cad dang mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /ji ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa las gzhan du bgyid na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bslus pa lags so/ /rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun mar gyur pa la ni mi bgyid de/ dam bcas pa bzhin du smra bar mi bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gtsang bar bgyi/ rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu byams pa dang / snying rje sgom pa yid la bgyid na/ de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyi/ don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs ltar thams cad kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad yongs su zad par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dga' bas kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /sems can gang la byams pa dang / snying rje mchis pa'i sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis shin tu sdom pas bsdams shing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ /yongs su gtong pa'i lag par bgyi zhing spar chum par mi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang bar bgyi'o/ /gtor ba mang bas de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o/ /sngags legs par spyad par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad pa bgyi zhing rtag tu yid la bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag

536
092-268b dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bgyi'o/ /rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //de nas khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po rmad byung che/ /kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing / /dkyil 'khor kun la dbang bskur ba/ /sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /bdud dang bgegs ni rnam par 'jig /gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/ /'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros/ /gdon gyi gtso bo skrod byed cing / /sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /sdang ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jig cing / /'jigs phongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /rig 'dzin rnams la grub stsol ba/ /don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston/ /spyi yi rigs ni rab ston pa/ /don yod spyi yi gsang ba ni/ /rtag tu gzhan min snying po nyid/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bla med pa/ /de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'apags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i rgyal pos khro bo'i gzugs su gnas te sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed par gyur cing lag na zhags pa thogs te khro bo 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra badzra d+ha re b+h+yaH/ o~M tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma ha sta/ ka la ka la/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA s+thA ma prA pa te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra ni shA tsa re/ shwa ra e h+ye hi/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ki Ni ki Ni/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha sa twa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ hA hA hI hI hU hU/ o~M ka ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti maN+Di ta/ sha rI rA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa na ta ku mA ra/ ru dra biSh+tu bA sa ba/ d+ha na dA/ r-i Shi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tA

537
092-269a Da na ta ra dza na/ rA dza ta ska ra/ ag+ni u da ka /pi Sha sha sta ba ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ tsa la tsa la/ bo d+h+yang ga /tsa tu rA r+ya sa t+ya saM pra kA sha ka /ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mo\u0f85na d+ha kA ra/ pra sha man/ mi li mi li/ e ne pa/ tsarma pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya/ ni bA si na/ ma hA kA+e ru Ni ka /shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta/ ka ra pu Ta/ sa mA d+h+ya pra kaM pya/ ShaT+pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ka ma hA/ sarba sa twa san+ta ti ba ri pA tsa ka /sarba mar duSh+Ta pra marda ka /sarba sid+d+hi A shA pa ri pU ra ka /a b+hi Shiny+tsaM tu mA na/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She kai ra/ b+ha ga bA na/ a mo g+ha rA dza hU~M phaT/ na maHstu te swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o/ /o~M bi kr-i ta daM Sh+T+re/ a mo g+ha sa ma ye a bi Shiny+tsaM mAM/ sarba bi d+yA a mo g+ha a b+he She kair hU~M mi li mi li swA hA/ de khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas ri chen po po Ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsams te/ klu'i tshogs ni 'khrugs so/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad ni dga' bar gyur to/ /sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to/ /bdud la sogs pa sdang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar 'gyur to/ /ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ni mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to/ /nad thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o/ /rims thams cad las ni rnam par grol lo/ /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las ni yongs su grol lo/ /me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i

538
092-269b lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/ /snying rje chen po can mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di smras zin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang / snying po dang / khro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa shin tu mdzes pa ko la'i tshad tsam shin tu rnam par mdzes pa'i grwa bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang / rta babs dang / mda'i kha khyer dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rnam pa dag kyang bya ste/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par mdzes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod sar pa dang pir gtsang mas dkyil 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o/ /dkyil 'khor snying po rnam dbye ba/ / dbus su legs pa rnam phye la/ /kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / /rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod/ /dbus su 'khor lo rta bri ba/ /shin tu blta sdug 'khor lo dgod/ /dbus der rgyal ba gzhag par bya/ /shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/ /g.yas su khro bo'i rgyal po yi/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po/ /g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin bzhag pa/ /rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag /de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / go cha dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta lu gu rgyud can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma

539
092-270a zhes bya ba ni mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug pa sbrul se ral khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin dang log 'dren la bsdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo'i co to nas 'dzin pa dang / khrag gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/ glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang ba dang / smad g.yogs can bya'o/ /mtha'i grwar pad+ma dang rdo rje bzhag pa ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba can shin tu bzang po gzhag par bya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed mig de'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng ba can gzhag par bya'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa phyag na thogs par bya'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni/ phyag na pad+ma thogs par bya'o/ / byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i cho gas rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na thogs pa'o/ /de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan+dan gyi chu gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur gyis bsgos pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos dkris shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun can rtag tu gzhag par bya'o/ /ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya/ rnam pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /bdug spos kyis bkang ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog dang / dri dang / byug pas mchod par bya'o/ /ji srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams cho gas bsrungs la/ de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don yod pa'i khro bos dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /

540
092-270b gang bsams pa dang gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas phug dri ma med pa dang nam mkha'i rjes su rgyu ba dang / chu na rgyu ba dang / nags dang / skyed mos tshal na spyod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig de la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams cad kyi de dag gi gnas dang lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam byas te/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zla ba dbu la thogs pa/ zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs g.yon pa dang g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas su lha mo sgrol ma me tog 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi

541
092-271a zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa/ lag na pog phor dang bgrang phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/ /gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun du tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum gyis mchod pa bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhag ste/ de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur/ 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing don yod pa yangs par snang ba/ dngos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khos los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gi rnam par 'phrul bar 'gyur zhing tshe'i tshad bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o/ /bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / mig 'phrul dang / bzhad

542
092-271b gad dang / phur pas gdab pa dang / bsreg pa dang / 'phang ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgyu ma bstan pa dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / mi snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang / nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / sa gzhi smra ba dang / rgyu ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu rgal ba dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las rgal ba dang / rmongs byed dang / rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / bden pa bstan pa dang / nad la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dgug pa dang / 'byung po dgug pa dang / klu dang lha dgug pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dgug pa dang / btang ba dang / dgos pa la sogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /bklags pa tsam gyis las dang / dngos grub dang / sgrub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur te/ skal ba ngan pa dang / nor chud za ba dang / mi 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin no/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang skal ba mngon du 'gyur te/ tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po dang / che ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos

543
092-272a grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /rked pa'i gnas nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu gcig pa/ de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nam mkha' las babs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang / bkur sti mngon du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so/ /me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas lan bdun bskor ba bya ba byas so/ /ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag la yang mchod pa byas so/ /'khor chen po de dag la yang mchod pa byas so/ /lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang /

544
092-272b mngon du bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje 'gying bag can/ brjid bag gi bgros kyis langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shin tu zab pa/ shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin tu zab pa/ ri rab chen po lta bur shin tu mi g.yo zhing mi sgul ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba shin tu gzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ri mo'i sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang / sgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba mang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur na ji ltar bsgrub par rdo thogs/ ji ltar nges par gzung bar rdo thogs lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad pa dang / gtor ma tha dad pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba dang / dgug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus dang / smyung ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / slar gshegs su gsol ba'am/ nges par bzung ba'am/ dran par bgyi

545
092-273a bar rdo thogs/ bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams ma/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs kyis rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di nges pas gzung bar ji ltar rdzo thogs/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par rngo thogs/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la mchog tu ya mtshan skyes pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tshom bcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom bcad pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags 'chang sgrub pa po bsgrub pa la gang gi tshe dngos grub las dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe blo gros chen po'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur/ dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i che po dang ldan par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang la yungs kyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang gi

546
092-273b lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rig bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bum tsam gcig thob par gyur la des ring bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / khrus la sogs pa byed cing bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang / mchog dang / bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang de dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ rjed pa dang / gus pa dang / bstod pa dang / phyag byas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de dag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan gang su yang rung ba/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag

547
092-274a tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par yang dag par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje khyod song la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te/ song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang / gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gsor zhing gdong du bltas te rtog cing 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug ste rdo rje gsor zhing la ci zhig blta/ ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/ ci zhig gsol ba 'debs par 'dod/ lag na rdo rje de nga la smros shig /lag na rdo rje khyod la skabs phye'i yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de

548
092-274b thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba shin tu zab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po yongs su bsgrags pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par gzung bar nus/ dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zabs che ba/ ri rab dang mtshungs par mi g.yo ba/ nam mkha' ltar mtha' thug pa ma mchis pa/ shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ 'di ji ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas ni gang / 'gro ba ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang / sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni gang / snga ma ni gang / phyi ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang lags/ mang du yongs su zhu'o/ /dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang gsang sngags dang sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / dam tshig so so tha dad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga zhib mo/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ste rjes su gzung ba de nges par gzung bar ji ltar nus/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the tsom chen po dang / mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur pa de thugs rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ ji ltar grub na phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga mtha' dag nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba/ the tsom bcad pa'i slad du'o/ /sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon

549
092-275a chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje yun ring po zhig nas spobs pa gang zhig skyes te/ nga la yongs su 'dri/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig pa/ rtags gcig pa/ chos gcig la zhugs pa/ dbyings dang khams dang / snying po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o/ /de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes so/ /de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang gcig nyid las de thams cad du rjes su 'gro'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rjes su 'thob cing de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /

550
092-275b de lta de ltar gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag par 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du blta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul la rnam par 'phrul pa kun du bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu don yod pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i ting nge

551
092-276a 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba rab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re re la yang 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / sgrub pa dang / phyag rgya 'ching bas yon tan de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par byed na lag na rdo rje sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba don yod pa 'thob pa dang / gzungs don yod pa 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang / bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar don yod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang /

552
092-276b phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang / blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab zab mo rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla ma dang / gus par bya ba don yod pa de'i phyir lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes ming du gdags pa byas na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ dran pa dang blo gros rmongs par 'gyur te/ de'i gnas na mi snang na su zhig smra bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni don yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o/ /ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o/ /de snying po'o/ /snying po gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/ /gang yid la sems pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'gugs par 'gyur/ len par 'gyur te/ shin tu ring po nas kyang ye shes kyi zhags pas 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ lag na rdo rje de bas na de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/ /lag na rdo rje gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob pa de la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ blo dman par 'gyur te gnas 'di ni mi snang ngo / /lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'di'i gsang sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya

553
092-277a dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor kha ton nyid du gnas te thams cad so sor yang dag par shes so/ /'di lta ste don yod pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i pad+ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam pa snang mdzad kyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa lhun po'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa yangs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs de rnams thos pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton tu gnas shing thams cad so sor yang dag par shes te/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa la rmongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa zhan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa rmugs par mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par mi 'gyur/ dran pa

554
092-277b mi brtan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog gi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu blo yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po de ltar go skabs yangs pa la gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mdangs yongs su dag pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang / rna ba yongs su dag ba dang / sna yongs su dag pa dang / lce yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bklags pa tsam dang / mnyan pa tsam dang / mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po'i chen po 'di thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de lag na rdo rje ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus su ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i chen po bstan par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon

555
