092-299a 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mchog tu bzang ba/ zhal dang po ni mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbu lcang lo dang thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ cod pan la 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o/ /me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o/ /phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o/ /cod pan la zla ba phyed pa dang 'dom gang bya'o/ /kun du lcags kyu bya'o/ /kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba bya'o/ /phyag bzhi la phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i lcags kyu g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o/ /gdan seng ge'i pad+mo bya'o/ /g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o/ / g.yas su dkar mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lcug phran dang / yal ga dang / chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o/ /ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / shang shang te'u dang / rma bya dang / bya ka la ping ka rin po che'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o/ /shing gi gong spyi bo la khang bu rtseg ma dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o/ /g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i gad mo 'byin pa'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa skra gyen du brdzes pa/ lcang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor ba/ nam mkha' la blta bar bya'o/ /smad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang /

598
092-299b rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/ /gong du dbang po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/ /g.yon du dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byad pa'o/ /g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang / pog phor dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa bya'o/ /phyogs bzhi ngos kun du ris bskor ba la ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ shing sna tshogs me tog dang / lcug ma can bya'o/ /rdzing bu chu zags pa bya'o/ /'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi shing dang lcug ma bya'o/ /gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang / grul bum gyi shing bya'o/ /tshul de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la bris te/ gnas gtsang ma dben par bzhag la rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod par bya'o/ /a ga ru dang / du ru ska dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyi ma re re ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongs su zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bral

599
092-300a bar 'gyur ro/ /ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis rgyun du bsrung zhing rjes su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /gang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegasapa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mchod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol

600
092-300b bar bgyi ba'i phyir don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi khro bo chen po'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa dang / yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa brtson pa med pa/ brtse ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad thag 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad rab tu dul bar mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / phung bar byed pa/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang / gcod pa dang / 'bigs pa dang / rdung ba dang / gtor ba dang / lus rnam par zhig par byed pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad+mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad du srung bar byed pa 'chos par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa gnas thams cad la rjes su skyong ba ste/ de ni sgrub par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub par byed pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlab cing rjes su gnang ba mdzod cig dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams

601
092-301a cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyas btab ste/ ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs kyis smros shig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad gsang ba pa lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba smros shig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang / mchog grub par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bsgo zhing dbugs phyung ba thos nas snying dga'/ smin ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed khros par byas/ gdong khro gnyer du byas/ mche ba ni gtsigs/ spyan ras gzigs kyi lus 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas

602
092-301b dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu blo gros can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M bi kr-i ta/ ba da na/ ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA b+ha yaM ka ra/ ma hA daMSh+Ta/ aT+TaT+Ta hA sa/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ mA la ma ha rau dra/ rU pa b+ha yaM ka ran/ ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta/ yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sA na/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ nA gA nA na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba duSh+Ta/ big+h+naM bi nA ya kA na/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twA nAM/ b+ho b+ho ma hA kro d+ha rA dza/ ma Ni ka na ka/ badzra/ bai DUr+ya/ a lang kr-i ti/ sha rI rA na/ badzra pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/ ma hA pad+ma ang ku sha /b+hu dzA ya/ ma hA pad+ma A sa nA ya/ ma hA pad+ma bi ka tsa gab+hA ya/ a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ sa ha sra/ bir+yA ya/ sarba b+hU ta/ b+ha yaM ka rA ya/ sarba de ba b+ha ba na/ kA ma pa uta b+ha bA ya/ ma hA bi kr-i ta/ ba da nA ya/ nA ra sing ha mu khA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ badzra dz+wa la/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ be ga d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ ni sha tsi ra/ I shwa ra/ b+h+r-i ku TI mu kha/ hUM hUM

603
092-302a phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa pra ra/ sarba pA pa/ kilbi Sha ha ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ te dza d+ha ra/ pad+ma ha sta/ o~M pad+ma ang ku sha b+hu dze/ ta rA ya/ man+t+ra ma ya/ bi g+hAM/ shA sa ya/ duSh+TA na nA sha ya/ sarba pA pA ba ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/ pA sha ha stA ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ sa mA shwA sa kA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha ba ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha rA dza b+ha yaM ka rA ya swA hA/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ trai lo kya pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ na maH kr-i twa ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha ra pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ ma hA kA la ma tr-i ga Na/ ban di ta/ pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ de ba ga Na/ ban d+hi twa ya swA hA/ nA ga A kar+ShA ya swA hA/ o~M b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba maN+Da la a d+hiSh+Thi ta sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba mu drA a d+hi Sh+Thi ta mu drA yai swA hA/ o~M a mo g+ha ba ra de/ ma hA daMSh+T+rA/ aM ku sha badzre hU~M/ ma hA pad+ma/ A shwa sa d+ha ra na mo stu te a mo g+ha aM ku sha hU~M phaT swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa dang / gzhal med khang rnams kun tu 'gul lo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /ma rungs pa'i klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa rnams kha bub tu 'gyel lo/ /ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun du tshig ste 'bar ba/ kun du 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang / ngu zhing 'gre ldog ste/ tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo / /lha thams cad shin tu 'khrugs shing skrag go/ /bdud kyi rigs rnams bred nas khas btags so/ /'jig

604
092-302b rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kun du 'khrugs so/ /rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun du 'khrugs shing shin tu skrag ste snying 'dar ro/ /gzhan yang sa'i steng na klu stong phrag brgya gnas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang / ril gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun du 'khrugs skrag cing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gdungs so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag go/ /nag po chen po dang / tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams cad skrag cing snying 'dar ro/ /gnas la brten pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'dar ro/ /'bar kun du 'bar te gnas dang bcas par sreg go/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang / klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro/ /lha rdzas kyi rgyan spud pa sna tshogs dang / chos gos kyi char ba 'bebs so/ /mchod pa'i las byed cing tsan+dan gyi chu'i char pas sa la chag chag 'debs so/ /lha rdzas kyi gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gsor te/ shin tu 'gying bag tu seng ge'i 'gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma la

605
092-303a phul te/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'di dbul longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rje chen po bzhes su gsol/ gang gis bdag yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so/ /khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te/ lus kun du tshig cing rab tu 'bar nas kha bub tu 'gyel cing sreg go/ /shi la thug pa dang srog skams par 'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po ni dus thams cad du mgo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcang ngo / /bsgom mo/ /mchod do/ /rgyas par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gang gi lag na khro bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi lag na thogs pa'am/ lus la thogs pa'am/ lta ba'am/ dri ba'am/ tha na khro bo'i rgyal po nyan pa tsam de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bkur bar bgyi'o/ /spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bsam pa dang / yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /grub pa chen po'i chen po rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /

606
092-303b rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spra bar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ / lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid bskyed cing bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o/ /dgra thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bu gcig pa 'dra bar rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /dad pa dang / gus pas dus kun du mchog tu mos par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legs so legs so zhes smras te/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 'dir 'dug cing dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro/ /de nas phreng ba de nam mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams

607
092-304a cad kyi dbu'i steng du zla ba yid du 'ong ba/ dri ma med pa'i me tog de khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ 'od 'tsher ba/ ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ chu zheng shin tu rgya che ba/ shin tu nang yangs pa/ me tog ka da l+ya dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal med khang sna tshogs yongs su gyur te gnas so/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu'i steng thad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang du shin tu gnas so/ /de'i lag na rdo rje'i dbu'i steng gi thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs par shin tu gnas so/ /de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng thog thag tu yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyis spras pa me tog ka da l+yas mdzes par byas te gnas so/ /khang bu brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor kun gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go/ /de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa'i phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang na 'khod pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba spa ba bzhin dang / nam mkha' la zla ba nya ba ni rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba spa ba bzhin du spa bar gnas so/ /me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma

608
092-304b med pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / man dA ra ba dang / ma hA man dA ra ba dang / me tog ro tsa dang / ma hA ro tsa dang / me tog sa la dang / tA la ka dang / me tog ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / me tog a d+hi mu ka ta dang / me tog a sho ka dang / me tog pa ta la dang / me tog nI la dang / ma hA nI la dang / me tog gan d+ha bar+Sha ka dang / me tog su man dang / ta ra Na dang / ku a ka'i me tog gi char gyi rgyun phab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi char ji srid du char 'bab cing phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do/ /de ltar na cho 'phrul che ba'i che ba dag snang ngo / /rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par nam mkha' la sgra 'byung ngo // //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ sdig pa thams cad sreg pa bshad pa legs so legs so/ /'di ni phyi ma'i dus na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur/ gnas thams cad gtogs pa'i grub pa chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur/

609
092-305a rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis yangs shing rgya che ba'i chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig po mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/ las grub pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin chen po stong phrag brgya'i bdag po stobs che ba/ dpung che ba brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gis lag mthil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po 'gul bar byed pa lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas te/ rgya mtsho chen po na gnas te/ 'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa/ drag po gzi brjid drag po stobs che ba/ pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang dang bcas pa bsregs so/ / gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang bcas pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te bsregs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhigs te tshig cing zhu bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bdag la skyob pa su lags/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig go/ /dus kyi zhags pas bcings so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa

610
092-305b bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khro po'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su song shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyob pa dang / rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/ /kye gnod sbyin chen po myur ba myur bar song ste skyabs su 'gro bar byos shig /de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs gtsug phud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ngu zhing brgyal nas lag pa brkyang ste zhabs la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bskyab tu gsol/ thugs rje chen po bdag bskyab tu gsol/ bdag la srog stsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba 'khor dang bcas pa srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shes pa ni stor/ stobs dang brtson 'grus spro bar byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus su zhig gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khros

611
092-306a pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig /nga ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig /gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par gtse bar byas/ khyod kyis bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po ni zos na khyod kyis 'phags pa'i spyan mang po ni nyams par byas/ khyod kyis rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad ni byas/ grub pa rnams ni med par byas/ ma grub pa rnams kyang med par byas/ skal ba can mang po ni med par byas/ skal ba med pa ni yod par byas/ mi 'tshe ba dang / srog dang longs spyod kyi bde ba ni med par byas/ 'tshe ba dang srog rnam par 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyis legs par bshad pa ni yongs su bor/ khyod kyis nyes par bshad pa dang / ser sna ni mang du byas/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la khyod nag po dang / rnam par 'jig par rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan sems thams cad ni spel/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod shin tu mi bzad pa sdig pa can yin/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na khyod gcig pu ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas kye gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang / bslab pa dang / sdom pa khas blang ba dang / dge ba'i chos byos shig /'on kyang kho bo khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /khyod sdug bsngal bas nyam thag pa dang / bcings pa mi bzad pa dang / me 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs

612
092-306b pa las ngas yongs su thar bar bya'o/ /mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi rjes su sems pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchis pa la gnas par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po lcags kyu'i gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga kun spyod pa de la ni bdag gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma rnams kyis 'og dang / bla dang / phyogs bzhi kun du bsod nams su dmigs te/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /lus la stobs dang / spro ba dang / gzi byin mang du bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de'i yul phyogs su 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / ma legs pa dang / lo nyes dang / mi ngas dang / rims dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyam thag par byed pa'i gdon dang bcas pa dang / nad dang / gcong dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu

613
092-307a bsal bar bgyi'o/ /rkun po dang / zol po dang / mi rgod dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / sad dang / than pa dang / byi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'byor pa sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /sems can mi dge ba spyod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/ /dge ba la sbyor bar bgyi'o/ /sems can dge ba spyod pa rnams kyi grogs bdag 'khor dang bcas pas bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dad pas rjes su 'brang bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /chos la zhugs pa'i yid dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas gnas par bgyi'o/ /thams cad du bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar rang gi srog 'di yongs su bskyang ba bzhin du gzungs dang / rig sngags grub pa 'di yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /khur du bkur bar bgyi'o/ /sgrub par 'grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin chad pas so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rigs so/ /sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba chen pos gzung bar bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang

614
092-307b ba la bdag nyid kyis bsrung ba dang / bcang bar bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de skyabs gsum la gnas shing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan gyi phung po mchog tu bzang ba la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khas len du bcug cing bzhag pa legs so legs so/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga nye bar spyad pa de smros shig /rig sngags 'chang de rnams ji ltar mchog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig dran pa tsam gyis ji lta ji ltar myur ba myur bar las sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa dang / yid la re ba 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung stsal ba rtogs nas nye bar bshad pa'i cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang ba/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa'am/ gzhan dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams khro bo'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par 'dod na/ de zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcwa lnga la 'bras chan dang / 'o ma za zhing nang par sngar langs la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas mi smra bar gaN+DI brdung ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du 'bras chan khyor ba bkang ste/ gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul ba byas na/ des khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing mchog tu 'grub

615
092-308a par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bsgrubs nas de nas bzlas brjod gcig dang / dran pa gcig gis thams cad du 'grub par byas na thams cad du bya ba thams cad mtsheg tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba las byed par 'dod cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya'o/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad skrag par 'gyur zhing dpag tshad tshun chad du rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du 'ong bar mi nus te/ rgyang ring po ring po na 'dug go/ /'di lan cig dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / sgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad tshun chad du 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po 'phang du ri chen po tsam 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad tsam dang / 'og tu g.yang sar gyur te/ su yang 'ong mi nus so/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar mi nus na/ mi ma yin pa phal pa dang / bgegs dag log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas med do/ /rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa thams cad grub pa sgrub par byed do/ /bgegs med par thams cad du sgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing gdon bsal bar 'dod na/ gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ gdon la bdug pa sbyin par bya'o/ /yungs kar gyis brdeg par bya'o/ /lan cig dran par bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mos khros pas bsdigs par bya'o/ /bdug pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dran pa lhan cig tu byas na mod la gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste nag po chen po rang nyid dam/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ sgra gcan

616
092-308b nam/ 'jigs byed kyang 'jig par byed na/ gdon gzhan 'ong bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ mod la gcig tu 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gdon gyis yongs su zin pa thams cad la dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ spyi bor gtor zhing lan cig dran par byas na/ mod la 'byung po dang gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /na la da dang / an da ni dra ka pa tsa dang / gu gul dang / ha sa dang / ba la ka dang / ma tu la dang / pad+ma dang / puSh+pa rnam gnyis dang / ra dza ni dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / na ra pad+ma dang / bi sha ra dang / tsan dri ka rnams ra'i gcin gyis sbrus te/ ril bu nas kyi 'dzel ma tsam byas te/ grib ma la bskams la/ lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la bdug pa mchog gi ril bu gcig bdug pa byas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang nags tshal dang / gcong rong dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni 'khrugs so/ /ri rab chen po ni g.yos so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ni cher g.yos te 'gul lo/ /lha thams cad skrag go/ /lha ma yin thams cad ngu zhing phyogs phyogs su 'bros so/ /sa ni g.yos so/ /klu gang dag rgya mtsho na gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / bgegs dang / gdon mi bzad pa gzhan ma rungs pa de dag thams cad dri tshor ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o/ /lus rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ bcom ste rus pa lhags par 'gyur/ 'chi bdag gi zhags pa'i khar 'gro bar 'gyur/ des rnam par zhig par 'gyur ba de la dogs par mi bya'o/ /dug dang bcas pa ni mod la dug med par 'gyur ro/ /klu 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyis gal te zin pa'am/ sbrul gyis zin pa la bdug pa dang / byugs pa tsam gyis thams cad du dug med par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag 'jig rten na

617
092-309a dug sna tshogs mi bzad pa yod pa la bdug pa'i dri tsam dang bskus pa dang / ril bu tsam gyi mod la dug thams cad med par 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o/ /'bras dang / phol mig dang / lu ta dang / shu ba dang / sha ba kra dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / lhog pa rnam pa mang po dang / nad mched pa dang / lba ba'i phreng ba dang / khong 'bras dang / rkub na ba dang / skran dang / 'khru ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / snying ga na ba dang / gre ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / mig na ba dang / mgo bo na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba la ril bus bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron 'thungs pa tsam dang / bdug pa tsam dang / mnams pa tsam gyis thams cad de ma thag tu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad la ril bu dam pa lan cig bzlas brjod byas te byin na thams cad du dgos pa thams cad byed pa bla na med pa yin no/ /shin tu char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo'i gnas dang / mtsho klu de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /char dus su 'bebs so/ /lo tog dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog yod par 'gyur ro/ /phyis ser ba mi 'bab bo/ /sad dang rlung dang than pa mi 'gyur ro/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad grub par byed cing bkra shis pa thams cad grub par byed do/ /rims drag po ma rungs pa kun tu 'jug pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / 'das pa mi bzad pa drag po'i rims dang / rims drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang / me 'bar ba shin tu che ba dang / zhag bzhi pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / grang ba'i rims sdug bsngal che ba dang / rims gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 'bar ba/ 'khrug pa drag po mi bzad pa dang / zlos pa'i rims gso dka' ba dang / nyin gcig pa'i rims dang / nyin gnyis pa'i rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa

618
092-309b las gyur pa dang / mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang / rims rnying pa dang / zug gzer dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gcin snyi ba mi bzad pa dang / rims thams cad la bdug pa tsam gyis the tshom med par rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / gang dag mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / gang dag gzhan mi'i gdon thams cad bdug pa bdugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i gsang sngags dam pa lan cig dran par byas na/ skem byed dang / skams pa dang / brjed byed dang / gdon ra za yag sh+mA dang / bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang / grib gnon dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung ba dang / gang du gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdugs pa tsam gyis thams cad las de thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po khros pa dang / gang zhig rkun po dang / mi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ gcong rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang du song ngam/ dogs pa mi bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan cig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchig gis bdugs na thams cad du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ chu chen pos khyer bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang bde zhing legs pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ de la byad kyis mi tshugs/ nad kyis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no/ /gsang sngags dran pa tsam dang / bdug pas bdag bdug pa ni thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa mi bya'o/ /dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i

619
092-310a mi sems can ma rungs pa mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa na bdag nyid bdug pas bdug cing rig sngags lan cig dran par byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam la dogs par mi bya'o/ /gang zhig rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig bgegs kyis zin te nyams pa dang / blo zhan cing le lo can la bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bya zhing gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /skal ba med pa bdag nyid bdug pa dang / ril bu mchog gis bkru ba dang / mig bsku ba dang / mchog thig le byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang / dga' ba dang / dbang phyug mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du stobs thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchog grub pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang zhing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bsrung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pa rig sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gcig nas ril bu bdun blangs pa las khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze bkren pa sdug phongs pa'i bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'i don du ril bu gcig gis khrus bya/ gcig gis bdag bdug /gcig gis gos bdug /gcig ni ba'i rnam lnga dang sbyar te btung bar bya/ gcig ni mgo'i spyi bor gzhag /gcig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ ril bu gcig ni rked par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyur/ bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa

620
092-310b thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /rma dang / nyam chung ba dang / de bzhin du chag grugs dang / bgegs kyis zin pa dang / gdon ra za yag sh+mAs zin pa de dag thams cad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ gsang sngags bsten pa dang / gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs par byas pas dogs par mi bya'o/ /mnar med pa dang / mi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang / dug dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang / phung ba rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyur ro/ /mes phye ma leb bzhin rtag tu myur du sreg par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing bdug pa 'dis bdug sa na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du sbyar ba la dogs par mi bya'o/ /'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi khro bo'i lcags kyu spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang / sgo chen por nam nangs ka dang / mun sros kar bdug cang gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon ma rungs pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir 'byung zhing ngus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bab par 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srung ma mi bzad pa thams cad phyogs bslad par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu mthu bo che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs dang / phyogs

621
092-311a mtshams 'khrul ba dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rjes su skyong ba dang / dus thams cad bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed do/ /khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o/ /thig le skar ma lta bu ni/ /lha yi nyi ma bzhin du dpa'/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis 'bar/ /mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du/ / mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pa ni/ /skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin/ /bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang / /dpag med gzhal du med pa yis/ /lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur/ /mkha' la rin chen mchod sdong ltar/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan/ /ril bu bsten pa byas na ni/ /lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed/ /gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang / /shin tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu/ /phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ /rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang / /kun tu bla med grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / /gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang / /dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te/ /kun du 'grub pa bla na med/ /gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / ru rta cha bsnyams te sbyar la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par gzhag pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya shug

622
092-311b gi 'bru tsam byas te grib ma la bskams la/ gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom pa de'i/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu lan nyi+i shu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtshams su thig le bya'o/ /smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod par bya ba dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig mnyams pa dang / rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /sems can kun gus pa dang / dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa la bya ba bzhin byed do/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba grags chen dang / klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /nad med pa dang / rims nad med pa dang / sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang / phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun du rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /thig le de lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te phug gi sgor

623
092-312a gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdangs par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzang zhing mdzes pa blta bar 'os pa mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'phrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin tu dpa' zhing 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ lus ngo tsha tsha ltar byed pa/ 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar byed do/ /rig sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o/ /rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar mi bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'ba' zhig dran par bya zhing yungs kar gyis gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o/ /ci ste gzhon nu ma de rtug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba khro bo'i gzugs mchu 'phyang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la ral pa cod pan gyis brgyan par ston na rig sngags 'chang bas skrag par mi bya'o/ /khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o/ /yang yungs kar gyis mgo'i spyi bor brdeg cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe de sa la 'gyel te 'gre ldog cing kye rig sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum mo gum mo zhes sgra 'byin to/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas rjes su brtags te/ gal te kha chu dbu bar byung na/ rig sngags 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa dang byin pa bskus na rlung gi phung bo bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra zhing skra yid tsam 'khyil zhing 'khyil

624
092-312b ba/ rna cha gdu bu dri ma med cing spen tog 'phyang ba dang / mkhrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa/ lus pad+ma 'dra zhing dkar sham du 'gyur ro/ /tshe bskal pa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro/ /gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim sgo phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'dug go/ /mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /khyim thams cad du re rer yang dpon po dang / bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /gal te mtshog mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi bdag po'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' kun du spyod par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thob par 'gyur ro/ /lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas chung ma dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma'am/ thams cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad smra ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang / las bgyi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /klu'i lha'i longs spyod mchog tu longs spyad pas brtse bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su gnas par bgyi'o/ /nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang /

625
092-313a dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / mar ka ta dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / baiDUr+ya dang / shin tu bzang po rnams su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog dang / lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rnams rab tu dgang bar bgyi'o/ /shin tu char ches pa gcad par bgyi'o/ /char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o/ /dus ma yin pa'i char gcad par bgyi'o/ /dus su char dbab pa dang / dus su char ba'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshig dang bsam pa rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na glang po che stong gi stobs yod par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad kyi stobs kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /'thab cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i stobs thogs pa med pa rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin kun las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad 'di la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyang ba'i phyir rtag tu zham ring du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / dngogs 'byin pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lto bar thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig dran par byas la yid la ji ltar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/ 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas ji ltar 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sker thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu sker lan cig bzlas brjod byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan thob par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod

626
092-313b par bya bar 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i chen po thob pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /lag mthil du thig le byas te lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ grong khyer gyi sgo la brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ mdun na gnas shing de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /grong de na skye bo gang dag gnas pa bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ 'dug cing ji srid grong khyer der 'dug par 'dod pas de srid du thams cad ci bya ba thams cad byed cing gnas pa dang mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yon pa la bskus te/ rgyal po'i sgo la brdabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la bsku zhing lan cig bzlas brjod bya ste/ phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug cing khyim na gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te 'dug go/ /rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas te dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na gnas shing dbang 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ba dang / thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshal gyi nang du zhugs na zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim na gnas pa thas cad mdun na gnas shing khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba'i sman dang / rtswa dang mgo lcogs kyi nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa blangs pa bzhin du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo chen mo'i

627
092-314a nu ma'i bar du bsku zhing khros pas gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing gu gul la bzlas brjod byas te/ bdug pa dbul zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas na dpal ldan lha mo chen mo bka' stsol cing mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /nor shin tu mang po rnyed pa sbyin par mdzad de/ dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu khyim na gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu bdar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te mig la bskus na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo'ang nyin par bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mchu'i thor to la thig le bya zhing lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /kha nas ut+pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro/ /gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang / ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyur ro /gdon thams cad la thig le bya zhing lan cig gsang sngags dran par byas na mod la tshangs pa'i srin po la sogs pa'i bar du thams cad ngu zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /thig le tsam dang dran pa tsam gyis thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad la thig le byas na yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phrag pa gnyis la thig le bya zhing khro bo lan cig dran par byas na phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang bsres nas lag pa dang rkang pa la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas phu zhes byas na me 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyuraro/ /mchu la bsku zhing bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus mtha' dag bsku zhing gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na lus mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /chu dang yungs kar

628
092-314b gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang / bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri chus steng du gtor ba dang bcas pa byas na phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung la bsku zhing rjes su dran par byas na skad cig tu thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /mgo la bskus na skra 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /dung la bskus te de gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi khro ba thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ngan pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sprin logs su bus na rlungasprin dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir bus na/ byur dang gnod pa thams cad dang / lo nyes dang / nad ma rungs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / byad dang / sbod gtong dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ba lang 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / mi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga mo 'chi ba dang / byur dang / lo nyes dang / nad dang / mig nad dang / nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan cig dung

629
092-315a sgra bud cing bzlas brjod byas na/ bus pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ klu'i gnas mtsho 'gram du bus na mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams char pa'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /char ches pa'i tshe sprin logs su bus na shin tu char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshams chen po gcad na ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ ji tsam dung sgra thos pa de tsam tshun chad mtshams chen po gcad par byas par 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor mtshams gcad na bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa bla na med pa thams cad bya ba la sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba la nas dang yungs kar dang mar bsres la shing arka'i me bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun du zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyas pa byas na yungs kar dang / 'bras sA lu dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres te/ sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun du rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun du rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /shing dri mi zhim pa'i me bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang / lan tshwa dang / yungs kar mar dang bsres te shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod pa thams cad du mngon spyod kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /

630
092-315b gsang sngags grub par 'dod na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ shing arka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun byas na rang gi khro bo'i gsang sngags sgrub pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /lan bcu bzhi byas na don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs rnams so/ /gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /til dang / 'bras dang so ba dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar rnams sbyar te chang pa bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin la sogs pa lha thams cad lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa'ang 'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dbang du bya na 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /klu char 'bebs par bya na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / nA ga pus pa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na des na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bebs par 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod par char pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs so/ /shin tu char che ba gcod na de nyid kyi thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na shin tu char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi g.yul

631
092-316a bzlog par 'dod na ske tshe'i 'bru dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed cing mtshang 'dru ba thams cad la pri yang ku'i me tog dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab rtsod dang / 'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba la/ sran ku lan tha dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya na su ma na'i me tog gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na bud med thams cad mchog tu dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang ba des 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'on te khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags thams cad spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //shu b+hamastu// /

1
093-1a ï»¿@#/ /rgyud 'bum tsa bzhugs so//

2
093-1b @##/ /de nas hUM zhes bya ba dran pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /las 'grub pa ston pa dang mthong ba sbyin pa dang 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /'on te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'dod na/ shing su ra bis me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / pad+ma dang ut+pa la dang / yungs kar dang / tsan+dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang bas khrus legs par bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar bya'o/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku mdun na bzhugs shing rig sngags 'chang ba dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /mchog gang 'dod cing gsol ba'i mchog de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad do/ /gal te skal ba chung ba zhig ste mngon du zhal mi mthong na de'i tshe rmi lam du bstan te/

3
093-2a thams cad bka' stsol cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin te/ gsang sngags grub pa chen po dang / cho ga zhib mo grub pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba grub par sbyin no/ /dam tshig grub pa chen po rab tu ston to/ /dbang phyug thob par bya na/ 'bras so ba stu ra sa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /grong thob par bya na/ tan tu li ya kha dang zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na grong thob par 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi bdag por bya na 'bras sA lu dang ras bal sa bon rnams mar dang bsres te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/ /mi snang bar bya na/ ske tshe dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ / nam mkha' la 'gro bar bya na/ sha ta pad tri ka'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar bya na/ shi li dang tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / tu ruSh+ka rnams til dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba legs so legs so zhes gsung zhing dbugs 'byin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis mgo bo'i spyi bor phyag 'jog cing mchog grub pa chen po stsol bar mdzad do/ / thams cad du mchod pa 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten kun gyi bla mar 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad gzhom par 'dod na 'bras ma

4
093-2b grugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gter bsgul na de nas don yod pa chen po'i spyan sngar brjod par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ bklags pas grub pa so sor bstan pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ grub pa rigs sngags 'chang gi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa lhur len pa bde ba skyed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ngogs su zhugs pa rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams rnam par sel ba/ don gyi stegs mchog tu grub pa/ mal cha dang stan med pa rnams kyi gos sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba chen po/ thams cad du las thams cad legs par grub pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po mnyes par byed pa/ rnam par thar pa dang dul ba'i grong khyer nyid de/ dge bsnyen rnams kyi mchog tu skyid pa/ dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i yon tan rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa grub pa rnams gtsang ma gtsang sbrar spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ bza' ba mchog shin tu gsang ba dang / bag yod cing bden par smra ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pa/ bla ma la gus pa/ rtag par rgyun du byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid can/ 'byung po thams cad la brtse ba'i sems dang byams pas bla na med pa'i sgrub pa 'di bya'o/ /bslab pa dang sdom pa blangs pa/ don yod pa chen po'i sgyu ma bla na med pa ni 'di'o/ /gi wang dang / spr-i ka dang / pu shel tse dang / tsan+danadang / ldong ros dang / shing kun dang / spangaspos dang / na la da dang / ru rta dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du 'bras dgang ste 'di rnams thams cad cha mnyam ste/ phye mar byas nas/

5
093-3a thams cad zhib mor btags la/ ga bur dang / gla rtsis bsgos te/ snyigs ma 'di dag tsha ba'i til mar gyis bcos pa/ nye'u shing dang / bil ba dang / me tog brgya pa dang / puSh+ka ra dang / gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / sa mu sta dang / pra puN+Da rI ka dang / shing mngar rnams chu bre bdun gang b.rasbyin par bya ste drug cha lhag mar lus pa dang / snyigs ma bre gang dang 'o ma'i snyigs ma bor te/ til mar srang gnyis la rtag tu btso bar bya'o/ /legs par grub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma dang / dkyil 'khor du me tog dang / dri bzang po'i bdug pa dang / til mar btso ba'i cho ga bzhin du rab tu sbyar la gang las grub pa khyad par du bskyed cing babs pa'i til mar byas pa srung ba'i cho ga bya ste/ snod gtsang ma bkang nas slar yang gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad byed du gzhugaste/ rig sngags 'chang khrus legs par byas pa/ dris bsgos pa'i til mar rtag tu lus la byugs pa 'dis/ lus de mi snang zhing dngos po med par ston par byed do/ /ngag thos la reg par mi byed do/ /gang gis lus khrus ma byas kyi bar de srid du bdag nyid mi snang ste lus mi mthong ngo / /dpral b.rathig le byas nas/ yan lag dang / nying lag rnams la reg ste/ gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur te/ skad cig la dga' bar byed pa dang / lha dang bcas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu til mar mgo la byugs pas mdog sngo ba dang / skra cung zad li zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/ /til mar grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro/ /reg pa tsam gyis tshe bskal pa khri thub par 'gyur ro/ /lus pad+ma dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro/ /lus rdo rje ltar brtan pa dang / gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye ste 'dug go/ /gang du 'dod par 'jug par byed do/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub

6
093-3b pa'i dus su rig sngags 'chang la thig le byas nas lag tu rdo rje dang nor bu byas na/ nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ mod la dkyil 'khor grub pa ston par byed do/ /til mar gyis rkang pa la byugs na/ nam mkha' la 'ong bar byed do/ /lus la byugs na mi snang bar ston par byed do/ /mtshal dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ yan lag dang / nying lag la thig le byas na/ lus 'bar ba'i snying po mthong bar byed do/ /'di dag rig sngags 'chang gi rnam 'phrul so sor bstan pa'o/ /yungs kar la bzlas te/ lan cig bskus sam/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor na/ dkyil 'khor g.yo bar 'gyur te/ 'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar byed do/ /gtor ma'i snod gang ba rnams dang / bum pa gang ba rnams sor mo brgyad kyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug go/ /rang nyid se gol gyi sgras yongs su 'don par byed na/ slar yang snod nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa rang rang gi gnas su gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di rnams dkyil 'khor dgos pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub bo/ /de nas seng ge'i khrag dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs na/ mi yi seng ge chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid lus khrus ma byas pa de srid du mi'i seng ger kun tu gnas so/ /gzhan yang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du/ nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / me 'bar ba ston par byed do/ /phag gi khrag dang sbyar na/ phag gi gzugs su ston par byed de/ shugs dang stobs chen por ston par byed do/ /glang po che'i khrag dang sbyar bas tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do/ /rta'i khrag dang sngon po lhan cig sbyar ba lus la byugs pa tsam gyis rta mgrin gyi gzugs su ston par byed de ji srid khrus ma byas pa de srid du mthong bar byed do/ /ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/ /khyu mchog chen po la zhon par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /nya'i mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/ klu'i rgyal po chu bdag chen po'i gzugs

7
093-4a su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrul dmar po'i khrag dang bsres nas sbyar na/ sbrul chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ra'i khrag dang bsres pas/ ra chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i lo ma dang / phye ma dang / rtsa ba dang bcas pa dang / 'dab ma dang me tog dang sdong bu dang bcas pa til mar gyis lhan cig sbyar bas yungs kar la bskus te lus la byugs la til mar gyis thig le bya'o/ /mkhas pas yan lag dang nying lag la byug pa byas na rgyal po chen po'i cha lugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor bas dgos pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgyal po'i dgos pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /ldong ros kyi mig sman dang lhan cig bsres nas mig la byugs na/ 'khor chen po'i dbus su/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas te yungs kar de nam mkha' la gtor na/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char 'bab par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i snying pos sbyar na/ pad+ma chen po'i char 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ut+pa la sngon po'i khu bas sbyor na/ ut+pa la sngon po chen po'i char 'byung ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar me tog gi khu bas sbyar ba de lta de ltar me tog gi char chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs su mthong bar 'dod pa de lta de ltar lha'i til mar rnying pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/ de lta de ltar de dang de nyid kyi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhal yas khang yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lag pas nor bu gcig blangs te/ yid la rjes su dran par byas na/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma'i bdag nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa rnams ston par byed do/ /lag pas snod la gzung na/ snod sna tshogs pa bton par byed do/ /lag pas bum pa la gzung na/ bum pa brgya stong phrag ston par byed do/ /rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na/ gang du rdo ba la rkang pa

8
093-4b bzhag pa de dang de nyid du rkang pa'i rjes 'jog par byed de/ mar gsar la nye bar 'jog pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ mar gsar mnyen pa bzhin du rdo ba yang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /gtun shing la byugs na/ rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs na/ ma mo'i lha rnams kyi so so tha dad pa'i rdul bzung ste til mar dang lhan cig sbyar nas so so'i gdong la byugs na/ lha de dang de lta bu'i gzugs su ston par byed do/ /gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos las bya'o/ /de nas blo 'phel bar byed pa ni/ til mar dang / 'o ma lhan cig zos na/ blo dang dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /nub gsum gyi sbyor bas tshigs su bcad pa stong klog par byed cing 'dzin par byed do/ /zhag bdun gyi sbyor bas blo gros rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'phel bar byed cing sogs par byed do/ / zhag bcu bzhi'i sbyor bas tshe lha'i lo stong du 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sbyor bas/ bcud len sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs pa dang / skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/ /lus 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang / pad+ma'i kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes nas lo bcu lon pa dang 'dra bar gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /glang po che stong phrag bcu'i stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sbyor bas glang po ches srung gi stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zhag sum cu so lnga'i sbyor bas nam mkha' lding chen po'i stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sbyor bas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang 'dra bar brtson 'grus dang stobs chen por 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i sbyor bas ri rab lhun po chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bos yongs su bskor ba/ mi g.yo zhing mi bsgul ba/ reg par bya ba ma yin zhing mi mthong ba/ mi ma yin pa rnams kun tu spyod pa/ lha rnams thams cad kyis phyag byas shing / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa'i

9
093-5a 'os su gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyi phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i dbang po thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig grub pa/ lha'i dbang po rnams kyis lhan cig 'gran pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mngon du smra ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyi nye bar bgrod par bya ba ste/ de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba til mar gyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yon tan chen po rmad du byung ba brgya stong phrag gis gang ba'o/ /til mar gyi rgyal po'i rig sngags 'chang 'dis/ til mar gyi rgyal po ral gri la byugs na/ byugs pa tsam gyis ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje la byugs na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / rdo rje'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo la byugs na 'khor lo 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /blta na sdug pa'i 'khor lo'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar mod la 'gyur ro/ / dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms so/ /mdung rtse gsum pa la byugs na 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la gnas par byed do/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dbang phyug chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / me dbal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / rtsa'i rma dang / mgul pa 'gags pa dang / rna ba'i rtsa nad dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / dmu chu dang / skran dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa

10
093-5b nyid la yang / mkhas pas chu dron mo 'thungs pa tsam dang / byugs pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sel lo/ /til mar gyis nad thams cad sel ba de bzhin du/ rtsib logs na ba dang / tshad pa dang / snying na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / bshang ba 'khyim pa dang / pho ba'i nad kyi nyes pa de rnams thams cad 'thungs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par the tsom med do/ /nyams pa dang / zad pa dang / de bzhin du rgyal po'i dpal bcom pa dang / gso dpyad ngan pa rnams bskus pa tsam mam zos pa tsam gyis stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lus rnams rgyas pa dang / mgu ba dang / spro ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /gdon rnam pa sna tshogs par bsrung ba dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa la yang / reg pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par the tshom med do/ /byad mi bzad pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / dug dang / sbyar dug nyid kyang reg pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mche ba'am/ sbrul go Na sa dang / sdig pa yang rung / srin bu dang / phye ma leb gdug pa'am/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po'am/ sbrul gyis mthong ba'i dug gam/ dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / hA la hA la'i gdug pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan da ra da'i dug gang yin pa dang / rtsa ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / sdong bu'i dug dang / 'dab ma'i dug dang / me tog gi dug dang / mdangs kyi dug gang yin pa dang / gzhan dug rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /til mar reg pa tsam gyis/ lam mchog dang / lam gol bar song ba rnams dang / rgyal po'i sgo drung du song ba yang rung / bsad par 'os par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / bcings par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang dgra'i gzeb dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa nyid dang / mi mdza' ba dang / phyir rgol ba gang yin pa yang til mar 'di mngon par sbyar bas skad cig de la thams

11
093-6a cad 'joms so/ /rgyal po khros pa gang yin pa 'dzum bzhin du bka' stsol to/ /g.yul 'gyedapa'i nang du'am/ phan tshun 'thab bzhin pa thams cad la til mar rgyal po bla na med pas rtag tu rgyal ba ster ro/ /mkhas pas mig la byugs na/ mi thub cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dngos grub kyi gnas thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ mod la thams cad du grub pa bla na med pa/ nad thams cad zhi ba/ de kho na nyid khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa'i ras ris kyi sku gzugs brjod par bya ste/ ras ris kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa'i gnas thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / zhe sar bya ba dang / bla mar byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ras ris kyi sku gzugs gang yin pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ mthas klas pa tsam dang 'di mtshungs par 'gyur te/ 'di dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /ras gru bzhi pa gru bzhir cha mnyam pa/ shin tu thags bzang ba/ shin tu gsar ba/ shin tu 'jam pa mchog tu mdzes pa/ khru gnyis pa'i tshad kha tshar ma bcad pa/ skra dang bral ba'am/ yang na dar gtsang ma gru bzhi shin tu rnam par 'byes pa la/ ri mo mkhan gtsang ma smyung bar gnas pas/ lhag

12
