093-46b nyan pa la de rnams thams cad lhan cig tu mthun par rgyal po chen po bzhi sngon du 'gro bas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo dang / pheg rdob pa sna tshogs pas mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa byed par gyur cig /rig pa'i rgyal po de la yang mchod par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong phrag du mas bskor ba byas nas legs so zhes rjod par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gnyis par nor bu rin po che chen po don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu bzhag go zhes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying por gyur pa thun mong bar mtshungs pa'o/ /thams cad du gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' bar gsungs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag de dag thams cad mthun par gyur pas lhan cig pa kho nar rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing / rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ / 'di yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / nyan pa dang / bzlas pa'i las su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang de la yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /dngos grub kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo

93
093-47a gang yin pa de yang cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang / de la bdag cag thams cad mthun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mdangs dang / dga' ba bsgrub par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ 'jigs pa dang / thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ yams dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad so sor phyir bzlog par bgyi/ bde ba la yang dag par reg pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba bsgrub par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ don med pa yang so sor bzlog par bgyi/ don la yang yang dag par sbyar bar bgyi/ don thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ rtag tu mchog stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shin tu rgyas pa'i cho ga cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad du dgongs pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje sngon du 'gro bas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rigs pa'i rgyal po'i lha de rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye rnams la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so drang srong chen po de lta bu byed pa de rnams yongs su bskyang bar bya/ bsrung bar bya/ dngos grub kyang sbyin par bya'o/ /ngas cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su srung ba'i ched dang / sems can de rnams thams cad yongs su srung ba'i ched dang / sems can thams cad srung ba'i ched dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i ched du grogs po rnams la rjes su gtad do/ /'di yang bsrung bar bya'o zhes so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya dang dkyil

94
093-47b 'khor gyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga smros shig /don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub 'di thams cad du thun mong ba'i snying po grub pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa nor bu mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / ras ris rnams gsungs pa/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o/ /don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po bla na med pa ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba sa dang ba byung gis legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa la/ tshon sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i srad bus char gzhal cing bcad la dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bdag gi khru'i tshad kyis kun nas khru bzhi pa sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba bya'o/ /thams cad du gsang ba thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying bor yang pad+ma bya ste/ pad+ma stong phrag gis shin tu mdzes pa lnga lnga'o/ /pad+ma dkar po bla na med pa la ze 'bru dang / ge sar gyi tshad la bab pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ge sar dang / ze 'bru bkra ba'i dra ba'i snying po lus dang lag tu 'chang zhing lag pa'i phyag rgya g.yon pa dang g.yas pas bya'o/ /dar dpyangs dang 'khyil pas spa ba/ zur zur du dpag bsam gyi shing shin tu tshad la bab pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byed du gzhug go/ /snying po'i 'khor gyi re khA yang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu tshad dang ldan par bya'o/ /me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa bya zhing de nas me tog gi bar du re khA bya'o/ /rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs pas mdzes pa'o/ /sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyi phyi rol tu pad+ma dang / ut+pa la sngon po'i phreng ba'i ri mo'o/ /ut+pa la sngon po'i phyi rol tu nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pas rnam par bkra ba'i ri mo 'bar ba'i phreng bas mdzes pa'o/ /me tog sna ma dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag la sngags kyi nor bu'i ri mo yang bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol gyi khor yug tu snam

95
093-48a bu'i rnam pa bya'o/ /ri bo la sna tshogs pa'i ljon shing dang lcug ma bkram pa dang me tog sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o/ /khor yug tu chu 'bab pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di bri zhing phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu'ang bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bla na med pa phyag rgya sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / bum pa dang mchod pa'i rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang / gang ba'i bum pa sna tshogs pa bri'o/ /mtshan ma dang / phyag rgya dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa'i yal ga dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal 'chang ba gos dang rgyan sna tshogs pa thogs pa bya'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu me tog sna tshogs pa ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / wAr+Shi ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / sna ma dang / skya snar dang / yU thi ka dang / ka dam pa'i me tog gi phreng bas mdzes par bya'o/ /sgo bzhi'i gnas su rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya ste/ rin po che'i lcug ma sna tshogs pa dang / bum pa gang ba thogs par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi snying por ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o/ /gang ba'i bum pa yongs su bsags pa dang / me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang bza' ba'i kha zas ro bro ba'i mchog gzhag par bya/ sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs la/ bdug pa'i bog phor yongs su bsham par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya legs par khrus byas shing dri bzang po'i dris bsgos te/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs la/ 'byung lngas nye reg bya ste don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa yid la bya/ mchod pa'i sprin chen po yid la bya zhing bzla ste phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis ji ltar dkyil 'khor du yongs su bsags shing rnam pa sna tshogs su gzhal du med pas ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bsags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang dkyil

96
093-48b 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa brgya stong phrag yongs su bsags pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i sprin chen po byed do/ /sna tshogs pa'i gos dang / sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu dang / me tog sna tshogs pa dang / ro brgya pa'i kha zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sgron ma'i shing sna tshogs pa brgya stong phrag rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po byed do/ /yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin byed do/ /de lta bu'i cho ga rnams phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs rnams mchod par 'gyur te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad du lhun grub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par byed do/ /gang yang dkyil 'khor chen po der rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de la mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / lhan cig 'gro ba'am/ tha na thos pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa chen po yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /sems can re re'i yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa de'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyi mod la 'phral nyid du mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar yang 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /'chi 'pho zhing

97
093-49a skye ba brjes pa'i dus su son te 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mngon sum du ston zhing snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lam nye bar ston par byed cing dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su skal ba mnyam pa nyid kyi skye bar byed de/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa tsam gyi mod la/ skye ba thams cad rjes su dran par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par byed do/ /ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du thams cad rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bcings te gnas bar byed do zhes so/ /'di ni skye ba'i tha mar 'gyur te/ mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i ri dgas dang bya de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ mir gyur pa rnams kyi lta ci smos so/ /de ltar yon tan dang phan yon chen po'i mchod pa chen po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ /don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang phan yon gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// //de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa sdig pa thams cad sel ba 'phral du nad thams cad zlog par byed pa dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas mchog thams cad sbyin pa bshad par bya'o/ /ras sam gos gzhan nam/ rgya dar la kun nas khru bzhi pa la gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gnas su ri mo mkhan gtsang ma nyid kyis khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dri sna tshogs pas bdugs la mtshon sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra zhing lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar par bzhag pas ras ris bla na med pa bri bar bya'o/ /dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bya ste/ gzhal yas khang gi khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri la pad+ma'i rdzing bur klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa'o/ /

98
093-49b g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya ste/ don yod zhags pa skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa ral ba'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mdung rtse gsum 'dzin pa pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / nor bu rin po che 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud par byed bzhin pa'o/ /g.yas su rig pa'i rgyal po bya ste/ phyag bzhi pa 'phags ma sgrol ma'i cha byad 'chang ba 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'dzin pa/ pad+ma dang zhags pa dang / ral gri 'chang zhing nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal mtshan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud par byed pa skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu lha mo sgrol ma bya ste/ thal mo sbyar ba smad pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o/ / lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu gos dkar mo bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa rab tu bzhad cing smin ma dpral bar g.yo zhing / bcom ldan 'das la zur mig gis lta bar byed pa bya'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'phags pa dpal mdzes pa bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phur ma 'chang bar byed pa'o/ /thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan bya ste/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o/ /gos dkar mo'i rgyab tu khro bo chen po lcags kyu bya'o/ /dkar po'i gzhogs su don yod pa'i lcags kyu bya'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i 'og tu ral pa gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal mche ba gcigs pa/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa ste/ ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang ba bya zhing sdigs mdzub byed pa bya'o/ /steng du phyogs pa skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun bya ste/ 'od dpag med kyang dbus su bya'o/ /lhas mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o/ /phyag

99
093-50a g.yon dang g.yas su rdo rje 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zas gsar pa 'dren par byed bzhin pa'o/ /gzhogs g.yas dang g.yon du khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang ba bya'o/ /'og gi gzhogs g.yas su rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/ /gzhogs g.yon du/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi mtshon cha 'dzin pa bya ste/ thams cad glu len bzhin pa bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'og phyogs kyi rdzing bu'i g.yas logs su rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bya ste/ bdug pa'i pog phor dang / me tog 'dzin cing bgrang phreng thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o/ /ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu ri bo bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs me tog gi mgo lcogs bkram zhing / rin po che'i shing ljon sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ chu bo 'bab cing rjes su spyod pa/ ri dgas dang / byas yang dag par brgyan pa bya'o/ /sna tshogs pa'i ri'i lha dang / shang shang te 'us kun tu khyab pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i klu'i gdengs ka dang mtshungs pa gnas su gnas pa bya'o/ /de nas yongs su sbyang ba byas te zin pa dang / ras ris la tshon sna tshogs pas bkra bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o/ /legs par khrus bya ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ smra ba bcad la/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so/ /de'i tshe ras ris 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed de/ phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed do/ /rig sngags 'chang dga' zhing 'dod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po dang / don yod zhags pa'i lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di'i dngos grub tu shes par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge

100
093-50b bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang ras ris chen po 'di mthong nas/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnam par sbyangs shing thun tshags su 'gyur ro/ /mnar med pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams 'phral du yongs su grol lo/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams cad dang yid kyi shing rta dang / 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / rigs thun mong pa la 'jug pa'i thams cad thun mong ba'i dam tshig dang / de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub byed pa'i gnas/ rdo rje'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor mchog byang chub kyi snying po nye bar bgrod par byed pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog par 'jug par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor/ gnas thams cad du son pa'i dngos grub/ cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ phyag rgya thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas yongs su brtags te/ sa'i cha mdzes par/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'am/ gnas gnyis sam/ ri phug gam/ tshang tshing ngam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ gzhan yang brang sa'am/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/ skyed mos tshal lam/ nags 'dab nyid dang / kun dga' ra ba'am/ chu klung ngam/ lteng ka'am/ 'bab chu'i dngo'am/ mtsho bran nam/ mtshe'u dag dang / rdzing bu rnam par bkra ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshon nam/ ne'u gsing sngon po'am/ me tog skyes pa'i gnas sam/ thams cad du rjes su mthun par brtag par bya'o/ /gnas

101
093-51a gtsang mar ma nyams pa'i mod la/ dkyil 'khor der dgod par bya ste/ sa dang / ba byung dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya'o/ /khor yug tu khru bzhi pa/ legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ be+eDUR+ya'i kha dog tu bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor la tshon sna tshogs pa mdzes pas phye ba'i thig gdab ste/ cha mnyam par phye nas zur bzhi pa logs bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig gdab bo/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang / dkyil 'khor khru'i tshad la re khA lnga byas pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pas thig gdab bo/ /pad+ma'i ri mo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje'i ri mo gsum pa dag go/ /ut+pa la bzhi pa'am/ nor bu rin po che chen po ni lnga par bshad do/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor yug tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba byed du gzhug go/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas so/ /pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ ge sar dang / ze'u 'bru dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya ste/ de la rig pa'i lha mo gzugs ji ltar mdzes pa dgod par bya'o/ /ji ltar ras ris 'di la/ gzugs pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba de lta bu bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mdzes pa dang / zhi ba dang / khro gnyer can ma/ drag po sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs pa 'chang ba skyes pa lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs dang / bu mo lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa bsres pa rtag tu bris nas/ pad+ma'i gdan gyis brgyan cing / thams cad pad+ma 'chang ba byed du gzhug go/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi ru rgyal po chen po bzhi byed du gzhug ste/ go cha dang ya lad bgos pa/ drag po'i gzugs 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bya ste/ khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan 'chang ba'o/ /sgo bzhi'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi lha bya'o/ /gang gA dang / shI tra dang / 'jigs

102
093-51b ma dang / dpe med ma dang / nor bu bzang po dang / ki lI ki la dang / gtsigs zhal ma ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'di rnams bri bar bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu ri bo'i phreng ba dag la me tog dang / ljon shing sna tshogs pa'i lcug mas khyab cing / tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par mthar phyin pa dang / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la kho ra khor yug tu tshon sna lngas mdzes pa'i ba dan brgya dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa dang / rnam par bkra ba'i bum pa gang ba dang / gtor ma dang / dril bu mdzes pa dang / gang ba'i bum pa dang / bum bu dang / dri sna tshogs kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang / ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag nas/ kham phor dang / ril ba gang ba dang / dri sna tshogs kyis byug pa dang / bdug pa sna tshogs pas mdzes pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba gcal du bkram pa dang / 'bras yos dang / yungs kar nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams dang / bza' ba'i rnam pa gzugs sna tshogs pa bzhag nas/ 'bras bu sna tshogs mdzes pa rnams bzhag ste/ khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / gser dang / dngul las byung ba'i snod dris gang ba rnams bzhag go/ /thams cad ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gzhal du med pa las dman pa nyid du mi bya'i lhag pa nyid byed du gzhug go/ /dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa dang / stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gis gtsang bar gyur nas/ legs par khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ srung ba'i cho gas phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / srung ba chen po yang byed du gzhug go/ /de nas gsang sngags kyi las dang / phyag rgya'i las bla na med par bya'o/ /de nas sems can gzhug par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gang 'dod par bcug nas thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya sbyin du gzhug go/ /phyag bya ba dang / bskor ba la thams cad bcug

103
093-52a nas/ snyan gsan dbab pa dang spyan drang bar bya/ las kyi cho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya/ bzlas pa'i las rnams dang / las thams cad mdor bsdus pa byas nas/ gshegs su gsol ba 'dir bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha rnams la gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga dang / de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa phul ba nas dkyil 'khor na gnas pa rnams gshegs su gsol lo/ /gang gi tshe/ gsang sngags rnams dang / cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs rab tu 'jug pa na sa'i mthil du ras ris 'bar ba'i mod la 'od zer 'byin par byed de/ dkyil 'khor mthong zhing gsang sngags 'chang yang bar snang la gnas so/ /de'i skad cig la ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la/ cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad rtag tu myur du 'byung la rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub brjod do/ /ji ltar yid la byed pa thams cad myur du 'dzin no/ / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob ste 'di la the tsom med do/ /sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do/ /sems can gang dkyil 'khor de mthong nas sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams dang / mnar med par gzhol ba de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing bde blag tu sangs rgyas nyid du 'gro'o// //de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo chen po dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong pa'i phyag rgya dge ba'i las

104
093-52b thams cad byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'bros par byed pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par skrag par byed pa/ 'dod pa'i rig rnams sreg par byed pa/ gdug pa'i klu rnams 'khrug par byed pa/ sa'i mthil g.yo bar byed pa/ lha'i me tog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang / lha'i gos dang lhab lhub kyi char 'bebs par byed pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par skul bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snyan gsan 'bebs par byed pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ bde ba thams cad dang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par byed pa/ bla na med pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar byed pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags bla na med pa thams cad grub pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ phyag rgya dang / mchog thams cad sbyin par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams cad 'chang ba/ gzungs rnams kyi khyad par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ gang gis rnam par snang mdzad dang / thub pa brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi gnas thams cad la gnas pa/ sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sreg par byed pa/ rtag tu 'khor ba las 'don par byed pa/ bdud dang ma rungs pa rnams las sgrol ba po/ rtag tu chos kyi zam stegs mchog /rga ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba las grol bar byed pa/ srid pa mi bzad pa ston par nus pa/ tshul khrims dang / gtong ba dang / brtson

105
093-53a 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi dri zhim po sbyin zhing srung bar byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa'i rin po che'i phung po chen po rtag tu sbyin pa/ rin po che'i phung po rtag tu sbyin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha thams cad la mchod pa byed pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad ston par byed pa/ gzugs sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po 'di la gnas par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba/ ma rungs pa thams cad dang / gdon dang nad thams cad rtag tu rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlog par byed pa/ sgrub par byed pa'o/ /'jigs pa rnams thams cad dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad po rnams kyis 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /dug dang / byad stems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad nyams par byed par the tsom med pa zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis bzlog nas/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo'i sor mo dang / sdigs mdzub gnyis bskums la sor mo gsum brkyang la snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam par mchog sbyin pa ste/ phyag rgya brgya stong phrag bye ba gnyis tsam du bcings par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag

106
093-53b rgya gang yin pas te/ phyag rgya so so so so ba 'di rnams thams cad phyag rgya bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams su 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu byed do/ /phyag rgya 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog sbyin pa po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po don yod pa'i snying po'o/ /shin tu gsang ba'i las thams cad du don yod pa'o/ /dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa dang / rigs thun mong ba'i gsang ba dang / dam tshig thams cad du mthong ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di'i da ltar pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ gung mo'i sor mos mthe bong gi sor mo bskums la/ sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par bya/ ming med dang / mthe chung dag gcig tu brkyang la/ sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag nas/ snying ga'i gnas su bzhag ste/ khro bo'i lta ba dang mtshungs par bzhag pas hUM yig gis btsir bar bya'o/ /'di ni khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya khro bo thams cad kyi mchog dang gtso bor brjod par bya ste/ rigs bye ba stong phrag rnams kyi thun mong ba'i phyag rgya thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis khro bo'i phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs gang yin pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs su brjod pa gang yin pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje drag pos 'jigs par byed do/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal por brjod par bya ste/ nor bu'i rigs gang yin pa'i khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams gdug pa rnams 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o/ /thams cad du phyag rgya'i gtso bo zhes bya ba/ khro bo'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o/ /de bzhin du khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di 'ching bzhin pa/ ri rab lhun po brgya stong phrag dang / rgya mtsho yang skems par byed do/ /

107
093-54a ri rab lhun po'i ri ni rdul phra rab ji lta bar rnam par 'thor bar byed do/ /rgya mtsho thams cad kyang skems par byed do/ /ri dang ri bo yang nyams par byed do/ /lha ma yin ma rungs pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / de'i gnas kyi klu ma rungs pa rnams sreg par byed do/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / /'byung po dang / gdon ma rungs pa dang / /bgegs byed pa'i lha ma rungs pa gang yin pa dang / bdud kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur la/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rtag tu nyams par byed cing / skad cig de la 'jig par byed do/ /phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa de rnams thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/ /phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do/ /thams cad 'grub pa don yod cing dge ba thams cad 'grub par byed do/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bskums la/ gung mo yud tsam bskums te/ ming med dang / mthe bong gis sor mo'i sen mos sen mo mnyam gzhag ste/ mthe'u chung brkyang nas snying ga'i gnas su bzhag pa 'di ni rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po don yod pa'i phyag rgya rmad du byung ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i phyag rgya rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bla na med pa 'jig rten gyi khams mgon pos snyan par brjod cing lung bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa/ de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams

108
093-54b cad du gtso bo ste/ gang gis phyag rgya 'di 'ching ba de/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag gi phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ /bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong phrag bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun nas bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs par byed cing dgongs par byed de the tsom med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du srung bar byed do/ /phyag rgya 'di'i phan yon sngar brjod pas gzhal du med cing grangs med la tshad med par rab tu bsgrags shing the tsom med do/ /phyag rgya 'di mthong ba dang / bcings pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bskyed do/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du gcig brkyangs la/ dpung pa bskums te/ ming med dang / mthe bong gi sor mo 'dud la mthe chung bskum par bya'o/ / ming med kyi mthar reg la/ gung mo bskums la sdigs mdzub rab tu brkyangs te/ snying ga'i gnas su 'di g.yo ba tsam mo/ /me tog gam/ dri dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos sam/ rgyan dang / spud pa rnams kyang lag pa g.yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha rnams dang / de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po rnams dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi de rnams thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro/ / lha rdzas kyi mchod pa bla na med pa dang / mchog dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa'i mchod pa 'di rnams byed de/ ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang / ro brgya ba'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi bcud

109
093-55a kyis len gyi mchod pa 'di rnams byed do/ /phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'byung ngo / /gser dang dngul gyi me tog bla na med pa dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba nyi ma dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas 'bar bar byed do/ /phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i zhes bya ba 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ rtag tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang / gsang sngags rnams yid kyis bsams pas de rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag bsam gyi shing dang mnyam shing mtshungs par ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya 'di'i mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par byed do/ /de'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bzung bzhin pa ni/ mchod pa bla na med pa dang / tshegs chung ngus mchod pa chung ngu yang tshad med par rab tu 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do/ /ri rab lhun po bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung pos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du/ phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la de lta bu'i mchod pa'i cho ga byed do/ /de lta bu'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gung mo la reg pa ni/ dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / dam tshig la 'jug pa dang / skor ba byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / de bzhin du dri dang / mar me dang / phreng ba

110
093-55b dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du khrus dang / nye reg nyid dang / gos bgo ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / bzlas bzhin pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang / skyil mo krung bcing ba dang / sbyin sreg gi las dang / gzhan spyan drang ba nyid dang / gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang / dngos grub sgrub pa nyid dang / thams cad nas thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'dis byed de/ gnas thams cad du song ba dang / gnas grub pa dang / bya ba thams cad legs par bsngags pa dang / thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i las rab tu grub pa dang / yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang / thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ don yod pa sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o/ /don yod pa'i las zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / don yod pa thos pa nyid dang / don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i de kho na nyid dang / don yod par sdig pa nyams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / don yod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang / don yod par tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /snying po dang / phyag rgya 'di 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o/ /rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du/ nyin mtshan du dang / thun mtshams su yang / phyag rgya 'di 'ching na/ bkra shis pa'i mchog /bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / don

111
093-56a yod pa'i dngos grub dam par gyur pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do/ /'di ni thar pa mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu dge ba'o/ /phyag rgya'i gsang sngags rnams su 'gyur te/ oM a mo g+hAM ku sha dz+wA laM hUM/ oM a mo g+ha kro d+ha daM Sh+Te hUM/ oM bid+yA rA dza pad+me dz+wa laM hUM/ oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni pra bar+t+ha ya hUM/ oM a mo g+ha sarba tra sA d+ha ya shi be hUM/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /de nas dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags thams cad du sgrub pa'i thabs kyi de kho na nyid kyi gnas thams cad la 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ oM a mo g+ha maN+Da le hUM/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o/ /oM saman+ta shu b+hi pri thi bI sa hA hUM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pa ri sho d+ha ni hUM/ dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pri thi bI sa ra s+tha le hUM/ sa dang ba byung gi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha dza laHshra ba Ne hUM/ chu'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta ba re swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi b+hak+ta b+ha ba na ba re hUM/ thig rnam par dbye ba'i sngags so/ /oM nA nA ra t+na ba re dz+wa la hUM/ tshon rtsi'i ri mo'i sngags so/ /oM dz+wa la bi ma le a mo g+ha shud+d+he hUM/ khrus kyisngags so/ /oM sid+d+hi dza le a mo g+ha bud+d+hi hUM/ nye reg gi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bas+t+re ts+tshA+e da hUM/ gos bgo ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ma Ni hUM/ gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ra k+Sha Na ba ra da hUM/ bdag srung ba'i sngags so/ /oM satwa rak+Sha Ni a mo g+ha daMSh+Te hUM/ thams cad du gzhan srung zhing bde ba'i ched du srung ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pra bi sha b+hu ba ne hUM/ gnas su 'jug pa'i sngags so/ /oM na mo a mo g+ha ba ti hUM/ phyag byed pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsakre hUM/ bskor ba'i sngags so/ /oM sa ma ya sid+d+he a mo g+ha ba ti hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags

112
093-56b so/ /oM a mo g+ha buSh+pe pra btsa gan+ng+hi ni dza ya swA hA/ me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa ra saM pU ra Ni ra sa ra sA gra pa ti hUM/ thams cad du gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tu Ti swA hA/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ba ti tsa ra bi tsa ra sany+tsa ra swA hA/ thams cad du gnas pa dang / gnas thams cad du song ba na rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o/ /thams cad du las thams cad byed pa rig pa'i gsang sngags sbyar bar bya'o/ /gshegs su gsol ba nyid kyang sngags 'dis bya'o/ /las shin tu rgyas pa gzhan thams cad ni rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o/ /legs par byas pa'i las dang / bya ba rnams dang / bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa gzhan rnams ni/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags chen po dang / dpa' bo gcig pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi las rnams bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'i/ de las phyi rol du gyur pa'i rig pa gzhan ni med do/ /rig pa 'di ni bklags pas grub pa'o/ /de nas de la yangs shing rgya che ba'i brtson pa bya ste/ 'byor pa ji lta ba dang / tshad ji lta ba dang / ji ltar gsal ba rnams/ 'byor pa dang bcas shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / shin tu gsal bar bya ba rnams bya'o/ /gtsang ma gtsang mas khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ dad pa dang / gus pa dang / mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya/ bden par smra bar bya/ bden par phyi rol du 'byung bar bya/ bden par spro ba dang / brtson pas 'byung bar bya/ lkog tu smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ser sna med par 'gyur bar bya/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam dang / bklags pas grub pa'i rig pa 'di sgrub par byed par 'gyur bar bya/ sems

113
093-57a can thams cad la brtse ba mchog tu bya/ bri bar bya/ 'drir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ mchod par bya/ ri mor bya/ kun chub par bya/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rmad du byung ba 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig thun mong gi gsang ba dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba thams cad kyi gsang ba/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs so/ /de nas yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi gang yin pa rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa ga la ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar song ste/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis gzung bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yang / lhag pa'i rgyal po cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su srung ba'i don dang / mi nub cing rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ji ltar rnyed pa de bzhin bris pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //'di ni sngon gyi lots+tsha ba mkhas pa bzhi tsam gyis bgos nas bsgyur ba la/ bar skabs bar skabs su chad cing mjug ma tshang ba las/ bla ma

114
093-57b dus kyi 'khor lo ba chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i phyag nas rgya dpe byung zhing / chad pa sob pa dang / mjug bsgyur cig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas/ bam po bcu pa'i nang du/ las kyi don kun sgrub par byed ces pa nas/ gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig ces pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gnyis pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang don khyad par can gyi ched du zhes pa nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur te/ zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gsum pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang zhes pa nas/ mi gang tshad du brko bar bya zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bzhi pa'i nang du/ pad+ma dang / chu dang / yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te zhes pa nas/ ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing / lan bdun du zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bco lnga pa'i mtshams su/ dngul gyi pog phor brgyad dang zhes pa nas/ gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do/ /zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu drug pa dang / bcu bdun pa'i mtshams su/ de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste zhes pa nas/ phyag rgya'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bdun pa zhes pa dang / de ma thag par bam po bco brgyadapa'i mtshams su/ de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo zhes pa'i bar rnams kyi hor kong bsabs shing / mjug yongs su rdzogs par shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'i yi ge ba ni yo ga pa grub pa dpal bzang po'o/ /kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o zhes pa nas/ gter bsgul na zhes pa'i bar rgya dpe la mi 'dug go/ /'gro ba sems can thams cad la phan par gyur cig/ //
